1.verse: Hayi, uyolo lomntu ongahambiyo ngecebo labangendawo,  Ongemiyo endleleni yaboni, Ongahlaliyo embuthweni yabagxeki!

2.verse: Yena unonelela umyalelo kaYehova; Ucamanga ngomyalelo wakhe imini nobusuku:

3.verse: Unjengomthi omiliselwe phezu kwemijelo yamanzi, Onika isiqhamo sawo ngexesha lawo, Ogqabi lawo lingabuniyo; Konke akwenzayo kophumelela.

4.verse: Abanjalo abangendawo; Bona banjengomququ ophetshethwa ngumoya.

5.verse: Ngenxa yoko abangendawo abanakuma emgwebeni, Naboni ebandleni lamalungisa.

6.verse: Ngokuba uYehova uyayazi indlela yamalungisa; Ke yona indlela yabangendawo iya kudaka.

1.verse: Yini na ukuba iintlanga zenze imbuthumbuthu, Izizwe zicamange into engeyakonto?

2.verse: Ookumkani behlabathi bazimisile, Izidwangube zabhunga NgoYehova nangoMthanjiswa wakhe;

3.verse: Besithi, Masiziqhawule iimbophelelo zabo, Sizilahle izintya zabo kuthi.

4.verse: Ohleli emazulwini uyahleka, INkosi iyabagculela.

5.verse: Iya kwandula ithethe kubo ngomsindo wayo, Ibakhwankqise ngokuvutha kwayo.

6.verse: Ithi, Mna ke ndimmisile ukumkani wam Phezu kweZiyon, intaba yam engcwele.

7.verse: Athi yena, Ndiya kuwuvakalisa ummiselo: UYehova uthe kum,  UnguNyana wam wena; Mna namhla ndikuzele.

8.verse: Cela kum, ndikunike iintlanga zibe lilifa lakho, Iziphelo zehlabathi zibe zezakho.

9.verse: Uya kuzivikiva ngentonga yentsimbi, Uzihlekeze, zinge zizitya zodongwe.

10.verse: Ngoko ke, nina bokumkani, qiqani; Bagwebi basehlabathini,  yalekani.

11.verse: Mkhonzeni uYehova nisoyika, Gcobani nithuthumela.

12.verse: Mangeni uNyana, hleze aqumbe, nitshabalale endleleni,  Ngokuba ungahle uvuthe umsindo wakhe. Hayi, uyolo lwabo bonke abazimela ngaye!

1.verse: Umhobe kaDavide, ekubalekeni kwakhe kuAbhisalom unyana wakhe. Yehova, hayi, ukuba baninzi kwabandibandezelayo!  Baninzi abasukela phezulu kum.

2.verse: Baninzi abathi kumphefumlo wam, Akunalusindiso kuThixo.  (Phakamisani.)

3.verse: Ke wena, Yehova, uyingweletshetshe kum, Uluzuko lwam,  umphakamisi wentloko yam.

4.verse: Ndidanduluka kuYehova ngezwi lam, Andiphendule entabeni yakhe engcwele. (Phakamisani.)

5.verse: Ndalala phantsi, ndalala ubuthongo; Ndavuka, ngokuba uYehova endixhasa.

6.verse: Andizoyiki izigidi zabantu Abakhe uluhlu lokulwa ngeenxa zonke kum.

7.verse: Khawusuk ume, Yehova; ndisindise, Thixo wam; Ngokuba uzibetha zonke iintshaba zam emhlathini; Amazinyo abangendawo uyawaphula.

8.verse: Usindiso lolukaYehova: Mayibe phezu kwabantu bakho intsikelelo yakho. (Phakamisani.)

1.verse: Kumongameli wokubethelwa izinto ezineentambo. Umhobe kaDavide. Ekudandulukeni kwam ndiphendule, Thixo wobulungisa bam; Embandezelweni yam wandenzela indawo ebanzi; Ndibabale,  uwuve umthandazo wam.

2.verse: Nina, nyana babantu, kunini na uzuko lwam niluhlazisa,  Ningxamele into engeyakonto, nithanda amanga? (Phakamisani.)

3.verse: Yazini ke ukuba uYehova uzibalulele owenceba; UYehova uyaphulaphula ndakudanduluka kuye.

4.verse: Qumbani, ningoni; Thethani neentliziyo zenu ezinkukweni zenu, nithi cwaka. (Phakamisani.)

5.verse: Bingelelani imibingelelo yobulungisa, Nikholose ngoYehova.

6.verse: Baninzi abathi, Ngubani na owosibonisa okulungileyo?  Siphakamisele ukukhanya kobuso bakho, Yehova.

7.verse: Uyivuyisile intliziyo yam, Kunexesha lobuninzi bengqolowa yabo, newayini yabo entsha.

8.verse: Ndiya kulala phantsi, ndilale ubuthongo kwangoku, ndixolile,  Ngokuba wena, Yehova, undihlalisa ndikholosile, noko ndindedwa.

1.verse: Kumongameli: ngogwali. Umhobe kaDavide. Wabekele indlebe amazwi am, Yehova, Kuqonde ukucamanga kwam.

2.verse: Libazele indlebe izwi lokuzibika kwam, Kumkani wam, Thixo wam; Ngokuba ndithandaza kuwe.

3.verse: Yehova, uya kuliva izwi lam kwakusasa, Kwakusasa ndiya kuwusingisa kuwe umthandazo wam, ndibonisele.

4.verse: Ngokuba wena akunguThixo onanze okungendawo,  Akanakuphambukela kuwe onobubi.

5.verse: Abanakuma abaqhayisi phambi kwamehlo akho; Uyabathiya bonke abasebenzi bobutshinga.

6.verse: Uyabatshabalalisa abathetha amanga; Indoda enegazi nenkohliso ilisikizi kuYehova.

7.verse: Ke mna, ndinokungena endlwini yakho ngenceba yakho eninzi,  Ndiqubude, ndibhekise etempileni yakho engcwele ngokukoyika.

8.verse: Yehova, ndikhaphe ngobulungisa bakho ngenxa yabandilaleleyo;  Yilungelelanise indlela yakho phambi kwam.

9.verse: Ngokuba emlonyeni wabo akukho nto imiyo, Umbilini wabo ngumeyeliselo; Lingcwaba elivuliweyo umqala wabo; Bathetha okugudileyo ngolwimi lwabo.

10.verse: Bathwalise ityala, Thixo; Makatshitshe amaqhinga abo;  Elukreqweni lwabo oluninzi batyhale, Ngokuba bakuphikisile.

11.verse: Mabavuye bonke abazimela ngawe, Bamemelele ngonaphakade,  ubakhusele; Badlamke ngawe abalithandayo igama lakho.

12.verse: Ngokuba wena uyalisikelela ilungisa, Yehova,  Ulihlanganisele ngenkoliseko njengekhaka.

1.verse: Kumongameli wokubethelwa izinto ezineentambo: ngelamadoda ilizwi. Umhobe kaDavide. Yehova, musa ukundohlwaya unomsindo,  Ungandithethisi unobushushu.

2.verse: Ndibabale, Yehova, ngokuba ndintshwenyile; Ndiphilise,  Yehova, ngokuba ekhwankqisiwe amathambo am.

3.verse: Umphefumlo wam ukhwankqiswe kakhulu; Ke wena, Yehova, koda kube nini na?

4.verse: Buya, Yehova, uwuhlangule umphefumlo wam; Ndisindise ngenxa yenceba yakho.

5.verse: Ngokuba ekufeni akusekho kukukhumbula; Kwelabafileyo ngubani na osenokubulela kuwe?

6.verse: Ndidiniwe kukugcuma kwam; Ndiludadisa ubusuku bonke ukhuko lwam, Ndiwenza manzi umandlalo wam ngeenyembezi zam.

7.verse: Lonakele kukukhathazeka iliso lam; Laluphele ngenxa yababandezeli bam bonke.

8.verse: Sukani kum, nina nonke basebenzi bobutshinga; Ngokuba uYehova ulivile ilizwi lokulila kwam.

9.verse: Ukuvile uYehova ukutarhuzisa kwam; UYehova umthandazo wam uyawamkela.

10.verse: Ziya kudana, zikhwankqe kakhulu, zonke iintshaba zam; Ziya kubuyiswa zidanile ngephanyazo.

1.verse: Ishigayon kaDavide, awayivumayo kuYehova ngenxa yamazwi kaKushi, umBhenjamin. Yehova, Thixo wam, ndizimela ngawe;  Ndisindise kubo bonke abandisukelayo, undihlangule,

2.verse: Hleze bawuqwenge njengengonyama umphefumlo wam, Bawudlavule,  kungekho mhlanguli.

3.verse: Yehova, Thixo wam, ukuba ndithe ndenza oku, Ukuba kukho ubugqwetha ezandleni zam,

4.verse: Ukuba ndimphethe kakubi obexolelene nam, Ndambhunyula ondibandezele kungekho sizathu:

5.verse: Maluwusukele utshaba umphefumlo wam, luwufumane,  Lubunyashele phantsi ubomi bam, Uzuko lwam lululalise eluthulini. (Phakamisani.)

6.verse: Khawusuk ume, Yehova, unomsindo, Kuphakamele ukuphuphuma komsindo wabandibandezelayo; Uvuke, undikhawulele; wena umise umgwebo.

7.verse: Ibandla lezizwe malikungqonge; Ubuyele phezulu phezu kwalo.

8.verse: UYehova uya kugweba phakathi kwezizwe. Lithethe ityala lam,  Yehova, ngobulungisa bam, nangokugqibelela kwam okukum.

9.verse: Mabuphele ububi babangendawo, ulizimase ilungisa;  Ungumcikidi weentliziyo nezintso, Thixo wobulungisa.

10.verse: Ingweletshetshe yam inoThixo, Umsindisi wabantliziyo zithe tye.

11.verse: UThixo ngumgwebi olilungisa; UnguThixo obhavuma yonke imihla.

12.verse: Ukuba ongendawo uthe akabuya, ulilolile ikrele lakhe;  Usityedile isaphetha sakhe, wasilungisa.

13.verse: Uzibhekise kuye izixhobo zokufa, Uzenze zanomlilo iintolo zakhe.

14.verse: Yabona, yena unenimba yobutshinga; Ukhawule ububi, wazala ubuxoki;

15.verse: Umbe umhadi, wawugomba; Weyela esihogweni awasisebenzayo.

16.verse: Ububi bakhe bobuyela entlokweni yakhe, Naselukakayini lwakhe kufike ukugonyamela kwakhe.

17.verse: Ndiya kubulela kuYehova ngokobulungisa bakhe, Ndivume ngendumiso kwigama likaYehova ophezu konke.

1.verse: Kumongameli: ngolwaseGati. Umhobe kaDavide. Yehova, Nkosi yethu, Hayi, ubungangamsha begama lakho ehlabathini lonke! Wena uwambathise amazulu ngendili yakho.

2.verse: Emlonyeni wabantwana nabanyayo useke amandla, Ngenxa yababandezeli bakho, Ukuze udambise utshaba nophindezelayo.

3.verse: Xa ndilikhangelayo izulu lakho, umsebenzi weminwe yakho,  Inyanga neenkwenkwezi ozimisileyo:

4.verse: Uyintoni na umntu lo, le nto umkhumbulelayo? Unyana womntu,  le nto umvelelayo?

5.verse: Umsilelise kancinane ebuThixweni, Wamthi jize ngobuqaqawuli nangobungangamela.

6.verse: Umphathise ubukhosi phezu kwemisebenzi yezandla zakho, Zonke izinto uzibeke phantsi kweenyawo zakhe:

7.verse: Impahla emfutshane, neenkomo zonke ziphelele,  Kwaneenyamakazi zonke;

8.verse: Iintaka zezulu, neentlanzi zolwandle, Into ehamba ngeendlela zolwandle.

9.verse: Yehova, Nkosi yethu, Hayi, ubungangamsha begama lakho ehlabathini lonke!

1.verse: Kumongameli: ngemute-labhen, Umhobe kaDavide. Ndiya kubulela kuYehova ngentliziyo yam yonke; Ndiya kuyibalisa yonke imisebenzi yakho ebalulekileyo.

2.verse: Ndiya kuvuya ndidlamke ngawe; Ndiya kulibethela uhadi igama lakho, Wena usenyangweni.

3.verse: Ekubuyeni kweentshaba zam umva, Ziyawa, zibhubhe ebusweni bakho.

4.verse: Ngokuba ulifezile ityala lam nebango lam: Uhleli etroneni ungumgwebi olilungisa.

5.verse: Uzikhalimele iintlanga, wabatshabalalisa abangendawo; Igama lazo ulicimile ngonaphakade kanaphakade.

6.verse: Iintshaba zona zigqibele, yangamanxuwa kwaphela; Imizi uyinyothule, Yadaka inkumbulo yayo yona.

7.verse: Ke yena uYehova uhleli ngonaphakade, Uyizinzisele ugwebo itrone yakhe.

8.verse: Uya kugweba yena kwelimiweyo ngobulungisa, Agwebe phakathi kwezizwe ngokuthe tye.

9.verse: UYehova makabe yingxonde kotyunyuziweyo, Ingxonde ngamaxesha engxingongo;

10.verse: Bakholose ngawe abalaziyo igama lakho; Ngokuba akubashiyanga abakuquqelayo wena, Yehova.

11.verse: Vumani ngendumiso kuYehova ohlala eZiyon; Xelani ezizweni izenzo zakhe ezincamisileyo;

12.verse: Ukuba umphindezeli wamagazi ubakhumbule, Akakulibalanga ukukhala kwabalulamileyo.

13.verse: Ndibabale, Yehova; Zibone iintsizi zam ezikhoyo ngabandithiyayo, Mphakamisi wam emasangweni okufa;

14.verse: Ukuze ndibalise yonke indumiso yakho, Emasangweni entombi uZiyon, Ndigcobe ngosindiso lwakho.

15.verse: Iintlanga zitshone esihogweni ezasenzayo, Emnatheni ezawugqumelayo kubanjiswe kwaolwazo unyawo.

16.verse: Uzazisile uYehova; wenza umgwebo, Emthiyela ngomsebenzi wezandla zakhe ongendawo. (Bethani uhadi ngofefe. Phakamisani.)

17.verse: Baya kubuyela kwelabafileyo abangendawo, Kwaiintlanga zonke ezimlibalayo uThixo;

18.verse: Ngokuba aliyi kuhlala lilityalwa ihlwempu, Ithemba leentsizana aliyi kudaka ngonaphakade.

19.verse: Khawusuk ume, Yehova; malungangcwangushi uluntu,  Mazigwetywe iintlanga phambi kwakho,

20.verse: Zimisele ukoyika, Yehova, Zazi iintlanga ukuba ziluluntu kuphela. (Phakamisani.)

1.verse: Yini na ukuba umele mgama, Yehova, Uzifihle ngamaxesha engxingongo?

2.verse: Ngokukratsha kwabangendawo bayatsha abaziintsizana;  Babanjiswa ngamayelenqe abawacingileyo.

3.verse: Ngokuba ongendawo uyaqhayisa ngeminqweno yomphefumlo wakhe.  Nolibawa wahlukene noYehova, wamgiba.

4.verse: Ongendawo ngobuchi bakhe uthi, Akasayi kubuza. Yonke iminkqangiyelo yakhe ithi, Akukho Thixo.

5.verse: Ziqinile iindlela zakhe ngamaxesha onke; Ziphakamile izigwebo zakho, zikude kuye; Bonke ababandezeli bakhe uyabafuthela.

6.verse: Uthi entliziyweni yakhe, Andisayi kushukunyiswa;  Izizukulwana ngezizukulwana, ndingongayi kuba sebubini.

7.verse: Umlomo wakhe uzele kukushwabula nokukhohlisa nokuxinezela.  Ngaphantsi kolwimi lwakhe bububi nobutshinga.

8.verse: Uhlala emilaleleni yeengqili, Agwinte omsulwa entsithelweni; Amehlo akhe azonda oludwayi.

9.verse: Ulalela entsithelweni njengengonyama eludadeni wayo;  Ulalela ukuba axwile emke nosizana; Uxwila emke nolusizana,  elutsala ngomnatha wakhe.

10.verse: Uyabuthuma, uyabunguzela, Bawele ezinzitsheni zakhe abaziindwayi.

11.verse: Uthi entliziyweni yakhe, UThixo ulibele, Ubusithelisile ubuso bakhe, akabonanga nento.

12.verse: Khawusuk ume, Yehova, phakamisa isandla sakho, Thixo.  Musa ukubalibala abalulamileyo.

13.verse: Kungenxa yani na ukuba ongendawo amgibe uThixo, Athi entliziyweni yakhe, Akuyi kubuza?

14.verse: Ubonile wena; ngokuba uyabubona ububi nenkathazo, ububeke esandleni sakho; Uzinikela kuwe oludwayi; Ungumncedi weenkedama wena.

15.verse: Yaphula ingalo yongendawo; Onobubi, mbuze okungendawo kwakhe, kungasali nento.

16.verse: UYehova nguKumkani ngonaphakade kanaphakade; Zitshabalele iintlanga, azabakho ehlabathini lakhe.

17.verse: Umnqweno wabalulamileyo uwuvile, Yehova; Wazizimasa iintliziyo zabo, wayibaza indlebe yakho,

18.verse: Ukuba ugwebe ityala lenkedama noxinzelelweyo, Angabi sabangcangcazelisa umntu wasehlabathini.

1.verse: Kumongameli. EkaDavide. Ndizimela ngoYehova; Ningathini na ukuthi kumphefumlo wam, Balekela entabeni yakho njengentaka?

2.verse: Ngokuba nabo abangendawo begoba isaphetha, Bezilungisile iintolo zabo entanjeni, Ukuba batole besithele kwabantliziyo zithe tye.

3.verse: Xa iziseko zithe zagungxulwa, Ilungisa linokuthini na?

4.verse: UYehova, ulotempile yakhe iyingcwele, UYehova, ulotrone yakhe isemazulwini, Amehlo akhe ayababona, iinkophe zakhe ziyabacikida oonyana babantu.

5.verse: UYehova uyalicikida ilungisa; Ke yena ongendawo nothanda ukugonyamela, umthiyile umphefumlo wakhe.

6.verse: Uya kubanisela abangendawo imigibe; Umlilo, nesulfure,  nomoya olulophu, yindebe yabo abayabelweyo;

7.verse: Ngokuba lilungisa uYehova; uthanda imisebenzi yobulungisa;  Othe tye uya kububona ubuso bakhe.

1.verse: Kumongameli: ngelamadoda ilizwi. Umhobe kaDavide.  Sindisa, Yehova, ngokuba uphelile owenceba, Ngokuba bathe shwaka abanyanisileyo koonyana babantu.

2.verse: Bathetha inkohlakalo omnye nomnye; Bathetha ngomlomo ogudileyo, nangentliziyo embaxa.

3.verse: Ngamana uYehova angayinqumla yonke imilebe yomlomo ogudileyo, Ulwimi oluthetha izinto ezinkulu;

4.verse: Abathe, Ulwimi lwethu siyalupheza; Imilomo yethu yeyethu;  ngubani na oyinkosi kuthi?

5.verse: Ngenxa yokubhuqwa kweentsizana, ngenxa yokuncwina kwamahlwempu, Ndiya kusuka ndime ngoku, utsho uYehova; Ndiya kumbeka elusindisweni lowo ululangazelelayo.

6.verse: Amazwi kaYehova ngamazwi acocekileyo, Yisilivere enyibilikiselwe eziko, yela emhlabeni, Ehluzwe kasixhenxe.

7.verse: Wena, Yehova, uya kubagcina, Uya kubalondoloza kwesi sizukulwana ngonaphakade.

8.verse: Abangendawo bahambahamba ngeenxa zonke, Xa kuphakanyiswe abangeni phakathi koonyana babantu.

1.verse: Kumongameli. Umhobe kaDavide. Kunini na, Yehova,  undilibele kwaphela? Kunini na ubusithelisa ubuso bakho kum?

2.verse: Kunini na ndicebacebisana nomphefumlo wam, Ndinesingqala entliziyweni yam imini le? Kunini na lundiphakamele utshaba lwam?

3.verse: Bheka undiphendule, Yehova, Thixo wam; Khanyisa amehlo am,  hleze ndilale ukufa;

4.verse: Hleze utshaba lwam luthi, Ndimeyisile; Bagcobe abandibandezelayo, xa ndithe ndashukunyiswa.

5.verse: Mna ndikholose ngenceba yakho, Mayigcobe intliziyo yam ngosindiso lwakho.

6.verse: Ndiya kuvuma kuYehova, Ngokuba endiphethe kakuhle.

1.verse: Kumongameli. EkaDavide. Sithi isidenge entliziyweni yaso,  Akukho Thixo. Bonakalisile, balisikizi ngeentlondi zabo; Akukho wenza okulungileyo.

2.verse: UYehova esemazulwini uqondele koonyana babantu, Ukubona ukuba ukho na oqiqayo, Oquqela kuThixo.

3.verse: Bonke batyekile, bayimbozisa bephelele; Akukho wenza okulungileyo, Akukho nokuba abe mnye.

4.verse: Abanakwazi na bonke abasebenzi bobutshinga, Abathi, bebadla abantu bam, bathi badla isonka, Bangamnquli uYehova?

5.verse: Apho bankwantya benkwantyile; Ngokuba uThixo usesizukulwaneni samalungisa.

6.verse: Icebo losizana ningalidanisa, Kodwa uYehova ulihlathi lalo.

7.verse: Akwaba bekuvela eZiyon ukusindiswa kwamaSirayeli!  Ekubabuyiseni kukaYehova abantu bakhe ekuthinjweni, Wogcoba uYakobi, avuye uSirayeli.

1.verse: Umhobe kaDavide. Yehova, ngubani na owophambukela ententeni yakho? Ngubani na owohlala entabeni yakho engcwele?

2.verse: Ngohamba ngokugqibeleleyo, esenza ubulungisa, Othetha inyaniso ngentliziyo yakhe.

3.verse: Ngongahlebiyo ngolwimi lwakhe, Ongamenziyo into embi uwabo,  Ongamngcikiviyo ummelwane wakhe;

4.verse: Odelekileyo, ecekiseka, kwawakhe amehlo, Obazukisayo ke bona abamoyikayo uYehova; Ofunga, angajiki, nokuba kubi kuye,

5.verse: Ongayinikeliyo imali yakhe ukuba adle abantu ngayo,  Ongenakugaqelwa ngaye omsulwa. Okwenzayo oko akayi kuza ashukunyiswe naphakade.

1.verse: Eyona iligugu likaDavide. Ndigcine, Thixo, ngokuba ndizimela ngawe.

2.verse: Ndithe kuYehova, UyiNkosi yam, Andinanto indilungeleyo ngaphezu kwakho.

3.verse: Ndithe kwabangcwele abasehlabathini, Bona bazizinhanha apho, kukhona konke endikunanzileyo.

4.verse: Ziya kwanda iimbulaleko zabo bamananisa ngathixo wumbi uYehova. Andiyi kuyithulula iminikelo yabo ethululwayo yegazi;  Andiyi kuwaphatha amagama abo ngomlomo wam.

5.verse: NguYehova isahlulo endasabelwayo, nendebe endayabelwayo;  Ulenze banzi ilifa lam.

6.verse: Amacandelo andiwele ezindaweni ezimnandi; Hee! Ndide ndaba nelifa elihle.

7.verse: Ndiya kumbonga uYehova ondinike icebo; Nasebusuku ziyandithethisa izintso zam.

8.verse: Ndimmisile uYehova phambi kwam amaxesha onke; Ngokuba esekunene kum nje, andiyi kushukunyiswa.

9.verse: Ngako oko iyavuya intliziyo yam, luyagcoba uzuko lwam:  Nenyama yam iya kuhlala ikholosile.

10.verse: Ngokuba akuyi kuwushiya umphefumlo wam kwelabafileyo;  Akuyi kumyekela owakho wenceba ukuba abonane nesihogo.

11.verse: Uya kundazisa umendo wobomi; Ebusweni bakho yinzaliseko yemivuyo; Ekunene kwakho yimihlali ngonaphakade.

1.verse: Umthandazo kaDavide. Buve, Yehova, ubulungisa; kubazele indlebe ukuhlahlamba kwam; Wubekele indlebe umthandazo wam,  ongengamlomo ukhohlisayo.

2.verse: Ibango lam malivele ebusweni bakho, Amehlo akho akhangele ngokuthe tye.

3.verse: Uyicikidile intliziyo yam; undivelele ebusuku;  Undinyibilikisile, akwafumana nto; Ndiyinkqangiyele into embi,  ayiyi kuwugqitha umlomo wam.

4.verse: Malunga nemisebenzi yabantu, ngelizwi lomlomo wakho, Mna ndizigcinile, andangena kwiindlela zamanyangaza.

5.verse: Imikhondo yam ibambe iindlela zakho, Azashukuma iinyawo zam.

6.verse: Mna ndinqula wena, ngokuba undiphendula, Thixo; Ndithobele indlebe yakho, kuve ukuthetha kwam.

7.verse: Zibalule iinceba zakho, wena wabasindisayo abazimela ngawe,  Ngesandla sakho sokunene, ngenxa yabasukela phezulu kubo.

8.verse: Ndigcine njengeliso, njengokhozo lwalo, Ndisithelise ngesithunzi samaphiko akho,

9.verse: Phambi kwabangendawo abandibhuqayo, Phambi kweentshaba zam ngokwasemphefumlweni ezindingungelayo.

10.verse: Zithe fithi kukutyeba; Ngomlomo wazo zithetha ngekratshi.

11.verse: Zindijikelezile ngoku ekuhambeni kwam; Amehlo azo ziwamisele ukundinqumela emhlabeni.

12.verse: Ukufana kwazo kunjengengonyama engxamele ukuqwenga,  Kunjengengonyama entsha ihleli entsithelweni.

13.verse: Khawusuk ume, Yehova, Uyihlangabeze, uyiwise yona;  Wusindise umphefumlo wam kongendawo ngekrele lakho;

14.verse: Kubafo, ngesandla sakho, Yehova, Kubafo beli phakade,  abasahlulo sikobu bomi; Osizalisileyo isisu sabo ngeengqwebo zakho; Bakholisile ngoonyana, Ukuphuphuma kwabo bakushiya neentsapho zabo.

15.verse: Mna ndiya kububona ubuso bakho ndisebulungiseni; Ndiya kwaneliswa sisithomo sakho ekuvukeni kwam.

1.verse: Kumongameli. Eyomkhonzi kaYehova. EkaDavide, owawathethayo kuYehova amazwi ale ngoma, mhlenikweni uYehova wamhlangulayo esandleni seentshaba zakhe zonke nasesandleni sikaSawule;  wathi: Ndikuthanda ngembilini yam, Yehova, lomelelo lwam.

2.verse: Yehova, ngxondorha yam, mboniselo yam, msindisi wam, Thixo wam, liwa lam endizimela ngalo, Ngweletshetshe yam, luphondo losindiso lwam, ngxonde yam!

3.verse: Ndinqula uYehova ongowokudunyiswa, Ndiyasindiswa ezintshabeni zam.

4.verse: Izintya zokufa zandijikela; Imilambo yobutshijolo yandidandathekisa.

5.verse: Izintya zelabafileyo zandibhijela; Izirhintyelo zokufa zabetha kum.

6.verse: Ekubandezelekeni kwam ndanqula uYehova, Ndazibika kuThixo wam; Waliva etempileni yakhe izwi lam, Ukuzibika kwam kwafika phambi kwakhe ezindlebeni zakhe.

7.verse: Lahexa ke lanyikima ihlabathi, Iziseko zeentaba zagungqa,  Zahexa, ngokuba enomsindo.

8.verse: Kwathi thaphu umsi emathatheni akhe, Wadla umlilo, uphuma emlonyeni wakhe, Kwavutha amalahle ephuma kuwo.

9.verse: Wawathoba amazulu, wehla, Yangamafu amnyama phantsi kweenyawo zakhe.

10.verse: Wakhwela ekerubhini, waphaphazela, Wee tshwebelele ngamaphiko omoya.

11.verse: Wamisa ubumnyama baba lisithe lakhe, umnquba wakhe ngeenxa zonke kuye; Ubumnyama bamanzi, iingqimba zamafu.

12.verse: Ekukhanyeni okuphambi kwakhe, kwatyhoboza emafini akhe Isiphango samatye, namalahle omlilo.

13.verse: Wadudumisa ezulwini uYehova, Ophezu konke walikhupha ilizwi lakhe. Yasisiphango samatye namalahle omlilo.

14.verse: Wathuma iintolo zakhe, wabaphangalalisa; Yamininzi imibane, wabadubaduba.

15.verse: Imiphantsi yamanzi yabonakala, Kwatyhileka iziseko zelimiweyo Ngokukhalima kwakho, Yehova, Ngokufutha komoya womsindo wakho.

16.verse: Wolula isandla ephezulu, wandibamba, Wandirhola emanzini amaninzi.

17.verse: Wandihlangula elutshabeni lwam olunamandla,  Kwabandithiyileyo, ngokuba bebomelele kunam.

18.verse: Bandifikela ngemini yokusindeka kwam, UYehova wandixhasa.

19.verse: Wandikhuphela endaweni ebanzi, Wandihlangula, ngokuba endithandile.

20.verse: UYehova wandiphatha kakuhle ngokobulungisa bam,  Wandibuyisela ngokobunyulu bezandla zam.

21.verse: Ngokuba ndizigcina iindlela zikaYehova, Andemka ngokungendawo kuThixo wam.

22.verse: Ngokuba onke amasiko akhe aphambi kwam, Nemimiselo yakhe andiyisusi kum;

23.verse: Ndaye ndingogqibeleleyo kuye, Ndazigcina, andaba nabugwenxa,

24.verse: Wandibuyisela ke uYehova ngokobulungisa bam, Ngokobunyulu bezandla zam phambi kwamehlo akhe.

25.verse: Kowenceba uzenza owenceba, Kwigorha eligqibeleleyo uzenza ogqibeleleyo;

26.verse: Kozenze nyulu uzenza onyulu, Kojibilizayo uzenza onobuqhokolo.

27.verse: Ngokuba wena uyabasindisa abantu ababandezelekileyo,  Uwathobe amehlo aqwayingileyo.

28.verse: Ngokuba uyasilumeka isibane sam wena; UYehova uThixo wam uyabukhanyisela ubumnyama bam.

29.verse: Ngokuba ngawe ndigila amajarha, NgoThixo wam ndiqabela ezindongeni.

30.verse: UThixo yena, igqibelele indlela yakhe; Ilizwi likaYehova linyibilikisiwe, Uyingweletshetshe kubo bonke abazimela ngaye.

31.verse: Ngokuba ngubani na onguThixo, ingenguye uYehova? Ngubani na oliliwa, ingenguThixo wethu?

32.verse: UloThixo undibhinqise ubukroti, Uyigqibelelisileyo indlela yam;

33.verse: Uzifanisayo iinyawo zam nezamaxhamakazi, Undimisayo emimangweni yam:

34.verse: Uzifundisayo ukulwa izandla zam, Zityede isaphetha sobhedu iingalo zam.

35.verse: Undinikileyo ingweletshetshe yosindiso lwakho: Sandixhasa isandla sakho sokunene; Ululamo lwakho lwandikhulisa.

36.verse: Wawenzela indawo ebanzi amanyathela am phantsi kwam,  Amaxhwele am akahexa.

37.verse: Ndazisukela iintshaba zam, ndazifumana; Andabuya zada zaphela.

38.verse: Ndaziqoba; azaba nakuvuka, Zawa phantsi kweenyawo zam.

39.verse: Wandibhinqisa ubukroti ekulweni, Wabaguqisa phantsi kwam abasukela phezulu kum;

40.verse: Wandinika ikhosi leentshaba zam, Abandithiyayo ndababhangisa.

41.verse: Bazibika, akwabakho msindisi; Bazibika kuYehova,  akabaphendula.

42.verse: Ndabacola, banjengothuli phambi komoya, Ndabaphalaza njengodaka lwezitrato.

43.verse: Wandisiza ekubambaneni kwabantu, Wandimisa ndayintloko yeentlanga; Abantu ebe ndingabazi bandikhonza.

44.verse: Besave ngeendlebe, bandithobela, Oonyana bolunye uhlanga bahanahanisa kum;

45.verse: Oonyana bolunye uhlanga bantshwenya, Baphuma bengcangcazela ekuvingcelweni kwabo.

46.verse: UYehova uhleli; lelokubongwa iliwa lam, Aphakanyiswe uThixo ondisindisayo.

47.verse: UloThixo wandinika impindezelo, Uzikhandaniselayo izizwe phantsi kwam;

48.verse: Undisiza ezintshabeni zam; Ewe, wena undiphakamisayo kwabasukela phezulu kum, Undihlangule kumfo ogonyamelayo.

49.verse: Ngenxa yoko ndiya kubulela kuwe, Yehova, phakathi kweentlanga, Ndivume kwigama lakho.

50.verse: Ulokhulisa iintsindiso zokumkani wakhe: Wenzayo inceba kumthanjiswa wakhe, KuDavide, nakwimbewu yakhe kude kuse ephakadeni.

1.verse: Kumongameli. Umhobe kaDavide. Izulu libalisa uzuko lukaThixo, Saye isibhakabhaka sixela umsebenzi wezandla zakhe.

2.verse: Imini impompozelela imini intetho, Ubusuku buxelela ubusuku ukwazi.

3.verse: Akukho ntetho, akukho mazwi, Apho singavakaliyo isandi sawo.

4.verse: Intambo yawo yokulinganisa iphume yaya ehlabathini lonke,  Kwaba seziphelweni zelimiweyo ukukhuluma kwawo. Ilanga ulimisele intente kuwo,

5.verse: Lona linjengomyeni ke ephuma egumbini lakhe; Linemihlali njengegorha, ukugidima ngomendo walo.

6.verse: Kusesiphelweni sezulu ukuphuma kwalo, Ukujikeleza kwalo kusa eziphelweni zalo; Akukho nto inokusithela ebushushwini balo.

7.verse: Umyalelo kaYehova ugqibelele, ubuyisa umphefumlo; Isingqino sikaYehova sinyanisekile, sinika isiyatha ubulumko.

8.verse: Izimiselo zikaYehova zithe tye, zivuyisa intliziyo;  Umthetho kaYehova unyulu, ukhanyisela amehlo.

9.verse: Ukoyika uYehova kucocekile, kumi ngonaphakade; Izigwebo zikaYehova ziyinyaniso, zibubulungisa kwaphela.

10.verse: Zinokunqweneleka kunegolide zona, nakunengcwengiweyo eninzi; Zimnandi kunobusi, kunencindi yobusi.

11.verse: Zikwamkhanyisela umkhonzi wakho; Ekuzigcineni mkhulu umvuzo.

12.verse: Ukulahleka, ngubani na okuqondayo? Ndenze msulwa kokusitheleyo.

13.verse: Kwanasekukhukhumaleni mnqande umkhonzi wakho;  Makungandilawuli; ukuze ndandule ukuba ngogqibeleleyo, Ndibe msulwa ekukreqeni okukhulu.

14.verse: Makakholeke amazwi omlomo wam, nezicamango zentliziyo yam,  Phambi kwakho, Yehova, liwa lam, mkhululi wam.

1.verse: Kumongameli. Umhobe kaDavide. Ngamana wakuphendula uYehova ngemini yembandezelo, Ngamana lakusa engxondeni igama likaThixo kaYakobi!

2.verse: Wakuthumela uncedo lwasengcweleni, Wakuxhasa eseZiyon!

3.verse: Wayikhumbula yonke iminikelo yakho yokudla, Wawafumana etyebile amadini akho anyukayo! (Phakamisani.)

4.verse: Wakunika ngokwentliziyo yakho, Walizalisa lonke icebo lakho!

5.verse: Singamemelela ngosindiso lwakho, Siphakamise iibhanile zethu egameni loThixo wethu; Azizalise uYehova zonke izicelo zakho.

6.verse: Ndiyazi ngoku ukuba uYehova ngumsindisi womthanjiswa wakhe;  Uya kumphendula emazulwini akhe angcwele Ngobugorha obusindisayo besandla sakhe sokunene.

7.verse: Abanye bakhankanya iinqwelo zokulwa, abanye bakhankanye amahashe, Ke thina sikhankanya igama likaYehova uThixo wethu.

8.verse: Bona baguqile bawa; Thina siphakamile sema.

9.verse: Yehova, sindisa; Ukumkani asiphendule ngemini yokubiza kwethu.

1.verse: Kumongameli. Umhobe kaDavide. Yehova, uvuyile ngamandla akho ukumkani, Asikuko nokuba uyagcoba ngosindiso lwakho!

2.verse: Umnike umnqweno wentliziyo yakhe Akwasilandula isicelo somlomo wakhe. (Phakamisani.)

3.verse: Ngokuba umkhawulela ngeentsikelelo zokulungileyo, Umthwesa isithsaba segolide engcwengekileyo.

4.verse: Wacela ubomi kuwe, wampha, Wamnika imihla emide ngonaphakade kanaphakade.

5.verse: Lukhulu uzuko lwakhe ngosindiso lwakho; Ubeka phezu kwakhe indili nobungangamela.

6.verse: Ngokuba umenze waba yintsikelelo ngonaphakade, Umvuyisa ngovuyo ebusweni bakho.

7.verse: Ngokuba ukumkani ukholose ngoYehova, Ngenceba yOsenyangweni akayi kushukunyiswa.

8.verse: Isandla sakho siya kuzifumana zonke iintshaba zakho,  Esokunene sakho siya kubafumana abakuthiyayo.

9.verse: Uya kubenza babe njengeziko lomlilo, wakubonakala. UYehova uya kubaginya ngomsindo wakhe, Nomlilo ubadle.

10.verse: Uya kusitshabalalisa isiqhamo sabo emhlabeni, Imbewu yabo koonyana babantu.

11.verse: Ngokuba bakuthobela ububi, Bacinga iyelenqe; abayi kufeza nto.

12.verse: Ngokuba uya kubenza bakunikele umhlana; Ngesaphetha sakho uya kuxuna iintolo zakho ebusweni babo.

13.verse: Phakama, Yehova, ngamandla akho; Siya kuvuma sibethe uhadi ngobugorha bakho.

1.verse: Kumongameli: ngeyelexhama lesifingo. Umhobe kaDavide.  Thixo wam, Thixo wam, undilahleleni na? Ukude ngani na ekusindisweni kwam, nasemazwini okubonga kwam?

2.verse: Thixo wam, ndiyabiza emini, ungaphenduli; Nasebusuku ndiyabiza, andithozanyiswa noko.

3.verse: Ungcwele ke wena, Ungulohlala ezindumisweni zakwaSirayeli.

4.verse: Oobawo bakholosa ngawe, Bakholosa, wabasiza;

5.verse: Bakhala kuwe, basinda; Bakholosa ngawe, abadana.

6.verse: Ke mna ndingumbungu, andimntu; Ndisisingcikivo soluntu,  into edelekileyo ebantwini.

7.verse: Bonke abandibonayo bayandigculela; Bayasineka, bahlunguzela intloko;

8.verse: Bathi, Makazilahlele kuYehova, amsize, Amhlangule kaloku,  ngokuba emthandile.

9.verse: Ewe, nguwe umtyhobozisi wam esizalweni, Inkolosisi yam ndisemabeleni kama.

10.verse: Ndalahlelwa kuwe kwasesizalweni; Kwasembilinini kama ubunguThixo wam.

11.verse: Musa ukuba kude nam, ngokuba isondele imbandezelo, Ngokuba akukho mncedi.

12.verse: Ndingqongwe ziinkunzi ezininzi, Ndihlanganyelwe zeziziimbalasane zaseBhashan.

13.verse: Zindakhamele umlomo wazo, Njengengonyama eqwengayo,  egqumayo.

14.verse: Ndiphalele njengamanzi, Ahlukene onke amathambo am;  Yanjengomthwebeba intliziyo yam, Inyibilikile phakathi kwezibilini zam.

15.verse: Omile njengegophe amandla am, Ulwimi lwam lunamathele ekhuhlangubeni lam; Undibeka eluthulini lokufa.

16.verse: Ngokuba izinja zindirhawule, Ibandla labenzi bokubi lindingungele; Bagqobhoza izandla zam neenyawo zam.

17.verse: Ndinokuwabala onke amathambo am; Bona bayandijonga,  bayandibonela,

18.verse: Babelana ngeengubo zam, Isambatho sam basenzela amaqashiso.

19.verse: Ke wena, Yehova, musa ukuba kude; Mandla am, khawuleza undincede.

20.verse: Wuhlangule ekreleni umphefumlo wam, Okuphela kwawo,  ethupheni lenja.

21.verse: Ndisindise emlonyeni wengonyama, Nasezimpondweni zenqu uya kundiphendula.

22.verse: Ndiya kulazisa igama lakho kubazalwana bam, Ndikudumise phakathi kwebandla, ndithi,

23.verse: Nina nimoyikayo uYehova, mdumiseni; Nonke, mbewu kaYakobi,  mzukiseni, Nimhlonele nina, mbewu yonke kaSirayeli.

24.verse: Kuba azidelekanga, azibanga nazothe kuye iintsizi zolusizana; Akabusithelisanga ubuso bakhe kuye; Ekuzibikeni kwakhe kuye waphulaphula.

25.verse: Ivela kuwe indumiso yam ebandleni elikhulu;  Nezibhambathiso zam ndiya kuzizalisa phambi kwabamoyikayo.

26.verse: Baya kudla abalulamileyo, bahluthe; Baya kudumisa uYehova abamngxamelayo. Ngamana yaphila intliziyo yenu ngonaphakade!

27.verse: Ziya kukhumbula zibuyele kuYehova zonke iziphelo zehlabathi, Iqubude phambi kwakhe yonke imizalwane yeentlanga:

28.verse: Ngokuba bobukaYehova ubukumkani, Nguye umlawuli ezintlangeni.

29.verse: Baya kudla, baqubude, bonke abatyebileyo behlabathi; Baya kuguqa phambi kwakhe bonke abatshona eluthulini,  Abangawugciniyo umphefumlo wabo.

30.verse: Imbewu iya kumkhonza; Kuya kubaliselwa isizukulwana ngayo iNkosi.

31.verse: Baya kuza baxele ubulungisa bayo Kubantu abaza kuzalwa,  ukuba oko ukwenzile.

1.verse: Umhobe kaDavide. UYehova ngumalusi wam, andisweli lutho.

2.verse: Wenza ukuba mandibuthe emakriweni aluhlaza; Undithundezela emanzini angawokuphumla.

3.verse: Uyawubuyisa umphefumlo wam; Undikhaphela ezindleleni zobulungisa ngenxa yegama lakhe.

4.verse: Nokuba ndihamba emfuleni wethunzi lokufa, Andiyi koyika bubi, ngokuba unam wena; Intonga yakho, umsimelelo wakho,  uyandithuthuzela.

5.verse: Undilungisela isithebe phambi kwababandezeli bam,  Uyithambisa ngeoli intloko yam, Indebe yam iyaphalala.

6.verse: Inene, ndiya kulandelwa kokulungileyo nenceba Yonke imihla yobomi bam, Ndihlale endlwini kaYehova Imihla emide.

1.verse: Umhobe kaDavide. LelikaYehova ihlabathi nenzaliseko yalo,  Elimiweyo, nabahleli kulo;

2.verse: Ngokuba yena waliseka phezu kweelwandle, Walizinzisa phezu kwemilambo.

3.verse: Ngubani na onokunyuka aye entabeni kaYehova? Ngubani na onokuma endaweni yakhe engcwele?

4.verse: Ngozandla zimsulwa, ontliziyo inyulu, Ongawuphakamiseli kwinkohlakalo umphefumlo wakhe, Ongafungiyo ngenkohliso.

5.verse: Uya kwamkela intsikelelo kuYehova, Nobulungisa kuThixo ongumsindisi wakhe.

6.verse: Siso eso isizukulwana sabamngxameleyo, Sababufunayo ubuso bakho, Thixo kaYakobi.(phakamisani.)

7.verse: Phakamisani iintloko zenu, masango; Niziphakamise, minyango yaphakade, Angene uKumkani wozuko.

8.verse: Ngubani na ke lo Kumkani wozuko? NguYehova onamandla,  oligorha; NguYehova, igorha emfazweni.

9.verse: Phakamisani iintloko zenu, masango, Niziphakamise, minyango yaphakade, Angene lo Kumkani wozuko.

10.verse: Ngubani na ke yena uKumkani wozuko? NguYehova wemikhosi,  Nguye lo Kumkani wozuko. (Phakamisani.)

1.verse: EkaDavide. Ndiwuphakamisela kuwe, Yehova, umphefumlo wam.

2.verse: Thixo wam, ndikholose ngawe, Mandingadani;  Mazingandivuyeleli iintshaba zam.

3.verse: Ewe, bonke abo bakuthembayo abayi kudana; Kuya kudana abo banginiza ngelize.

4.verse: Ndazise iindlela zakho, Yehova, Ndifundise umendo wakho.

5.verse: Ndinyathelise enyanisweni yakho, undifundise; Ngokuba unguThixo ongumsindisi wam; Ndithembe wena yonke imihla.

6.verse: Khumbula iimfesane zakho, Yehova, neenceba zakho; Ngokuba kususela kwaphakade zikho.

7.verse: Musa ukuzikhumbula izono zobutsha bam, nokreqo lwam;  Ndikhumbule ngokwenceba yakho wena, Ngenxa yokulunga kwakho,  Yehova.

8.verse: Ulungile, uthe tye uYehova; Ngenxa yoko uyabayalela indlela aboni.

9.verse: Uyabanyathelisa abalulamileyo emasikweni akhe, Abafundise abalulamileyo indlela yakhe.

10.verse: Zonke iindlela zikaYehova ziyinceba nenyaniso, Kwabagcina umnqophiso wakhe nezingqino zakhe.

11.verse: Ngenxa yegama lakho, Yehova, xolela ubugwenxa bam, Ngokuba bukhulu bona.

12.verse: Ngubani na ke umntu omoyikayo uYehova? Womyalela indlela aya kuyinyula.

13.verse: Umphefumlo wakhe wohlala wonwabile, Imbewu yakhe ilidle ilifa ilizwe.

14.verse: Ukucweya kukaYehova kunabamoyikayo; Ubazisa umnqophiso wakhe.

15.verse: Amehlo am ahlala emi kuYehova, Ngokuba nguye ozirholayo eluthanjeni iinyawo zam.

16.verse: Ndibheke, undibabale, Ngokuba ndindodwa, ndibandezelekile.

17.verse: Iimbandezelo zentliziyo yam ziphangalalisiwe; Ndikhuphe ekucuthekeni kwam.

18.verse: Khangela ukucinezeleka kwam nokwaphuka kwam, Uxolele zonke izono zam.

19.verse: Zikhangele iintshaba zam, ngokuba zininzi; Zindithiye ngentiyo egonyamelayo.

20.verse: Wugcine umphefumlo wam, undihlangule; Mandingadani,  ngokuba ndizimela ngawe.

21.verse: Ukugqibelela nokuthi tye makundilondoloze, Ngokuba ndithembele kuwe.

22.verse: Khulula uSirayeli, Thixo, Ezimbandezelweni zakhe zonke.

1.verse: EkaDavide. Lithethe ityala lam, Yehova, ngokuba mna ndihambe engqibelelweni yam, Ndakholosa ngoYehova, andahexa.

2.verse: Ndicikide, Yehova, undilinge; Nyibilikisa izintso zam nentliziyo yam.

3.verse: Ngokuba inceba yakho iphambi kwamehlo am, Ndihamba enyanisweni yakho.

4.verse: Andihlali namadoda akhohlakeleyo, Andihambi nabanyhwalazi.

5.verse: Ndilithiyile ibandla labenzi bobubi, Andihlali nabangendawo.

6.verse: Ndizihlamba kokumsulwa izandla zam, Ndisiphahle isibingelelo sakho, Yehova,

7.verse: Ukuba ndivakalise izwi lokubulela, Ndibalise ngayo yonke imisebenzi yakho ebalulekileyo.

8.verse: Yehova, ndiyalithanda ikhaya eliyindlu yakho, Nendawo yokuhlala kozuko lwakho.

9.verse: Musa ukuwubuthela umphefumlo wam ndawonye naboni, Ubomi bam ndawonye namadoda anamagazi;

10.verse: Wona azandla zinamanyala, Wona ezokunene zawo zizeleyo zizicengo.

11.verse: Mna ke okwam ndihamba engqibelelweni yam; Ndikhulule,  undibabale.

12.verse: Unyawo lwam lumi endaweni ebanzi; Ndimbonga uYehova ndisemabandleni.

1.verse: EkaDavide. NguYehova umkhanyiseli wam nomsindisi wam,  ndiya koyika bani na? NguYehova inqaba yobomi bam, ndiya kunkwantya ngabani na?

2.verse: Bakusondela kum abenzi bobubi ukuba badle inyama yam,  Bakuza ababandezeli bam neentshaba zam kum, bakhubeka bawa bona.

3.verse: Bendingafanelana ndirhawulwe ngumkhosi isuka ingoyiki intliziyo yam; Bendingafanelana ndiphakanyelwe yimfazwe,  ndisuka ndithembe noko.

4.verse: Ndicele nto-nye kuYehova, ndifuna yona: Ukuba ndihlale endlwini kaYehova yonke imihla yobomi bam, Ndibone ubuhle bukaYehova, ndiphicothe etempileni yakhe.

5.verse: Ngokuba undigusha emnqubeni wakhe ngemini yobubi,  Undisithelisa esitheni lentente yakhe, Undimisa eweni.

6.verse: Ngoku ke iya kuphakama intloko yam phezu kweentshaba zam ezindijikelezayo, Ndibingelele ententeni yakhe imibingelelo yokuduma, Ndivume, ndibethe uhadi kuYehova.

7.verse: Yiva, Yehova, ndakubiza ngezwi lam; Ndibabale,  undiphendule.

8.verse: Intliziyo yam ithi kuwe, kweli uthi, Funani ubuso bam,  Ubuso bakho, Yehova, ndiya kubufuna.

9.verse: Musa ukubusithelisa ubuso bakho kum; Musa ukumgila umkhonzi wakho ngomsindo; Uluncedo lwam, musa ukundilahla; Musa ukundishiya, Thixo ondisindisayo.

10.verse: Ngokuba ubawo noma bandishiyile, Wesuka uYehova wandichola.

11.verse: Ndiyalele, Yehova, indlela yakho, Ndikhaphe emendweni othe tye, ngenxa yabandilaleleyo.

12.verse: Musa ukundinikela elitheni labandibandezelayo, Ngokuba ndiphakanyelwe ngamangqina axokayo, nabafutha ukugonyamela.

13.verse: Ndinge ndiphelelwe, koko bendikholwa kukuba ndokubona ukulunga kukaYehova Ezweni lobu bomi.

14.verse: Thembela kuYehova; Yomelela, ikhaliphe intliziyo yakho,  Uthembele kuYehova.

1.verse: EkaDavide. Ndidanduluka kuwe, Yehova; Liwa lam, musa ukuzenza isithulu; Hleze, wakuthi cwaka kum, Ndifane nabahla baye emhadini.

2.verse: Yiva izwi lokukhunga kwam ekuzibikeni kwam kuwe,  Ekuziphakamiseleni kwam izandla zam kwingcwele kangcwele.

3.verse: Musa ukundiqweqwedisa nabangendawo, Nabenzi bobutshinga;  Abathetha uxolo kummelwane wabo, Benobubi ezintliziyweni zabo.

4.verse: Banike ngokwemisebenzi yabo, ngokobubi beentlondi zabo;  Banike ngokwezenzo zezandla zabo; Babuyisele ngokwempatho yabo.

5.verse: Ekubeni bengayiqondi imisebenzi kaYehova, Nezenzo zezandla zakhe, Uya kubagungxula, angabakhi.

6.verse: Makabongwe uYehova, Kuba elivile ilizwi lokukhunga kwam.

7.verse: NguYehova amandla am nengweletshetshe yam; Yakholosa ngaye intliziyo yam, ndancedeka. Iyadlamka ke intliziyo yam,  Ndiyamdumisa ngengoma yam.

8.verse: UYehova ungamandla kubo; Uligwiba losindiso kumthanjiswa wakhe yena.

9.verse: Sindisa abantu bakho, Usikelele ilifa lakho, Ubaluse,  ubathwale kude kuse ephakadeni.

1.verse: Umhobe kaDavide. Mnikeni uYehova, nina nyana bakaThixo,  Mnikeni uYehova uzuko namandla.

2.verse: Mnikeni uYehova uzuko lwegama lakhe; Qubudani kuYehova nivethe ezingcwele.

3.verse: Izwi likaYehova liphezu kwamanzi; UThixo wozuko uyadudumisa, KwauYehova phezu kwamanzi amaninzi.

4.verse: Izwi likaYehova linamandla, Izwi likaYehova linobungangamela;

5.verse: Izwi likaYehova laphula imisedare, UYehova waphula imisedare yaseLebhanon.

6.verse: Uyidlobisa njengenkonyana, ILebhanon neSiriyon njengethole lenqu.

7.verse: Izwi likaYehova lilenyise okwamalangatye omlilo,

8.verse: Izwi likaYehova liyenza isaqhwithi intlango, UYehova uyenza isaqhwithi intlango yaseKadeshe.

9.verse: Izwi likaYehova lizuzisa amaxhamakazi, Lihlube amahlathi;  Etempileni yakhe into yonke iphela ithi, Luzuko!

10.verse: UYehova wahlala kunogumbe, UYehova uhleli enguKumkani ngonaphakade.

11.verse: UYehova uya kubanika abantu bakhe amandla; UYehova uya kubasikelela abantu bakhe ngoxolo.

1.verse: Umhobe: ingoma yokusungulwa kwayo indlu. EkaDavide. Ndiya kukuphakamisa, Yehova, kuba undirholile wandinyusa,  Akwazivuyisa iintshaba zam ngam.

2.verse: Yehova, Thixo wam, Ndazibika kuwe, wandiphilisa;

3.verse: Yehova, uwunyusile kwelabafileyo umphefumlo wam, Wandidlisa ubomi, ukuba ndingehli ndiye emhadini.

4.verse: Mbetheleni uhadi uYehova, nina bakhe benceba, Nibulele isikhumbuzo sakhe esingcwele,

5.verse: Ngokuba yinto yephanyazo umsindo wakhe, Itarhu lakhe liyinto yobomi; Ngokuhlwa kulalisa ukulila, Kusasa kubakho ukumemelela.

6.verse: Ke mna ndathi ebunqobeni bam, Andiyi kushukunyiswa naphakade.

7.verse: Yehova, enkolosekweni yakho ubuyiqinisile intaba yam;  Ubusithelisile ubuso bakho, ndakhwankqiswa.

8.verse: Ndadanduluka kuwe, Yehova, Ndakhunga kuYehova:

9.verse: Ndathi, Kukho nzuzo yani na egazini lam, ekuhleni kwam ndiye esihogweni? Lokudumisa na uthuli? loyixela na inyaniso yakho?

10.verse: Yiva, Yehova, undibabale; Yehova, yiba ngumncedi wam.

11.verse: Wakuguqula ukulila kwam, kwaba kukuqamba; Wandikhulula ezirhwexayo, wandibhinqisa uvuyo,

12.verse: Ukuze uzuko lwam luvume ngawe, lungathi cwaka. Yehova,  Thixo wam, ndiya kubulela kuwe ngonaphakade.

1.verse: Kumongameli. Umhobe kaDavide. Ndizimela ngawe, Yehova,  mandingaze ndidaniswe; Ndisize ngobulungisa bakho.

2.verse: Ndithobele indlebe yakho, ungxame undihlangule; Yiba liliwa eliligwiba kum, Indlu yemboniselo yokundisindisa.

3.verse: Ngokuba ingxondorha yam nemboniselo yam nguwe; Ngenxa yegama lakho uya kundikhapha undithundeze.

4.verse: Uya kundirhola esibatheni ababesigqumele mna, Ngokuba uyinqaba yam.

5.verse: Ndiwuyaleza umoya wam esandleni sakho; Uyandikhulula,  Yehova, Thixo wenyaniso.

6.verse: Ndibathiyile abagcine amampunge angento yanto. Ndikholose ngoYehova mna.

7.verse: Ndiya kugcoba ndivuye ngenceba yakho, Ngenxa enokuba uzibonile iintsizi zam, Wazazi iingxingongo zomphefumlo wam;

8.verse: Akwandivingcela ngesandla seentshaba, Wazimisa endaweni ebanzi iinyawo zam.

9.verse: Ndibabale, Yehova, ngokuba ndibandezelekile; Lonakele kukukhathazeka iliso lam, nomphefumlo wam, nesisu sam;

10.verse: Ngokuba buphelile sisingqala ubomi bam, Neminyaka yam kukuncwina; Ayagexa amandla am ngobugwenxa bam, Namathambo am aluphele.

11.verse: Ngenxa yababandezeli bam bonke ndaba sisingcikivo,  Ngokukodwa kubamelwane bam; ndaba yinto yokunkwantyisa kwabandaziyo; Abandibonayo ngaphandle baya ndibaleka.

12.verse: Ndilityelwe njengomfi ongasakhunjulwayo; Ndinjengesitya esiza kulahlwa.

13.verse: Ngokuba ndive intlebendwane yabaninzi, Ukunxunguphala ngeenxa zonke. Ekugquguleni kwabo ngam, Bankqangiyela ukuthabatha umphefumlo wam.

14.verse: Ke mna ndikholose ngawe, Yehova; Ndithi, UnguThixo wam wena.

15.verse: Asesandleni sakho amaxesha am; Ndihlangule esandleni seentshaba zam nakwabandisukelayo.

16.verse: Khanyisa ubuso bakho phezu komkhonzi wakho; Ndisindise ngenceba yakho.

17.verse: Yehova, andiyi kudana, ngokuba ndinqula wena; Makudane abangendawo, bathi cwaka kwelabafileyo.

18.verse: Mawubotshwe umlomo wobuxoki, Othetha ngelungisa ngokusa,  Unekratshi, udela.

19.verse: Hayi, ubukhulu bokulunga kwakho, obuqwebele abakoyikayo,  Obenzela abazimela ngawe, ebusweni boonyana babantu!

20.verse: Ubasithelisa esitheni lobuso bakho kumayelenqe abantu;  Uyabagusha emnqubeni ekubambaneni kweelwimi.

21.verse: Makabongwe uYehova, Ngokuba endenzele inceba ebalulekileyo emzini onqabileyo.

22.verse: Ke mna ndathi ekuphakuzeleni kwam, Ndinqanyulwe andabakho emehlweni akho. Waliva noko izwi lokukhunga kwam ekuzibikeni kwam kuwe.

23.verse: Thandani uYehova, nonke nina bakhe benceba; NguYehova umlondolozi wabanyanisileyo, Umphindezeli ngokukhulu kowenza ngekratshi.

24.verse: Yomelelani, ikhaliphe intliziyo yenu Nonke nina nithembele kuYehova.

1.verse: EkaDavide. Eyokuqiqa. Hayi, uyolo lwakhe olukreqo luxolelweyo, osono siselelweyo!

2.verse: Hayi, uyolo lomntu angabubaleliyo uYehova kuye ubugwenxa,  Ekungekho kukhohlisa emoyeni wakhe!

3.verse: Ndithi ndakuthi cwaka, aluphale amathambo am Ngokubhonga kwam imihla yonke.

4.verse: Ngokuba imini nobusuku, besinzima phezu kwam isandla sakho,  Baguquka ubumanzi bam, baba kukubalela kwasehlotyeni.  (Phakamisani.)

5.verse: Ndikwazisile isono sam, ubugwenxa bam andabugquma; Ndathi,  Ndoluvuma ukreqo lwam kuYehova; Wabuxolela ke wena ubugwenxa besono sam. (Phakamisani.)

6.verse: Ngenxa yoko mabathandaze kuwe bonke abenceba ngexesha lokukufumana; Inene, ekukhukuleni kwamanzi amaninzi Akayi kufika kubo.

7.verse: Wena uyindawo yokuzimela kwam; uyandilondoloza embandezelweni, Undingqonge ngomemelelo lokusiza.  (Phakamisani.)

8.verse: Ndiya kukuqiqisa ndikuyalele indlela owohamba ngayo: Ndiya kukucebisa, iliso lam likuwe.

9.verse: Musani ukuba njengamahashe, njengoondlebende, ukungabi nangqondo; Abazivatho zingumkhala, neentambo zokubabopha umlomo; Bengenazo abasayi kusondela kuwe.

10.verse: Mkhulu umvandedwa wongendawo; Ke okholosa ngoYehova, yena uya kumjikela ngenceba.

11.verse: Vuyani kuYehova, nigcobe, nina malungisa, Nimemelele, nina nonke bantliziyo zithe tye.

1.verse: Memelelani kuYehova, nina malungisa; Ibafanele abathe tye indumiso.

2.verse: Bulelani kuYehova ngohadi, Mbetheleni umrhubhe ontambo zilishumi.

3.verse: Mvumeleni ingoma entsha, Nilungise ukubetha ngelokuduma;

4.verse: Nokuba lithe tye ilizwi likaYehova, Konke akwenzayo kuthembekile.

5.verse: Ngumthandi wobulungisa nokusesikweni, Lizele ihlabathi yinceba kaYehova.

6.verse: Lenzeka ngelizwi likaYehova izulu, Umkhosi walo lonke ngomoya womlomo wakhe.

7.verse: Ulobutha njengemfumba amanzi olwandle, Ulobeka koovimba amanzi enzonzobila.

8.verse: Malimoyike uYehova lonke ihlabathi, Bamhlonele bonke abemi belimiweyo;

9.verse: Ngokuba wathetha, kwabakho; Wawisa umthetho yena, kwema.

10.verse: UYehova ulitshitshisile icebo leentlanga; Uzalele iingcinga zezizwe.

11.verse: Icebo likaYehova limi ngonaphakade, Iingcinga zentliziyo yakhe kwizizukulwana ngezizukulwana.

12.verse: Hayi, uyolo lohlanga oluThixo walo unguYehova; Lwabantu abanyulileyo, baba lilifa kuye.

13.verse: Uqondele esemazulwini uYehova; Uyababona bonke oonyana babantu;

14.verse: Esendaweni yakhe yokuhlala, wondele Kubemi bonke behlabathi:

15.verse: Ulobumba ngakunye intliziyo yabo, Uloqonda zonke izenzo zabo.

16.verse: Akukho kumkani osindiswa yimpi enkulu; Igorha alihlangulwa ngamandla alo amakhulu.

17.verse: Liyaxoka ihashe ukuba lingasindisa, Nangamandla alo amakhulu alinakusiza.

18.verse: Yabona, iliso likaYehova likubo abamoyikayo, Abalindele inceba yakhe,

19.verse: Ukuba awuhlangule ekufeni umphefumlo wabo, Abagcine ngexesha lendlala.

20.verse: Umphefumlo wethu ulindele kuYehova; Nguye uncedo lwethu,  nengweletshetshe yethu.

21.verse: Ngokuba iya kuvuya ngaye intliziyo yethu, Sikholosile nje ngegama lakhe elingcwele.

22.verse: Inceba yakho mayibe phezu kwethu, Yehova, Njengoko sikulindeleyo kuwe.

1.verse: EkaDavide; oko wazenza ophambene ingqondo phambi koAbhimeleki, waza yena wamgxotha, wahamba. Ndiya kumbonga uYehova ngamaxesha onke, Ihlale isemlonyeni wam indumiso yakhe.

2.verse: Uya kuqhayisa umphefumlo wam ngoYehova; Bova abalulamileyo,  bavuye.

3.verse: Menzeni mkhulu kunye nam uYehova, Siliphakamise kunye igama lakhe.

4.verse: Ndamfuna uYehova, wandiphendula; Wandihlangula kwiinto zonke endinxunguphala zizo.

5.verse: Babheka kuye, bakhazimla; Ubuso babo ababa nazintloni.

6.verse: Usizana lwadanduluka, weva uYehova, Walusindisa ezimbandezelweni zalo zonke.

7.verse: Isithunywa sikaYehova sibangqinga ngeenxa zonke abamoyikayo, Sibahlangule.

8.verse: Yivani, nibone ukuba ulungile uYehova. Hayi, uyolo lomfo ozimela ngaye!

9.verse: Moyikeni uYehova, nina bangcwele bakhe, Ngokuba abanakuswela abamoyikayo.

10.verse: Iingonyama ezintsha ziyaswela, zilambe; Ke bona abamfunayo uYehova abasweli nanye into elungileyo.

11.verse: Yizani, bonyana, phulaphulani kum; Ndonifundisa ukoyika uYehova.

12.verse: Ngubani na umntu obungxameleyo ubomi, Othanda imihla yokubona okulungileyo?

13.verse: Gcina ulwimi lwakho ebubini, Umlomo wakho ungathethi nkohliso.

14.verse: Suka ebubini, wenze okulungileyo; Funa uxolo, uluphuthume.

15.verse: Amehlo kaYehova akumalungisa, Iindlebe zakhe zisekuzibikeni kwawo.

16.verse: Ubuso bukaYehova bujonge abenzi bokubi, Ukuba akunqumle ehlabathini ukukhunjulwa kwabo.

17.verse: Akhala, weva uYehova; Wawahlangula ezimbandezelweni zawo zonke.

18.verse: Usondele uYehova kwabantliziyo zaphukileyo, Abasindise abamoya utyumkileyo.

19.verse: Buninzi ububi obulihlelayo ilungisa, Ke uYehova ulihlangula kubo bonke.

20.verse: Uyawagcina onke amathambo alo, Akwaphuki nalinye kuwo.

21.verse: Ububi buyambulala ongendawo; Abathiyi belungisa bayalithwala ityala.

22.verse: UYehova uyawukhulula umphefumlo wabakhonzi bakhe,  Bangathwali tyala bonke abazimela ngaye.

1.verse: EkaDavide. Bambana, Yehova, nababambana nam. Yilwa nabalwa nam.

2.verse: Qubula ikhaka nengweletshetshe, Usukume undincede.

3.verse: Rhola umkhonto, uvingce indlela yabandisukelayo; Yithi kumphefumlo wam, Ndilusindiso lwakho.

4.verse: Mabadane, bahlazeke, abazungula umphefumlo wam; Mababuye umva babe neentloni abacinga ububi ngam.

5.verse: Mababe njengomququ phambi komoya, Sibatyhale isithunywa sikaYehova, bawe.

6.verse: Indlela yabo mayibe mnyama, ibe buthelezi, Sibasukele isithunywa sikaYehova.

7.verse: Ngokuba basigqumele mna isibatha sabo ngelize; Bawumbela isihogo umphefumlo wam ngelize.

8.verse: Mayimfikele intshabalalo engazi; Sibambise yena isibatha sakhe awasigqumayo, Eyele kuso ngesithonga.

9.verse: Wogcoba ke umphefumlo wam kuYehova, Ube nemihlali ngosindiso lwakhe.

10.verse: Onke amathambo am aya kuthi, Yehova, ngubani na onjengawe,  Mhlanguli wosizana kowomeleleyo kunalo, Kwausizana nehlwempu kumxhakamfuli walo?

11.verse: Kusuke kwema amangqina angenakulungisa, Andibuza into endingayaziyo,

12.verse: Bandibuyekeza ngobubi esikhundleni sokulungileyo;  Uxhwalekile umphefumlo wam.

13.verse: Ke mna, xa babesifa, iingubo zam bezizezirhwexayo;  Ndawucinezela umphefumlo wam ngokuzila ukudla; Umthandazo wam wabuyela esifubeni sam.

14.verse: Ndaziphatha njengokungathi unguwethu, njengokungathi ungumzalwana kum, ukuhamba-hamba kwam; Ndanga ndingombambazelela unina, ukuthobeka kwam, ndinezimnyama zokuzila.

15.verse: Ke ekuqhwaleleni kwam avuya, ahlangana, Ahlangana ngam amagxidolo, nendingabaziyo, Bandihlalela ngentlamba, abayeka.

16.verse: Ngokweentshembenxa ezizihiba ngenxa yesonka,  Banditshixizela amazinyo.

17.verse: Nkosi, kunini na ubonela? Buyisa umphefumlo wam kwiintshabalaliso zabo, Okuphela kwawo ezingonyameni.

18.verse: Ndiya kubulela kuwe ebandleni elikhulu, Ebantwini abaninzi ndiya kukudumisa.

19.verse: Mazingandivuyeleli iintshaba zam ngobuxoki,  Bangatyandelani ngoshiyi abandithiyayo ngelize:

20.verse: Ngokuba abathethi luxolo; Bacinga amazwi enkohliso ngabanyhamnyhekileyo belizwe.

21.verse: Bayandisinekela, Bathi, Tshotsho! Tshotsho! Abonile amehlo ethu.

22.verse: Ubonile, Yehova; musa ukuba sisithulu; Nkosi, musa ukuba kude kum.

23.verse: Zivuse, uphaphe ngenxa yebango lam, Thixo wam, Nkosi yam,  ngenxa yento esibambene ngayo.

24.verse: Lithethe ityala lam ngokobulungisa bakho, Yehova Thixo wam; Mabangandivuyeleli;

25.verse: Mabangathi entliziyweni yabo, Tshotsho! Nantso into ebe siyfuna! Mabangathi, Simginyile.

26.verse: Mabadane, babe neentloni kunye Abavuyela ububi bam;  Bambathe ukudana nehlazo Abazikhulisayo kunam.

27.verse: Mabamemelele, bavuye, abananze ubulungisa bam, Bahlale besithi, Makabe mkhulu uYehova, Ulonanze uxolo lomkhonzi wakhe.

28.verse: Ulwimi lwam luya kuxela ubulungisa bakho Nendumiso yakho,  imihla yonke.

1.verse: Kumongameli. Eyomkhonzi kaYehova. EkaDavide. Ongendawo unezihlabo zokreqo entliziyweni yakhe ngaphakathi, ezithi,  Akukho koyika Thixo emehlweni akhe,

2.verse: Ngokuba zithetha kuye ngokugudileyo emehlweni akhe, Zide zimfumanise ubugwenxa bakhe, zimthiye.

3.verse: Amazwi omlomo wakhe abubutshinga nenkohliso; Uyekile ukwenza ngokuqiqa nangokulungisa.

4.verse: Ucinga ubutshinga elukhukweni lwakhe; Uzimisa endleleni engalungileyo; Akabucekisi ububi.

5.verse: Yehova, inceba yakho ifikelela ezulwini, Ukuthembeka kwakho esibhakabhakeni.

6.verse: Ubulungisa bakho bunjengeentaba zikaThixo; Izigwebo zakho zingamanzi enzonzobila; Usindisa umntu neenkomo, Yehova.

7.verse: Hayi, ixabiso lenceba yakho, Thixo! Oonyana babantu bazimela ngethunzi lamaphiko akho.

8.verse: Bayahluthiswa kukutyeba kwendlu yakho; Ubaseza emlanjeni weziyolo zakho.

9.verse: Ngokuba likuwe ithende lobomi; Ekukhanyeni kwakho sibona ukukhanya.

10.verse: Bolulele inceba yakho abakwaziyo, Ubolulele ubulungisa bakho abantliziyo zithe tye.

11.verse: Malungandinyatheli unyawo lonekratshi. Singandiphekuzi isandla sabangendawo.

12.verse: Nabo bewile abasebenzi bobutshinga; Batyhalwe bawa, ababa nakuvuka.

1.verse: EkaDavide. Musa ukuzivuthisa ngomsindo ngabenzi bobubi;  Musa ukubamonela abenzi bobugqwetha.

2.verse: Ngokuba baya kusikwa kamsinyane njengengca, Babune njengohlaza oluphumayo.

3.verse: Kholosa ngoYehova, wenze okulungileyo; Lime ilizwe,  ulandelane nokuthembeka.

4.verse: Ziyolise ngoYehova; Wokunika okunqwenelwa yintliziyo yakho.

5.verse: Yiyekele kuYehova indlela yakho, Ukholose ngaye;  wokwenzela,

6.verse: Abuvelise njengokukhanya ubulungisa bakho, Nebango lakho njengemini enkulu.

7.verse: Yithi cwaka kuYehova, ulindele kuye; Musa ukuzivuthisa ngomsindo ngonempumelelo ngendlela yakhe, Ngomntu ofeza amayelenqe.

8.verse: Lahla umsindo, ushiye ubushushu; Musa ukuzivuthisa ngomsindo, kuba oko kusingisa ekwenzeni ububi kuphela.

9.verse: Ngokuba abenzi bobubi baya kunqunyulwa; Ke bona abamthembayo uYehova, baya kulidla ilifa ilizwe.

10.verse: Kusaya kuba mzuzwana, angabikho ongendawo; Uthi wakuyikhangela indawo yakhe, angabikho.

11.verse: Ke bona abalulamileyo baya kulidla ilifa ilizwe,  Baziyolise ngobuninzi boxolo.

12.verse: Ongendawo ulenzela amayelenqe ilungisa, Ulitshixizela amazinyo akhe.

13.verse: INkosi iyamhleka, Ngokuba ibona ukuba iyeza imini yakhe.

14.verse: Barhole ikrele abangendawo, bagobe isaphetha sabo, Ukuba bawise usizana nehlwempu, Basike abandlela zithe tye.

15.verse: Ikrele labo liya kungena kwakweyabo intliziyo, Zaphuke izaphetha zabo.

16.verse: Ilungile intwana elinayo ilungisa, Kunentabalala abanayo abangendawo abaninzi:

17.verse: Ngokuba iingalo zabangendawo ziya kwaphulwa; NguYehova umxhasi wamalungisa.

18.verse: NguYehova umazi wemihla yabagqibeleleyo, Nelifa labo liya kuba ngunaphakade.

19.verse: Abayi kudana ngexesha lobubi; Baya kuhlutha ngeemini zendlala:

20.verse: Ngokuba abangendawo bayatshabalala; Iintshaba zikaYehova zinjengobuhle bamadlelo; Ziya kuphela njengomsi, ziphele.

21.verse: Uyaboleka ongendawo, angabuyisi; Ke lona ilungisa liyababala, liphe.

22.verse: Ngokuba abasikelelweyo nguye baya kulidla ilifa ilizwe,  Banqanyulwe abatshabhisiweyo nguye.

23.verse: Amanyathela omfo aqiniswa nguYehova, Ayithande indlela yakhe.

24.verse: Ewile, akayi kuqungquluza, Ngokuba nguYehova umxhasi wesandla sakhe.

25.verse: Ndaka ndamtsha, kungokunje ndimdala; Ukanti andizanga ndilibone ilungisa lishiywa, Nembewu yalo ivukela ukutya.

26.verse: Imihla yonke liyababala, liboleke abanye; Nembewu yalo iyintsikelelo.

27.verse: Suka ebubini, wenze okulungileyo, Uhlale ngonaphakade.

28.verse: Ngokuba uYehova uthanda okusesikweni, Angabashiyi abenceba bakhe; Bagciniwe ngonaphakade: Ke yona imbewu yongendawo iyanqanyulwa.

29.verse: Amalungisa aya kulidla ilifa ilizwe, Ahlale kulo ngonaphakade.

30.verse: Umlomo welungisa uxela ubulumko, Nolwimi lwalo luthetha okusesikweni.

31.verse: Umyalelo woThixo walo usentliziyweni yalo; Akayi kuhexa amanyathela alo.

33.verse: UYehova akalinikeli esandleni sakhe, Angaligwebi ekuthethweni kwetyala lalo.

34.verse: Thembela kuYehova, ugcine indlela yakhe; Wokuphakamisa,  ulidle ilifa ilizwe; Ekunqanyulweni kongendawo wobonela.

35.verse: Ndimbonile ongendawo, oyingqwangangqwili, Exanda njengomthi omilileyo, uluhlaza;

36.verse: Kwadlula umntu, nanko engasekho; Ndamfuna, akafumaneka.

37.verse: Gcina ogqibeleleyo, ukhangele othe tye; Ngokuba izivela-mva zezomntu woxolo.

38.verse: Ke bona abangendawo batshatyalaliswa kuphele; Izivela-mva zongendawo ziyanqanyulwa.

39.verse: Usindiso lwamalungisa luphuma kuYehova; Uligwiba lawo ngexesha lembandezelo.

40.verse: UYehova uyawanceda, awasindise, Awasindise kongendawo,  awasindise, Ngokuba azimela ngaye.

1.verse: Umhobe kaDavide: eyokukhumbuza. Yehova, musa ukundohlwaya unoburhalarhume, Ungandithethisi unobushushu:

2.verse: Ngokuba iintolo zakho zitshone kum, Sehla kanzima kum isandla sakho.

3.verse: Akukho ndawo iphilileyo enyameni yam, ngenxa yokubhavuma kwakho; Akukho kuphila emathanjeni am, ngenxa yezono zam.

4.verse: Ngokuba ubugwenxa bam bugqithile entlokweni yam, Bundisinda njengomthwalo onzima.

5.verse: Iyanuka, iyabhiqiza imivumbo yam, Ngenxa yokumatha kwam.

6.verse: Ndiyapenapena, ndisibekeke kakhulu; Yonke imini ndihamba-hamba ngezimnyama zokuzila.

7.verse: Ngokuba kuyatshisa emihlubulweni yam, Akukho ndawo iphilileyo enyameni yam.

8.verse: Ndiqobekile, ndityumkile kakhulu; Ndibhongiswa kukugcuma kwentliziyo yam.

9.verse: Nkosi yam, uphambi kwakho wonke umnqweno wam, Nokuncwina kwam akusithele kuwe.

10.verse: Iphaphu lam liyabetha, ndiphelelwe ngamandla; Ukukhanya kwamehlo am, nako oko, akukho kum.

11.verse: Abandithandayo nowethu bamele mgama ekubethweni kwam,  Nezalamane zam zimi kude.

12.verse: Bandithiyele abafuna umphefumlo wam; Abangxamele ukuba ndihlelwe bububi bathetha izinto zokweyelisela, Bacamanga inkohliso imini yonke.

13.verse: Ke mna ndinjengesithulu, andiva; Njengesidenge esingawuvuliyo umlomo waso.

14.verse: Ndinjengomntu ongeva nto, Omlomo ungenakuthethisa.

15.verse: Ngokuba ndilindele kuwe, Yehova; Kuya kuphendula wena,  Nkosi yam, Thixo wam,

16.verse: Ngokuba ndithi, Hleze bandivuyelele Bona abo bangazikhulisayo kum ekutyibilikeni konyawo lwam.

17.verse: Ngokuba ndihlalele ukujingxela, Umvandedwa wam uphambi kwam amaxesha onke.

18.verse: Ngokuba ndiya kubuxela ubugwenxa bam; Ndinesithukuthezi ngenxa yesono sam.

19.verse: Ke zona iintshaba zam ziphilile, ziziimfidi; Baninzi abandithiyileyo bexoka;

20.verse: Abandibuyekeza ngobubi esikhundleni sokulungileyo Bayandichasa, ngenxa yokuphuthuma kwam okulungileyo.

21.verse: Musa ukundishiya, Yehova; Thixo wam, musa ukuba kude nam.

22.verse: Khawuleza undincede, Nkosi yam, Msindisi wam.

1.verse: Kumongameli, kuYedutun. Umhobe kaDavide. Ndathi, Ndiya kuzigcina iindlela zam, Ndingoni ngolwimi lwam; Ndiya kuwugcina ngokuwubopha umlomo wam, Xa ongendawo asephambi kwam.

2.verse: Ndaba sisidenge, ndathozama, Ndazisulungisa nakokulungileyo; Wagxobha-gxobheka umvandedwa wam.

3.verse: Yaba nobushushu intliziyo yam phakathi kwam, Ekucamangeni kwam wavutha umlilo. Ndathetha ke ngolwimi lwam,

4.verse: Ndathi, Ndazise, Yehova, isiphelo sam, Nomlinganiso wemihla yam, into oyiyo; Mandikwazi ukunqamka kwam, into okuyiyo.

5.verse: Yabona, uyenze imihla yam yangangobubanzi besandla; Nobomi bam bunjengento engento phambi kwakho; Ngumphunga nje bonke abantu, nakuba bemi. (Phakamisani.)

6.verse: Uhamba-hamba umntu enjengesithunzi nje kodwa; Baxokozela ngomphunga nje kodwa; Bafumba, bengazi ukuba ngubani na oya kukuhlanganisa.

7.verse: Ngoku ndiya kuthembela kwintoni na, Nkosi yam? Ukulinda kwam kukuwe.

8.verse: Ndihlangule elukreqweni lwam lonke; Musa ukundimisela ingcikivo yesidenge.

9.verse: Ndisisidenge, umlomo wam andiwuvuli, Ngokuba oko kwenziwe nguwe.

10.verse: Sisuse kum isibetho sakho; Mna ndiyaphela kukutyundyutha kwesandla sakho.

11.verse: Wakumthethisa umntu ngezohlwayo ngenxa yobugwenxa,  Uyasonakalisa njengenundu isoya sakhe; Bangumphunga nje kodwa bonke abantu. (Phakamisani.)

12.verse: Yiva umthandazo wam, Yehova, Kubekele indlebe ukuzibika kwam. Musa ukuthi tu ezinyembezini zam; Ngokuba ndingumphambukeli kuwe, Undwendwe, njengoobawo bonke.

13.verse: Bheka phaya, ungandikhangeli, khendincumeze, Ndingekemki ndingabi sabakho.

1.verse: Kumongameli. Umhobe kaDavide. Ndathembela, ndithembele kuYehova, Wathoba, wakuva ukuzibika kwam.

2.verse: Wandirhola emhadini wentshabalalo, naseludakeni lomgxobhozo, Wazimisa eliweni iinyawo zam, wakuqinisa ukunyathela kwam.

3.verse: Wabeka emlonyeni wam ingoma entsha, indumiso kuThixo wethu;  Abaninzi bayabona, boyike, Bakholose ngoYehova.

4.verse: Hayi, uyolo lwendoda emenze uYehova inkoloseko yayo,  Ingabheki kwabagwagwisayo, nakubanxaxhi abanamanga!

5.verse: Yehova, Thixo wam, wena wenze okuninzi ngemisebenzi yakho ebalulekileyo, Nangeengcinga zakho kuthi; Akukho nto inokulinganiswa nawe; Okanye bendiya kuyixela, ndithethe ngayo;  Ke ziyinkohla engenakubalwa.

6.verse: Akunanze mbingelelo namnikelo wakudla; Iindlebe zam uzivulile; Akubizi dini linyukayo nadini lasono.

7.verse: Ndaza ndathi, Yabona, Ndiyeza; encwadini esongwayo kubhaliwe ngam.

8.verse: Ukwenza okulikholo kuwe, Thixo wam, ndikunanzile; Nomyalelo wakho usezibilinini zam ngaphakathi.

9.verse: Ndashumayela iindaba ezilungileyo zobulungisa ebandleni elikhulu; Yabona, andiwuthintelanga umlomo wam; Yehova, wena uyazi.

10.verse: Ubulungisa bakho andibugqumanga phakathi kwentliziyo yam;  Ndakukhankanya ukuthembeka kwakho nosindiso lwakho;  Andiyikhanyelanga inceba yakho nenyaniso yakho ebandleni elikhulu.

11.verse: Wena, Yehova, akuyi kuzithintela iimfesane zakho kum;  Inceba yakho nenyaniso yakho iya kuhlala indilondoloza.

12.verse: Ngokuba zindijikele izinto ezimbi, ezide azaba nakubalwa;  Bundifikele ubugwenxa bam, andinakubukhangela; Buninzi kuneenwele zentloko yam; Ndimkelwe yintliziyo.

13.verse: Ngamana, Yehova, wandihlangula; Yehova, wakhawuleza wandinceda!

14.verse: Mabadane babe neentloni kuphele Abazungula umphefumlo wam ukuze bawuphephethe; Mababuye muva bahlazeke

15.verse: Mabamangaliswe ngumvuzo wehlazo labo Abathi kum, Tshotsho!  Tshotsho!

16.verse: Mababe nemihlali bavuye ngawe bonke abakufunayo,  Abaluthandayo usindiso lwakho bahlale besithi, Makenziwe mkhulu uYehova.

17.verse: Mna ke ndilusizana, ndilihlwempu; INkosi iya kundikhumbulela. Umncedi wam nomsindisi wam nguwe; Thixo wam,  musa ukulibala.

1.verse: Kumongameli. Umhobe kaDavide. Hayi, uyolo lwalowo unyamekela ihlwempu! Ngomhla wobubi uYehova uya kumhlangula.

2.verse: UYehova uya kumlondoloza amgcine, aphile. Kuya kuthiwa unoyolo yena ehlabathini; Ungamnikeli elitheni leentshaba zakhe.

3.verse: UYehova uya kumxhasa elukhukweni lobulwelwe; Uya kuluguqula ukhuko lwakhe lonke esifeni sakhe.

4.verse: Ndithi mna, Yehova, tarhu; Philisa umphefumlo wam, ngokuba ndonile kuwe.

5.verse: Iintshaba zam zithetha kakubi ngam; Zithi, Uya kufa nini na, lidake igama lakhe?

6.verse: Nothe weza kundilunguza, uthetha into ekhohlakeleyo;  Intliziyo yakhe ibutha ubutshinga; Uphuma phandle, abuthethe.

7.verse: Basebezelana ngam bonke abandithiyayo; Bacinga ububi ngam.

8.verse: Bathi, Unanyekwe bubutshijolo, Engoleleyo nje, akayi kubuya avuke.

9.verse: Kwanendoda ebixolelene nam, ebe ndikholose ngayo, Ebisidla isonka sam, indiphakamisele isithende sayo.

10.verse: Wena Yehova, ndibabale, undiphakamise, Ndibabuyekeze.

11.verse: Ndazi ngale nto, ukuba undinonelele, Yokokuba lungenakundidumela utshaba lwam.

12.verse: Mna ekugqibeleleni kwam uyandixhasa, Undimisa phambi kwakho ngonaphakade.

13.verse: Makabongwe uYehova, uThixo kaSirayeli, kususela kwaphakade kude kuse ephakadeni. Amen, amen.

1.verse: Kumongameli: eyokuqiqa; eyoonyana bakaKora. Njengexhama elitsalela emifuleni yamanzi, Wenjenjalo ukutsalela kuwe,  Thixo, umphefumlo wam.

2.verse: Umphefumlo wam unxanela uThixo, uThixo ophilileyo; Ndiya kufika nini na, ndibonakale ebusweni bukaThixo?

3.verse: Iinyembezi zam zaba kukudla kwam imini nobusuku, Bakuthi kum imihla yonke, Uphi na uThixo wakho?

4.verse: Ndikhumbula oku, ndiwuphalazela kum umphefumlo wam,  Ukuhamba kwam nezihlwele ndisiya endlwini kaThixo, Sinezwi lokumemelela nokubulela, siyingxokolo evuyayo.

5.verse: Kungani na ukuba usibekeke, mphefumlo wam; Kungani na ukuba ugule ngaphakathi kwam? Lindela kuThixo, ngokuba ndisaya kubuya ndibulele kuye, Olusindiso lobuso bam, noThixo wam.

6.verse: Thixo wam, umphefumlo wam usibekekile kum; ngenxa yoko ndikhumbula wena Ezweni laseYordan, nakweleHermon, entabeni yeMitsare.

7.verse: Amanzi anzongonzongo abiza amanzi anzongonzongo ngesandi seengxangxasi zakho; Onke amaza akho alwayo, amaza akho agugumayo, adlule phezu kwam.

8.verse: Emini uYehova uya kuyiwisela umthetho inceba yakhe,  Nasebusuku ukuvuma ngaye kunam, Ukuthandaza kuThixo wobomi bam.

9.verse: Ndithi ke kuThixo oyingxondorha yam, Undilibele ngani na?  Ndihambelani na ngezimnyama zokuzila ngokuxina kotshaba?

10.verse: Ngento ephehlayo emathanjeni am, bayandingcikiva abandibandezelayo, Ngokuthi kwabo kum imihla yonke, Uphi na uThixo wakho?

11.verse: Kungani na ukuba usibekeke, mphefumlo wam; Kungani na ukuba ugule ngaphakathi kwam? Lindela kuThixo, ngokuba ndisaya kubuya ndibulele kuye, Olusindiso lobuso bam, noThixo wam.

1.verse: Lithethe ityala lam, Thixo, ubambane ngenxa yam nohlanga olungenanceba; Ndisindise endodeni ekhohlisayo, enobugqwetha.

2.verse: Ngokuba unguThixo oyinqaba yam; undihlambelani na?  Ndihambelani na ngezimnyama zokuzila, ngokuxina kotshaba?

3.verse: Thuma ukukhanya kwakho nenyaniso yakho, zindikhaphe,  Zindise entabeni yakho engcwele, Naseminqubeni yakho.

4.verse: Ndoya ke esibingelelweni sikaThixo, KuThixo wovuyo lwam olugcobayo, Ndibulele kuwe ngohadi, Thixo onguThixo wam.

5.verse: Kungani na ukuba usibekeke, mphefumlo wam? Kungani na ukuba ugule ngaphakathi kwam? Lindela kuThixo, ngokuba ndisaya kubuya ndibulele kuye, Olusindiso lobuso bam, noThixo wam.

1.verse: Kumongameli: eyoonyana bakaKora: eyokuqiqa. Thixo, sivile ngeendlebe zethu, oobawo basibalisela, Ngomsebenzi owawenza ngemihla yabo, ngemihla yamandulo:

2.verse: Okokuba isandla sakho sagqogqa iintlanga, sabatyala bona;  Saviva izizwe, sabanabisa bona.

3.verse: Ngokuba abalihluthanga ilizwe ngekrele labo,  Abazisindisanga ngengalo yabo; Sisandla sakho sokunene, nengalo yakho, nokukhanya kobuso bakho; Ngokuba wawunesisa kubo.

4.verse: Wena unguKumkani wam, Thixo; Yitsho lubekho usindiso kuYakobi.

5.verse: Ngawe sobangqula abasibandezelayo; Egameni lakho sobagqusha abasukela phezulu kuthi.

6.verse: Ngokuba andikholose ngasaphetha sam; Andisindiswa ngakrele lam.

7.verse: Hayi! Nguwe osisindisayo kwabasibandezelayo, Ubadanise abasithiyileyo.

8.verse: NgoThixo sidumisa imihla yonke, Sibulele kwigama lakho ngonaphakade. (Phakamisani.)

9.verse: Noko ke usihlambile, usihlazile, Akwaphuma nemikhosi yethu.

10.verse: Usibuyise umva phambi kombandezeli; Abasithiyileyo basiphangile okwabo.

11.verse: Wasinikela njengeegusha ezidliwayo; Wasichitha-chitha ezintlangeni;

12.verse: Wathengisa ngabantu bakho, akwazuza, Akwalinyusa ixabiso labo.

13.verse: Wasenza isingcikivo kubamelwane bethu, Isigculelo nesicukucezo kwabasijikelezileyo.

14.verse: Wasenza umzekelo ezintlangeni, Abokuhlunguzelelwa intloko ezizweni.

15.verse: Yonke imihla ihlazo lam liphambi kwam, Nokudana kobuso bam kundigubungele,

16.verse: Ngenxa yezwi lomngcikivi nomnyelisi, Ngenxa yokukhangela kotshaba nomphindezeli.

17.verse: Oko konke kusifikele, asikulibalanga wena, Asixokanga emnqophisweni wakho;

18.verse: Ayibuyanga umva intliziyo yethu, Ukunyathela kwethu akuthanga gu bucala emendweni wakho;

19.verse: Ukuba usityumze endaweni yeempungutye, Usigubungele ngethunzi lokufa.

20.verse: Ukuba besililibele igama loThixo wethu, Sazolulela kuthixo wasemzini izandla zethu,

21.verse: Ubengayi kuyigoca-goca na uThixo loo nto, Ngokuba ezazi iindawo ezifihlakeleyo zentliziyo?

22.verse: Hayi, Ngenxa yakho sibulawa imihla yonke; Kuthiwa siziigusha zokuxhelwa.

23.verse: Vuka, ulaleleni na, Nkosi yam? Qabuka, ungasihlambi kuphele.

24.verse: Ubusitheliselani na ubuso bakho, Ukulibale ukucinezelwa kwethu, nokuxinwa kwethu?

25.verse: Ngokuba usibekeke eluthulini umphefumlo wethu, Sanamathela emhlabeni isisu sethu.

26.verse: Khawusuk ume usincede, Usikhulule ngenxa yenceba yakho.

1.verse: Kumongameli: ngeyeenyibiba. Eyoonyana bakaKora; eyokuqiqa.  Ingoma yeentanda. Intliziyo yam iphuphuma ilizwi elihle,  Ndisithi, Into endiyenzayo isingise kukumkani; Ulwimi lwam lusiba lombhali okhawulezayo.

2.verse: Umhle wamhle ngaphezu koonyana babantu; Kugalelwe ubumnandi emlonyeni wakho; Ngenxa yoko ukusikelele uThixo wakho ngonaphakade.

3.verse: Bhinqa ikrele lakho ethangeni, gorha, Bhinqa indili yakho nobungangamela bakho.

4.verse: Tyhudisa, ukhwele uhambe, unobungangamela bakho, Ngenxa yenyaniso, nolulamo olunobulungisa. Sikuyale ngezinto ezoyikekayo isandla sakho sokunene.

5.verse: Iintolo zakho zitsolile; Kuya kuwa izizwe phantsi kwakho;  Zitsolile entliziyweni yeentshaba zokumkani.

6.verse: Itrone yakho, itrone kaThixo, ingunaphakade kanaphakade;  Yintonga ethe tye intonga yobukumkani bakho.

7.verse: Uthanda ubulungisa, uthiye okungendawo; Ngenxa yoko ukuthambisile uThixo, uThixo wakho, Ngeoli yemihlali ngaphezu kwabalingane bakho.

8.verse: Ziyimore nehaloti nekasiya iingubo zakho zonke; Emabhotweni eempondo zeendlovu uhadi lukuvuyisile.

9.verse: Kukho iintombi zokumkani phakathi kwabathandekayo bakho;  Ukumkanikazi umi ngasekunene kwakho, Enxibe igolide ecikizekileyo yakwaOfire.

10.verse: Yiva, ntombi, ubone, uthobe indlebe yakho, Ubalibale abantu bakowenu, nendlu kayihlo;

11.verse: Akubunqwenela ubunzwakazi bakho ukumkani, Woqubuda kuye,  ngokuba eyinkosi yakho.

12.verse: Intombi enguTire, izityebi zabantu, Ziya kukuncekelela ngomnikelo.

13.verse: Bubuyokoyoko bodwa intombi yokumkani kweliphakathi igumbi.  Isambatho sayo sesilukwe igolide.

14.verse: Isiwa kukumkani ineengubo ezimfakamfele; Ziyilandela iintombi ezingowayo, Zisiwa kuwe,

15.verse: Zisiwa ngovuyo nangomgcobo, Zingene ebhotweni lokumkani.

16.verse: Endaweni yooyihlo iya kuba ngoonyana bakho; Uya kubamisa babe ngabathetheli ehlabathini lonke.

17.verse: Ndiya kulikhankanya igama lakho kwizizukulwana ngezizukulwana zonke; Ngenxa yoko izizwe ziya kubulela kuwe ngonaphakade kanaphakade.

1.verse: Kumongameli: eyoonyana bakaKora; ngeyeentombi. Ingoma.  UThixo ulihlathi, uligwiba kuthi; Ezimbandezelweni ufumaneke eluncedo kunene.

2.verse: Ngenxa yoko asoyiki ekuphendukeni kwehlabathi,  Ekudilikeleni kweentaba esazulwini solwandle.

3.verse: Makagqume alephuze amanzi alo, Iintaba zinyikime ngokukratsha kwalo. (Phakamisani.)

4.verse: Kukho umlambo ozibhaxa zivuyisa umzi kaThixo, Ingcwele yeminquba yOsenyangweni.

5.verse: UThixo uphakathi kwawo, awushukunyiswa; UThixo uyawunceda kwasekuzeni kokusa.

6.verse: Ziyaxokozela iintlanga, ziyashukuma izikumkani: Ukhupha izwi lakhe, linyibilike ihlabathi.

7.verse: UYehova wemikhosi unathi, Ingxonde yethu nguThixo kaYakobi.  (Phakamisani.)

8.verse: Yizani nikhangele imisebenzi kaYehova: Owenze iziphanziso ehlabathini;

9.verse: Ulophelisa iimfazwe kude kuse eziphelweni zehlabathi;  Waphula isaphetha, angqumze umkhonto, Atshise iinqwelo zokulwa ngomlilo.

10.verse: Yekani, nazi ukuba ndinguThixo mna. Ndiya kuphakanyiswa ezintlangeni, ndiya kuphakanyiswa ehlabathini.

11.verse: UYehova wemikhosi unathi, Ingxonde yethu nguThixo kaYakobi. (Phakamisani.)

1.verse: Kumongameli; eyoonyana bakaKora. Umhobe. Nonke zizwe,  bethani izandla, Dumani kuThixo ngezwi lokumemelela.

2.verse: Ngokuba uYehova Osenyangweni uyoyikeka; Ngukumkani omkhulu ehlabathini lonke.

3.verse: Uzikhandanisela phantsi kwethu izizwe, Izizwe phantsi kweenyawo zethu.

4.verse: Usinyulela ilifa lethu, Iqhayiya likaYakobi awamthandayo.  (Phakamisani.)

5.verse: UThixo unyukile, kudunywa; Unyukile uYehova, kuhlokoma isigodlo.

6.verse: Mbetheleni uhadi uThixo, mbetheleni, Mbetheleni uhadi uKumkani wethu, mbetheleni!

7.verse: Ngokuba uKumkani wehlabathi lonke nguThixo; Mbetheleni ngeyokuqiqa.

8.verse: UThixo nguKumkani weentlanga; UThixo uhleli etroneni yakhe engcwele.

9.verse: Amanene ezizwe ahlanganisene, Abantu boThixo ka-Abraham;  Ngokuba iingweletshetshe zehlabathi zezikaThixo; Unyusiwe kakhulu yena.

1.verse: Ingoma. Umhobe. Eyoonyana babaKora. Mkhulu uYehova,  engowokudunyiswa kunene Emzini kaThixo wethu, entabeni yakhe engcwele.

2.verse: Intle ukuphakama kwayo, yimihlali yehla bathi lonke Intaba yaseZiyon, intlomo yasentla, Umzi woKumkani omkhulu.

3.verse: UThixo, ezingxandeni zawo ezinde, Wazelwa ukuba yingxonde.

4.verse: Kuba nabo ookumkani babenqophisene, Bawela beza kunye;

5.verse: Bakuthi ukubona, abakhuluma; Bakhwankqa, babaleka buphuthuphuthu;

6.verse: Babanjwa khona kukuthuthumela, Kukuzibhijabhija njengozalayo.

7.verse: Ngomoya wasempumalanga Uyazivitha iinqanawa zaseTarshishe.

8.verse: Njengoko sikuvileyo, sibone kunjalo Emzini kaYehova wemikhosi, emzini kaThixo wethu: UThixo uyawuzinzisa ngonaphakade. (Phakamisani.)

9.verse: Sayikhumbula, Thixo, inceba yakho Phakathi kwetempile yakho.

10.verse: Njengoko linjalo igama lakho, Thixo, Lunjalo udumiso lwakho, Kwesa eziphelweni zehlabathi; Isandla sakho sokunene sizele bubulungisa.

11.verse: Mayivuye intaba yaseZiyon, Agcobe amagxamesi akwaYuda,  Ngenxa yezigwebo zakho.

12.verse: Yijikelezeni iZiyon, niyizunguleze; Zibaleni iinqaba zayo ezinde.

13.verse: Gqalani ungqameko lomsele wayo; Candani ezingxandeni zayo ezinde; Ukuze nibalisele isizukulwana esizayo,

14.verse: Ukuba lo Thixo nguThixo wethu ngonaphakade kanaphakade,  Yena uya kusikhapha kude kuse ekufeni.

1.verse: Kumongameli: eyoonyana bakaKora. Umhobe. Yivani oku, nina nonke zizwe; Bekani indlebe, nina nonke, bemi beli phakade,

2.verse: Nina nyana boluntu, nani nyana bamadoda, Nina zityebi, nani mahlwempu kunye.

3.verse: Umlomo wam uza kuthetha ubulumko; Nokucamanga kwentliziyo yam kukuqonda.

4.verse: Ndiya kuyithobela emzekelisweni indlebe yam, Ndiya kuyivulela ngohadi intsonkotha yam.

5.verse: Ndoyikelani na emihleni yobubi, Xa ubugwenxa babandibambisayo bundijikelayo?

6.verse: Abo bakholose ngemfuyo yabo, Baqhayisa ngobuninzi bobutyebi babo.

7.verse: Akukho bani unokukhulula umzalwana; Akanakumnika uThixo isicamagusho ngaye

8.verse: (Sinqabile isikhululo somphefumlo wabo, Masincanywe ngonaphakade),

9.verse: Sokuba ahlale esidla ubomi ngamaxesha onke, Angasiboni isihogo.

10.verse: Ngokuba ubona izilumko zibhubha, Bedaka kunye abanyabileyo nezityhakala, Bayishiye nabanye imfuyo yabo.

11.verse: Imbilini yabo ithi izindlu zabo zingunaphakade. Iminquba yabo ikwizizukulwana ngezizukulwana; Bayithiya imihlaba yabo ngamagama abo.

12.verse: Ke umntu enobuhandiba akanakuhlala, Ufana neenkomo ezi zitshabalalayo.

13.verse: Yiyo le indlela yabanyabileyo, Neyabo babalandelayo,  bekholiswa ngumlomo wabo. (Phakamisani.)

14.verse: Babuthe ngokweegusha kwelabafileyo; Ukufa kuyabalusa;  Abathe tye bayabanyathela kwakusa; Isithomo sabo abo siyonakala kwelabafileyo, singabi nandawo yakuhlala.

15.verse: Kodwa uThixo uya kuwukhulula umphefumlo wam esandleni selabafileyo, Ngokuba eya kundithabatha. (Phakamisani.)

16.verse: Musa ukoyika, yakuba sisityebi indoda, Bakwanda ubuqaqawuli bendlu yayo:

17.verse: Ngokuba ekufeni kwayo ayiyi kuthabatha nento, Aluyi kuhla emva kwayo uzuko lwayo.

18.verse: Nakuba umntu ekudleni kwakhe ubomi ebewusikelela umphefumlo wakhe, Bekudumisa ngokuzichwayithisa kwakho,

19.verse: Uya kuya noko esizukulwaneni sooyise; Abayikukubona ukukhanya naphakade.

20.verse: Ke umntu onobuhandiba, abe engaqondi, Ufana neenkomo ezi zitshabalalayo.

1.verse: Umhobe ka-Asafu. UThixo, uThixo uYehova uyathetha;  Uyalibiza ihlabathi, ethabathela ekuphumeni kwelanga esisa ekutshoneni kwalo.

2.verse: EZiyon, ukuphela kweenzwana, Uyakhazimla uThixo.

3.verse: Uyeza uThixo wethu, akayi kuthi cwaka. Kudla umlilo phambi kwakhe, Ngeenxa zonke kuye sisaqhwithi esikhulu.

4.verse: Ubiza izulu phezulu, Nehlabathi, ukuba agwebe phakathi kwabantu bakhe.

5.verse: Uthi, Bahlanganiseleni kum abam benceba, Abenze umnqophiso nam ngombingelelo.

6.verse: Izulu lixela ubulungisa bakhe, Ngokuba uThixo eza kugweba yena. (Phakamisani.)

7.verse: Yivani, bantu bam, ndithethe; Sirayeli, ndiqononondise kuwe; NdinguThixo, uThixo wakho.

8.verse: Andikohlwayi ngenxa yemibingelelo yakho, Namadini akho anyukayo aphambi kwam amaxesha onke.

9.verse: Andiyi kuthabatha zinkunzi zankomo endlwini yakho,  Nazinkunzi zabhokhwe esibayeni sakho.

10.verse: Ngokuba zezam zonke iinyamakazi zehlathi, Neenkomo ezisezintabeni eziliwaka.

11.verse: Iintaka zonke zasezintabeni ndiyazazi, Nento edakasa endle inam.

12.verse: Ukuba bendilambile, ndibe ndingayi kukuxelela; Ngokuba lelam elimiweyo nenzaliseko yalo.

13.verse: Ndidle inyama yeenkunzi eziziimbalasane na? Ndisele igazi leenkunzi zeebhokhwe na?

14.verse: Bingelela kuYehova umbulelo, Uzizalise kOsenyangweni izibhambathiso zakho;

15.verse: Ubize mna ngemini yembandezelo, Ndikuhlangule, undizukise.

16.verse: Ke kongendawo uthi uThixo, Useke phi na wena ukuxela ummiselo wam, Uwuphathe ngomlomo wakho umnqophiso wam,

17.verse: Uyithiyile nje intethiso wena, Uwaphose nje amazwi am emva kwakho?

18.verse: Xa ubona isela, ukholana nalo, Wabelane nabakrexezi.

19.verse: Umlomo wakho uwuyekela ebubini; Ulwimi lwakho luthungela inkohliso;

20.verse: Uthi uhlale uthethe ngomzalwana wakho, Uhlaze umntwana kanyoko.

21.verse: Uzenzile ezo nto, ndathi tu, Waba ndinjengawe. Ndiya kukohlwaya ndizicwangcise emehlweni akho.

22.verse: Khaniqonde ke oko, nina bamlibalayo uThixo, Hleze ndiqwenge, kungabikho uhlangulayo.

23.verse: Obingelela umbulelo uyandizukisa, Alungise indlela,  Endombonisa kuyo usindiso lukaThixo.

1.verse: Kumongameli. Umhobe kaDavide: ekuzeni kukaNatan umprofeti kuye, emveni kokuba ebengene uBhatshebha. Tarhu, Thixo,  ngokwenceba yakho! Ngokobuninzi benceba yakho, cima ukreqo lwam!

2.verse: Ndixovule kunene, busuke ubugwenxa bam, Undihlambulule esonweni sam.

3.verse: Ngokuba ndiyalwazi mna ukreqo lwam, Nesono sam siphambi kwam ngamaxesha onke.

4.verse: Ndonile kuwe, kuwe wedwa, Ndenza okubi emehlweni akho;  Ukuze ube lilungisa ekuthetheni kwakho, Ucace ekugwebeni kwakho.

5.verse: Uyabona, ndizalelwe ebugwenxeni, Ndakhawulwa nguma esonweni.

6.verse: Uyabona, ufuna inyaniso ezintsweni, Esitheni undazisa ubulumko.

7.verse: Ndihlambulule isono ngehisope, ndihlambuluke; Ndixovule,  ndibe mhlophe kunekhephu;

8.verse: Ndivise imihlali nemivuyo, Agcobe amathambo owacolileyo.

9.verse: Sithelisa ubuso bakho ezonweni zam, Ubucime bonke ubugwenxa bam.

10.verse: Dala phakathi kwam, Thixo, intliziyo ehlambulukileyo,  Uhlaziye umoya oqinisekileyo phakathi kwam.

11.verse: Musa ukundilahla ebusweni bakho, UMoya wakho oyiNgcwele ungamsusi kum.

12.verse: Buyisela kum imihlali yosindiso lwakho, Undixhase ngomoya wentumekelelo.

13.verse: Ndobafundisa abangendawo iindlela zakho, Babuyele kuwe aboni.

14.verse: Ndihlangule emagazini, Thixo, Thixo ondisindisayo;  Lomemelela ngobulungisa bakho ulwimi lwam.

15.verse: Nkosi yam, vula imilebe yomlomo wam, Uyixele indumiso yakho umlomo wam.

16.verse: Ngokuba akunanze mibingelelo, bendiya kukunika; Akalikholo kuwe amadini anyukayo.

17.verse: Imibingelelo kaThixo ngumoya owaphukileyo, Intliziyo eyaphukileyo, etyumkileyo, Thixo, akuyi kuyidela.

18.verse: Yenzele okulungileyo iZiyon ngokukholekileyo kuwe; Yakha iindonga zeYerusalem.

19.verse: Kuya kwandula ukuba mnandi kuwe imibingelelo yobulungisa,  amadini apheleleyo; Ziya kwandula ukunyuswa iinkunzi ezintsha zeenkomo esibingelelweni sakho.

1.verse: Kumongameli. Eyokuqiqa: ekaDavide: oko uDowegi umEdom waya waxelela uSawule, wathi kuye, UDavide ungene endlwini ka-Ahimeleki. Uqhayiselani na ngobubi, wena gorha? Inceba kaThixo ikho imihla yonke.

2.verse: Ulwimi lwakho lucinga ukweyelisela, Njengesitshetshe sokuguya iindevu esiloliweyo, wena mkhohlisi.

3.verse: Uthanda okubi kunokulungileyo; Ubuxoki, kunokuthetha ubulungisa. (Phakamisani.)

4.verse: Uthanda onke amazwi aginyayo, Lulwimindini lukhohlisayo.

5.verse: Naye uThixo uya kukudiliza kuphele; Uva kukuxwila,  akuncothule ententeni, Akudonyule ezweni labaphilileyo.  (Phakamisani.)

6.verse: Obona amalungisa, oyike, Amhleke, athi,

7.verse: Nanko umfo ongamenzanga igwiba lakhe uThixo, Owakholosa ngobuninzi bobutyebi bakhe, Waba nengcwangu ekweyeliseleni kwakhe.

8.verse: Ke mna ndinjengomnquma oluhlaza endlwini kaThixo;  Ndikholose ngenceba kaThixo ngonaphakade kanaphakade.

9.verse: Ndiya kubulela kuwe ngonaphakade, kuba ukwenzile oku; Ndiya kuthemba igama lakho, ngokuba lilungile, phambi kwabenceba bakho.

1.verse: Kumongameli: ngeyokhuzo. Eyokuqiqa; ekaDavide. Sithi isidenge entliziyweni yaso, Akukho Thixo. Bonakalisile,  balisikizi ngobugqwetha babo; Akukho wenza okulungileyo.

2.verse: UThixo esemazulwini uqondele koonyana babantu, Ukubona ukuba ukho na oqiqayo, Ofuna uThixo.

3.verse: Bonke babuye umva, bayimbozisa bephelele; Akukho wenza okulungileyo, Akukho nokuba abe mnye.

4.verse: Abanakwazi na abasebenzi bobutshinga, Abathi, bebadla abantu bam, bathi badla isonka, Bangamnquli uThixo?
