5.verse: Apho bankwantya benkwantyile, phofu kungekho nto inkwantyisayo; Ngokuba uThixo wawathi saa amathambo omngqingi wakho; Wabadanisa, ngokuba uThixo ebebacekisile.

6.verse: Akwaba bekuvela eZiyon ukusindiswa kwamaSirayeli!  Ekubuyiseni kukaThixo abantu bakhe ekuthinjweni, Wogcoba uYakobi, avuye uSirayeli.

1.verse: Eyokubethelwa ngezinto ezineentambo. Kumongameli.  Eyokuqiqa. EkaDavide: ekufikeni kwabaseZifi, bathi kuSawule,  UDavide akazimele phakathi kwethu na? Thixo, ndisindise ngegama lakho, Uligwebe ityala lam ngobugorha bakho.

2.verse: Thixo, yiva umthandazo wam; Wabekele indlebe amazwi omlomo wam.

3.verse: Ngokuba abasemzini basukela phezulu kum,  Nabanobungqwangangqwili bafuna umphefumlo wam; Abammisi uThixo phambi kwabo. (Phakamisani.)

4.verse: Yabona, uThixo ngumncedi wam; INkosi yam ikwabasekela umphefumlo wam.

5.verse: Uya kubuyisela ububi kwabandilalelayo; Ngenyaniso yakho babhangise.

6.verse: Ndiya kubingelela kuwe ngokuqhutywa yintliziyo; Ndiya kubulela kwigama lakho, Yehova, kuba lilungile.

7.verse: Ngokuba lindihlangule embandezelweni yonke; Iliso lam libonela iintshaba zam.

1.verse: Kumongameli. Eyokubethelwa ngezinto ezineentambo.  Eyokuqiqa: ekaDavide. Wubekele indlebe umthandazo wam, Thixo,  Musa ukuzifihla esikhungweni sam.

2.verse: Ndibazele indlebe undiphendule. Ndiyaphaphatheka ekucamngceni kwam, ndincwine,

3.verse: Ngenxa yelizwi lotshaba, Ngenxa yokuxinzelelwa phantsi ngabangendawo; Ngokuba zindiqengqela ubutshinga, Ziyandisukela ngomsindo.

4.verse: Intliziyo yam iyazibhija-bhija phakathi kwam; Izothuso zokufa zindiwele.

5.verse: Ukoyika nokuthuthumela kundingene; Ndigutyungelwe kukududuzela.

6.verse: Ndathi, Andaba bendinamaphiko njengehobe! Bendiya kubaleka ndiye ndihlale!

7.verse: Nanko ndibalekela kude, Ndilalise entlango. (Phakamisani.)

8.verse: Bendiya kukhawuleza, ndisinde Emoyeni ovuthuzayo naseluqhwitheleni.

9.verse: Tshabalalisa, Nkosi yam, yahlula ulwimi lwazo; Ngokuba ndibone ukugonyamela nokubambana phakathi komzi.

10.verse: Imini nobusuku bajikeleza ezindongeni zawo; Ubutshinga nokwaphula kuphakathi kwawo;

11.verse: Ukweyelisela kuphakathi kwawo; Endaweni yembutho yawo akusuki ukuxinezela nokukhohlisa.

12.verse: Ngokuba asilutshaba olu lundingcikivayo; Bendiya kukuthwala oko. Asingondithiyileyo lo uzikhulisayo kum; Bendiya kusithela kuye.

13.verse: Nguwe, mntu ubungumlingane wam, Ikholwane lam endazana nalo,

14.verse: Ebesicweya kamnandi, Siye endlwini kaThixo silihlokondiba eligcobayo.

15.verse: Ukufa makubaqubule, Mabehle baye kwelabafileyo besaphilile; Ngokuba ububi busemizini yabo phakathi kwabo.

16.verse: Mna ndinqula uThixo; UYehova uya kundisindisa.

17.verse: Ngokuhlwa, nakusasa, nasemini enkulu ndiya kucamngca,  ndincwine; Uya kuliva izwi lam.

18.verse: Uwukhulula umphefumlo wam unoxolo, ukuze bangasondeli kum,  Ngokuba baninzi abandichasayo.

19.verse: UThixo uya kuva, abaphendule, Uselokwamandulo ehleli,  (Phakamisani.) Abo bangenanguquko, Bangamoyikiyo uThixo.

20.verse: Babasa isandla abaxolelene nabo; Bahlambela umnqophiso wabo;

21.verse: Ubuthelezi njengamasi umlomo wabo, Ke yimfazwe intliziyo yabo. Athambile amazwi abongaphezu kweoli, Kanti aziintlangothi zekrele.

22.verse: Umthwalo wakho wulahlele kuYehova; yena wokuzimasa; Akayi kuliyekela ilungisa lishukunyiswe naphakade.

23.verse: Wena ke, Thixo, uya kubahlisela emngxunyeni wesihogo.  Abantu bamagazi nenkohliso abayi kuyiqingathisa imihla yabo; Ke mna ndikholose ngawe.

1.verse: Kumongameli; ngeyehobe elithe cwaka phakathi kwabakude.  EkaDavide. Eliligugu. Ukubanjwa kwakhe ngamaFilisti eGati.  Ndibabale, Thixo, ngokuba abantu bendizonda; Bandixinile,  besilwa yonke imini;

2.verse: Abandilalelayo bandizonda yonke imini, Ngokuba baninzi abalwa nam beziphakamisile.

3.verse: Mhlana ndinxunguphalayo mna, Ndokholosa ngawe.

4.verse: Ndiya kulidumisa ngoThixo ilizwi lakhe, Ndikholose ngoThixo, ndingoyiki; Inokundenza ntoni na inyama?

5.verse: Yonke imini bayawaphambanisa amazwi am; Zingam zonke iingcinga zabo zobubi.

6.verse: Baqukene, babonisele, Bona bagcine izithende zam, Ngokokuba belinde umphefumlo wam.

7.verse: Bengamatshinga nje, bosinda na? Zihlise ngomsindo izizwe,  Thixo.

8.verse: Ukuphalaphala kwam ukubhalile wena; Yitha iinyembezi zam entsubeni yakho; Azisencwadini yakho na?

9.verse: Ziya kubuya umva ke iintshaba zam, mhlana ndibizayo;  Ndiyakwazi oku, ukuba uThixo unam.

10.verse: Ndilidumisa ngoThixo ilizwi, Ndilidumisa ngoYehova ilizwi.

11.verse: Ndikholose ngoThixo, ndingoyiki; Unokundenza ntoni na umntu?

12.verse: Ziphezu kwam, Thixo, izibhambathiso zakho; Ndiya kuyizalisa kuwe imibingelelo yombulelo.

13.verse: Ngokuba uwuhlangule ekufeni umphefumlo wam, Iinyawo zam ekukhubekeni, Ukuba ndihambe phambi koThixo Ekukhanyeni kobomi.

1.verse: Kumongameli; ngethi, Ungonakalisi. EkaDavide. Eliligugu:  ekumbalekeni kwakhe uSawule emqolombeni. Ndibabale, Thixo,  ndibabale; Ngokuba uzimela ngawe umphefumlo wam; Ndizimela esithunzini samaphiko akho, Kude kudlule inkxwaleko.

2.verse: Ndinqula uThixo Osenyangweni, UThixo ondifezelayo.

3.verse: Uya kuthuma esemazulwini andisindise, Emngcikiva nje ondizondayo; (Phakamisani.) UThixo uya kuthuma inceba yakhe nenyaniso yakhe.

4.verse: Umphefumlo wam uphakathi kweengonyama; Ndiya kulala phantsi nabafutha umlilo, Oonyana babantu abamazinyo aziintshuntshe neentolo, Ulwimi lwabo lulikrele elibukhali.

5.verse: Ziphakamisele ngaphezu kwamazulu, Thixo, Lube phezu kwehlabathi lonke uzuko lwakho.

6.verse: Isibatha basilungisele iinyawo zam; Bawugobile umphefumlo wam; Bandimbela isihogo, Beyela kuso ngokwabo. (Phakamisani.)

7.verse: Izimasekile intliziyo yam, Thixo, izimasekile intliziyo yam; Ndiya kuvuma, ndiya kubetha uhadi.

8.verse: Vuka, luzuko lwam! Vukani, mrhubhe nohadi! Ndiya kusiphangela isifingo.

9.verse: Ndiya kubulela kuwe phakathi kwezizwe, Nkosi yam; Ndiya kukubethela uhadi phakathi kwezizwe.

10.verse: Ngokuba inkulu, yada yaya ezulwini, inceba yakho; Yada yesa esibhakabhakeni inyaniso yakho.

11.verse: Ziphakamisele ngaphezu kwezulu, Thixo, Lube phezu kwehlabathi lonke uzuko lwakho.

1.verse: Kumongameli; ngethi, Ungonakalisi. EkaDavide. Eliligugu.  Yinene na kodwa ukuba nithetha ubulungisa, nina bothixo?  Nigweba oonyana babantu ngokuthe tye?

2.verse: Hayi, entliziyweni nenza ngobugqwetha; Ezweni nilinganisela ukugonyamela kwezandla zenu.

3.verse: Abangendawo baphambukile kwasesizalweni; Bandwendwile kwasesiswini abathethi bamanga.

4.verse: Banobuhlungu obunjengobuhlungu benyoka, Njengephimpi elizenza isithulu, elivingca indlebe yalo;

5.verse: Ukuze lingaliva izwi labanyangi, Lababopha ngomabophe,  beziingcibi.

6.verse: Thixo, yaphula amazinyo abo emlonyeni wabo; Amabamba eengonyama ezintsha wavithe, Yehova.

7.verse: Mabaphalale njengamanzi equkuqela; Akuxuna iintolo zakhe,  mazinge zicutshiwe.

8.verse: Mababe njengenkumba ehamba inyibilika, Njengemva-mbilini yomfazi, engalibonanga ilanga.

9.verse: Zingekaziva iintsasa iimbiza zenu, Nokuba ikrwada inyama,  nokuba iza kuvuthwa, uyayiqweqwedisa.

10.verse: Liya kuvuya ilungisa, lakuyibona impindezelo; Liya kuzihlamba iinyawo zalo egazini longendawo,

11.verse: Athi umntu, Inene, ilungisa linesiqhamo; Inene, ukho uThixo ogwebayo ehlabathini.

1.verse: Kumongameli; ngethi, Ungonakalisi. EkaDavide. Eliligugu:  ekuthumeleni kukaSawule, bayilinda indlu ukuba bambulale.  Ndihlangule ezintshabeni zam, Thixo wam, Ndise engxondeni kwabasukela phezulu kum.

2.verse: Ndihlangule kubasebenzi bobutshinga; Ndisindise ebantwini abanamagazi.

3.verse: Ngokuba nabo bewulalela umphefumlo wam; Baqukana ngam abanamandla, Kungekho lukreqo kum, kungekho sono kum, Yehova.

4.verse: Ndingenabugwenxa nje, bagidime baxhoba. Vuka,  undikhawulele, ubone.

5.verse: Wena Yehova, Thixo wemikhosi, Thixo kaSirayeli, Phapha,  uzivelele zonke iintlanga; Musa ukubayeka bonke abanginizayo bengabagqithi. (Phakamisani.)

6.verse: Bayabuya ngokuhlwa, bayavungama njengezinja,  Bawuhamba-hambe umzi.

7.verse: Nabo belephuza amagwebu ngomlomo; Ngamakrele emlonyeni wabo; Ngokuba bathi, Kuva bani na?

8.verse: Wena, Yehova, uyabahleka, Uyazigculela zonke iintlanga.

9.verse: Mandla am, ndiva kulindela kuwe; Ngokuba uThixo uyingxonde yam.

10.verse: UThixo wam uya kundikhawulela ngenceba yakhe; UThixo uya kundibonisa abandilaleleyo.

11.verse: Musa ukubabulala, hleze balibale abantu bakowethu;  Babhadulise ngamandla akho, ubawise, Ngweletshetshe yethu,  Nkosi yethu.

12.verse: Isono somlomo wabo lilizwi lemilebe yomlomo wabo;  Mababanjiswe likratshi labo, Nangenxa yokushwabula nokuhanahanisa abakuthethayo.

13.verse: Bagqibe ngobushushu; gqiba, bangabi sabakho; Baqonde ukuba uThixo ngumlawuli kwaYakobi, Wesa eziphelweni zehlabathi.  (Phakamisani.)

14.verse: Bayabuya ngokuhlwa, bayavungama njengezinja,  Bawuhamba-hambe umzi.

15.verse: Bona babhadulela ukudla; Ukuba bathe abahlutha, balala apho.

16.verse: Ke mna, ndiya kuvuma ngamandla akho, Ndimemelele kwakusasa ngenceba yakho, Kuba ubuyingxonde kum, Nendawo endisabela kuyo ngemini yokubandezelwa kwam.

17.verse: Mandla am, ndiya kukubethela uhadi; Ngokuba uThixo yingxonde yam, nguThixo wam onenceba.

1.verse: Kumongameli; ngeyenyibiba yesingqino. Eliligugu.  EkaDavide. Eyokufundisa: ekulweni kwakhe nama-Aram phakathi kweMilambo nama-Aram aseTsobha; wabuya uYowabhi, wawabulala amaEdom emfuleni wetyuwa, amawaka alishumi elinamabini.  Thixo,  usihlambile, wasichitha, Waqumba; ngamana wasibuyisa.

2.verse: Ulinyikimisile ilizwe, ulikrazule; Philisa iintanda zalo ngokuba lishukuma.

3.verse: Ubabonisile abantu bakho into elukhuni, Usiseze iwayini ehexisayo.

4.verse: Ubanike ibhanile abakoyikayo, Ukuba bayiphakamise ngenxa yenyaniso. (Phakamisani.)

5.verse: Ukuze zihlangulwe iintanda zakho, Sindisa ngesandla sakho sokunene, undiphendule.

6.verse: UThixo uthethe engcwele: mandivuyelele, Ndimabe uShekem,  ndiyilinganisele intili yaseSukoti.

7.verse: Ngowam uGiliyadi, ngowam uManase, UEfrayim sisigcina-ntloko sam, UYuda yintonga yam yommiselo;

8.verse: UMowabhi sisitya sam sokuhlambela, Ndiyiphosa kuEdom imbadada yam; Filisti, nkqangaza wena ngam.

9.verse: Ngubani na owondisa emzini wamandla? Ngubani na owondikhaphela kwaEdom?

10.verse: Asinguwe na, kwawena Thixo, osihlambileyo? Akwaphuma,  Thixo, nemikhosi yethu.

11.verse: Sincede kumbandezeli wethu; Alunto yanto usindiso lomntu.

12.verse: NgoThixo siya kweyisa, Wobagqusha yena ababandezeli bethu.

1.verse: Kumongameli; eyokubethelwa ngezinto ezineentambo.  EkaDavide. Kuve, Thixo, ukuhlahlamba kwam; Wubazele indlebe umthandazo wam.

2.verse: Ndidanduluka kuwe ndisesiphelweni sehlabathi, ekutyhafeni kwentliziyo yam; Ndikhaphele eweni elisemalengalengeni kum.

3.verse: Ngokuba ulihlathi lam, Uyinqaba ende eliqele phambi kotshaba.

4.verse: Ndiya kuphambukela ententeni yakho ngonaphakade, Ndiya kuzimela ngesithe lamaphiko akho. (Phakamisani.)

5.verse: Ngokuba wena, Thixo, uzivile izibhambathiso zam; Ubanike ilifa abaloyikayo igama lakho.

6.verse: Uya kongeza imihla emihleni yokumkani; Iminyaka yakhe iya kuba njengezizukulwana ngezizukulwana;

7.verse: Uya kuhlala ngonaphakade phambi koThixo; Mmisele inceba nenyaniso, ukuba zimlondoloze.

8.verse: Kukhona ndiya kulibethela uhadi igama lakho ngonaphakade,  Ndizizalise izibhambathiso zam imihla ngemihla.

1.verse: Kumongameli. KuYedutun. Umhobe kaDavide. Uthozamele kuThixo kwaphela umphefumlo wam; Kuvela kuye ukusindiswa kwam.

2.verse: Nguye kwaphela iliwa lam, umsindisi wam, Ingxonde yam;  andiyi kushukunyiswa kakhulu.

3.verse: Kunini na nisuka indulumbane emntwini? Kunini na nimncinitha nonke niphela, enjengodonga oluzimkayo,  enjengothango oluwayo?

4.verse: Bagqibe kwelokuba bamtyhale bamsuse ekuphakameni kwakhe kuphele; Bakholene namanga; Basikelela elowo ngomlomo,  embilinini yabo bayatshabhisa. (Phakamisani.)

5.verse: Thozamela kuThixo yedwa, mphefumlo wam, Ngokuba livela kuye ithemba lam.

6.verse: Nguye kwaphela iliwa lam, umsindisi wam, Ingxonde yam;  andiyi kushukunyiswa.

7.verse: KunoThixo ukusindiswa kwam nozuko lwam; Iliwa lokunqaba kwam nehlathi lam likuThixo.

8.verse: Kholosani ngaye ngamaxesha onke, nina bantu; Phalazani intliziyo yenu phambi kwakhe. UThixo ulihlathi kuthi.  (Phakamisani.)

9.verse: Bangumphunga kwaphela onyana boluntu, ngamanga oonyana bamadoda; Esikalini bangenyuka, Bangumphunga bephelele.

10.verse: Musani ukukholosa ngokudla abantu, Ningazenzi into engeyanto ngento exhakamfuliweyo. Yakwanda imfuyo, musani ukuyinyamekela.

11.verse: Uthethe nto-nye uThixo, Ezi zinto zimbini ndizivile: Ukuba amandla ngakaThixo,

12.verse: Nenceba yeyakho, Nkosi yam; Ngokuba uyababuyekeza, elowo ngokwezenzo zakhe.

1.verse: Umhobe kaDavide: oko ebesentlango yakwaYuda. Thixo,  unguThixo wam, ndiya kukuquqela kwakusasa, Umphefumlo wam unxanele wena; inyama yam iyakulangazelela Ezweni elingumqwebedu, elibharhileyo, eligenamanzi.

2.verse: Ndenjenjalo ukukhangela kuwe engcweleni, Ukuba ndibone amandla akho nobuqaqawuli bakho.

3.verse: Ngokuba inceba yakho ilungile ngaphezu kobomi, Umlomo wam uya kukuncoma.

4.verse: Ndiya kwenjenjalo ukukubonga lo gama ndihleliyo,  Ndiphakamise izandla zam egameni lakho.

5.verse: Umphefumlo wam uhluthi umongo namanqatha; Ngemilebe yomlomo wam omemelelayo uya kukudumisa umlomo wam,

6.verse: Ndakukukhumbula emandlalweni wam, Emilindweni yobusuku ndicamanga ngawe.

7.verse: Ngokuba uluncedo kum, Ndinokumemelela esithunzini samaphiko akho.

8.verse: Umphefumlo wam uthene mbende nawe; Isandla sakho sokunene sindibambile.

9.verse: Ke bona bafuna umphefumlo wam ukuze batshabalale, Baya kutshona kwezisezantsi iindawo zehlabathi.

10.verse: Baphalazelwa emandleni ekrele; Baba sisabelo seempungutye.

11.verse: Ke yena ukumkani uya kuvuya ngoThixo; Baya kuqhayisa abo bonke bafunga yena; Ngokuba uya kuvingcwa umlomo wabathetha ubuxoki.

1.verse: Kumongameli. Umhobe kaDavide. Live, Thixo, izwi lam ekukhalazeni kwam; Ekunkwantyiseni kotshaba bulondoloze ubomi bam.

2.verse: Ndisithelise egquguleni labanobubi, Ehlokondibeni labasebenzi bobutshinga;

3.verse: Abalulola njengekrele ulwimi lwabo, Abaxuna iintolo zabo,  amazwi akrakra,

4.verse: Bamtole ogqibeleleyo besentsithelweni; Bamtola ngesiquphe,  bangoyiki.

5.verse: Bazomelezela ilizwi elibi, Bagqiba kwelokuba bafihle izirhintyelo, Bathi, Singabonwa ngubani na?

6.verse: Baceba ubugqwetha; Baligqibile icebo abalicebileyo;  Imbilini yendoda nentliziyo yayo yinzulu.

7.verse: Ke uThixo uyabatola ngotolo; Amanxeba abo abakho ngesiquphe.

8.verse: Baya kukhutyekiswa, lufikele kwabona ulwimi lwabo;  Bayahlunguzela intloko bonke abababonayo.

9.verse: Basuka boyike bonke abantu, Bawuxele umsebenzi kaThixo,  Basiqiqe isenzo sakhe.

10.verse: Liya kuvuya ilungisa ngoYehova, lizimele ngaye, Baqhayise bonke abantliziyo zithe tye.

1.verse: Kumongameli. Umhobe kaDavide. Ingoma. Ukuthozama kuyindumiso kuwe, Thixo, eZiyon; Sizaliswa kuwe isibhambathiso.

2.verse: Wena mphulaphuli wemithandazo, Iza kuwe inyama yonke.

3.verse: Zindoyisile nje iindawo zobugwenxa, Ukreqo lwethu uyaluxolela wena ngocamagushelo.

4.verse: Hayi, uyolo lomnyulayo, umsondeze Ukuba ahlale ezintendelezweni zakho! Siya kuzihluthisa ngokulunga kwendlu yakho, Kwetempile yakho engcwele.

5.verse: Usiphendula ngezenzo ezoyikekayo zobulungisa, Thixo osisindisayo; Nkoloseko yeziphelo zonke zehlabathi, neyolwandle olukude;

6.verse: Ulozinzisa iintaba ngamandla akhe, Ebhinqe ubugorha;

7.verse: Ulodambisa ukugquma kweelwandle, ukugquma kwamaza azo,  Nokuxokozela kwezizwe.

8.verse: Bayayoyika imiqondiso yakho abemi beziphelo zehlabathi.  Umemelelisa ukuvela kokusa nokuhlwa.

9.verse: Uwuvelele umhlaba, wawunyela, Wawutyebisa kakhulu. Umjelo kaThixo uzele ngamanzi: Walungisa ingqolowa yabo, ngokuba uwenjenje ukuwulungisa.

10.verse: Useza ihluthe imisele yawo; Unyakamisa imiqela yawo.  Uthambisa ngeziphango; Usikelela izilimo zawo.

11.verse: Uwuthwesile umnyaka wokulunga kwakho, Imikhondo yakho itsitsa ukutyeba.

12.verse: Ayatsitsa amakriwa entlango, Iinduli zizibhinqise umgcobo.

13.verse: Amadlelo anxibe imihlambi yeenkomo; Iintili zambethe ingqolowa. Yonke into iyaduma, yonke into iyavuma.

1.verse: Kumongameli. Ingoma. Umhobe. Dumani kuThixo, nonke hlabathi,

2.verse: Lubetheleni uhadi uzuko lwegama lakhe, Mzukiseni,  mdumiseni.

3.verse: Yithini kuThixo, Hayi, ukoyikeka kwemisebenzi yakho! Ngenxa yobuninzi bamandla akho ziya kuhanahanisa kuwe iintshaba zakho.

4.verse: Lonke ihlabathi liya kukunqula, Bakubethele uhadi;  Balibethele uhadi igama lakho. (Phakamisani.)

5.verse: Yizani, nibone imisebenzi emikhulu kaThixo, Engowoyikekayo ekwenzeni kwakhe koonyana babantu.

6.verse: Waluguqula ulwandle lwayinto eyomileyo; Bawuwela umlambo ngeenyawo; Apho savuya ngaye.

7.verse: Ulolawula ngobugorha bakhe ngonaphakade; Amehlo akhe ayabonisela ezintlangeni; Abaziinjubaqa mabangaziphakamisi.  (Phakamisani.)

8.verse: Mbongeni, zizwe, uThixo wethu, Nivakalise ilizwi lendumiso yakhe.

9.verse: Ulomisa umphefumlo wethu ebomini, Akalunikela unyawo lwethu ekutyibilikeni.

10.verse: Ngokuba usicikidile, Thixo; Usinyibilikisile njengokunyibilikiswa kwesilivere;

11.verse: Usingenise emboniselweni; Ubeke uxinzelelo esinqeni sethu;

12.verse: Ukhwelise abantu entlokweni yethu; Singene emlilweni nasemanzini; Waza wasikhuphela endaweni enendyebo.

13.verse: Ndiya kungena endlwini yakho ndinamadini anyukayo; Ndiya kuzizalisa kuwe izibhambathiso zam,

14.verse: Eyazivulelayo imilebe yomlomo wam, Owazithethayo umlomo wam ekubandezelweni kwam.

15.verse: Ndiya kunyusela kuwe amadini anyukayo eemvana ezityebileyo, Ndawonye nesiqhumiso seenkunzi zeegusha; Ndiya kwenza aweenkomo ndawonye naweenkunzi zeebhokhwe.  (Phakamisani.)

16.verse: Yizani, nive, ndinixelele, nonke nina bamoyikayo uThixo,  Oko akwenzele umphefumlo wam.

17.verse: Ndadanduluka kuye ngomlomo wam; Kwaye ukubonga kuphantsi kolwimi lwam.

18.verse: Ukuba bendisekeleze ubutshinga ngentliziyo yam, INkosi yam ibingayi kuphulaphula.

19.verse: Hayi ke, uThixo uphulaphule, Ulibazele indlebe ilizwi lomthandazo wam.

20.verse: Makabongwe uThixo, Yena ungawugxothanga umthandazo wam,  Nobubele bakhe kum.

1.verse: Kumongameli; eyokubethelwa ngezinto ezineentambo. Umhobe.  Ingoma. Ngamana uThixo wasibabala, wasisikelela, Wabukhanyisa ubuso bakhe kuthi; (Phakamisani.)

2.verse: Ukuze yaziwe ehlabathini indlela yakho, Usindiso lwakho ezintlangeni zonke.

3.verse: Ngamana zabulela izizwe kuwe, Thixo, Zabulela izizwe kuwe zonke ziphela;

4.verse: Zavuya zamemelela izizwe: Ngokuba uya kugweba phakathi kwezizwe ngokuthe tye, Uzikhaphe izizwe ehlabathini.  (Phakamisani.)

5.verse: Ngamana zabulela izizwe kuwe, Thixo, Zabulela izizwe kuwe zonke ziphela.

6.verse: Umhlaba uyivelisile indyebo yawo; Uya kusisikelela uThixo,  uThixo wethu;

7.verse: Uya kusisikelela uThixo, Zimoyike zonke iziphelo zehlabathi.

1.verse: Kumongameli; ekaDavide. Umhobe. Ingoma. Makasuk eme uThixo, zibe ziintsali iintshaba zakhe, Basabe ebusweni bakhe abamthiyayo.

2.verse: Njengokuphetshethwa komsi, baphephethe; Njengokunyibilika komthwebeba phambi komlilo, Mabadake ngokunjalo abangendawo ebusweni bukaThixo.

3.verse: Ke wona amalungisa makavuye, adlamke phambi koThixo, Abe nemihlali, enemivuyo.

4.verse: Vumani kuThixo, libetheleni uhadi igama lakhe; Menzeleni umendo ophakamileyo, ulokhwela ecanda ezinkqantosini, Ogama lakhe linguYehova; nidlamke phambi kwakhe.

5.verse: Uyise weenkedama, umthetheleli wabahlolokazi, NguThixo ekhayeni lakhe elingcwele.

6.verse: UThixo nguhlalisa endlwini ababebodwa, Ngukhuphela enywebeni ababanjiweyo; Ngabaziinjubaqa bodwa abahlala kwelibalelelweyo.

7.verse: Thixo, ekuphumeni kwakho uphambi kwabantu bakho,  Ekunyatheleni kwakho enkangala, (Phakamisani.)

8.verse: Lanyikima ihlabathi, Lavuza izulu ebusweni bukaThixo,  ISinayi leya ebusweni bukaThixo, uThixo kaSirayeli.

9.verse: Walitshiza ngemvula eninzi yesisa sakho, Thixo, ilifa lakho; Lakubharha, walizimasa wena.

10.verse: Wahlala khona umhlambi wakho, Wamlungisela olusizana ngokulunga kwakho, Thixo.

11.verse: INkosi iya kukhupha izwi elinamandla, Ube mkhulu umkhosi weentokazi ezishumayela iindaba ezilungileyo.

12.verse: Ookumkani bemikhosi baya kusaba besabile; Intokazi esele ekhaya iya kuwaba amaxhoba.

13.verse: Nakulala phantsi phakathi kweentlanti, Noxelisa amaphiko evukuthu alekwe ngesilivere, Neentsiba zalo ezalekwe ngegolide ebengezelayo.

14.verse: Ekubadubadubeni kukaSomandla ookumkani kulo, Koba mhlophe ngowekhephu eTsalimon.

15.verse: Yintaba kaThixo intaba yaseBhashan, Yintaba encopho zininzi intaba yaseBhashan.

16.verse: Niyigxeleshelani na, zintaba zincopho zininzi, Intaba ayinqweneleyo uThixo ukuba ahlale kuyo? Ewe, uYehova uya kuhlala kuyo ngonaphakade.

17.verse: Iinqwelo zokulwa zikaThixo zizigidi, ngamawaka-waka;  INkosi ikuzo; yiSinayi ebungcweleni,

18.verse: Unyuke waya phezulu, uthimbe abathinjwa, Uthabathe izipho phakathi kwabantu, Naphakathi kwabaziinjubaqa, ukuba ahlale uYehova uThixo khona.

19.verse: Mayibongwe iNkosi; Ithwala imithwalo yethu imihla ngemihla; NguThixo umsindisi wethu. (Phakamisani.

20.verse: Yena uThixo kuthi nguThixo wosindiso, KokukaYehova, iNkosi yethu, ukukhupha ekufeni.

21.verse: Kodwa uThixo uya kuyiphalusa intloko yeentshaba zakhe,  Nentloko enesihlwitha yohambayo kwizigqitho zakhe.

22.verse: Yathi iNkosi, Ndiya kuzibuyisa eBhashan, Ndiya kuzibuyisa iintshaba zakho ezinzulwini zolwandle;

23.verse: Ukuze uziphaluse, unyawo lwakho lusegazini, Nolwimi lwezinja zakho lube nesabelo salo ezintshabeni.

24.verse: Bakubona ukunyathela kwakho, Thixo, Ukunyathela koThixo wam, koKumkani wam, esebungcweleni.

25.verse: Phambili ziimvumi, ngasemva ngababethi bohadi, Emacaleni ziintombi ezibetha iingqongqo.

26.verse: Emabandleni bongani uThixo, INkosi, nina basemthonjeni wakwaSirayeli.

27.verse: Balapho ooBhenjamin, inci yabo, umphathi wabo, Abathetheli bakwaYuda, ihlokondiba labo; Abathetheli bakwaZebhulon,  abathetheli bakwaNafetali.

28.verse: UThixo wakho wakuwisela umthetho wokuba uqine; Kuqinise,  Thixo, oko usenzeleyo.

29.verse: Bevela etempileni yakho eyongamele iYerusalem, Ookumkani mabeze nezithabathaba kuwe.

30.verse: Khalimela amarhamncwa asengcongolweni, Umhlambi weenkunzi eziziimbalasane, kunye namathole ezizwe, Ukuze baziwise benezijungqe zesilivere. Wazibhangisa izizwe eziyithandayo imfazwe.

31.verse: Kovela amanono eYiputa; UKushi wozolulela msinya izandla zakhe kuThixo.

32.verse: Zikumkani zehlabathi, vumani kuThixo, Niyibethele uhadi iNkosi; (Phakamisani.)

33.verse: Ekhwela ecanda emazulwini awo amazulu amandulo; Nanko elikhupha ilizwi lakhe, ilizwi elinamandla.

34.verse: Mnikeni amandla uThixo; Buphezu koSirayeli ubungangamsha bakhe; Asesibhakabhakeni amandla akhe.

35.verse: UloThixo woyikekayo ezingcweleni zakho. UloThixo kaSirayeli, ubanikayo amandla nokomelela abantu. Makabongwe uThixo.

1.verse: Kumongameli; ngeyeenyibiba. EkaDavide. Ndisindise, Thixo;  Ngokuba amanzi andifikele, ada eza emphefumlweni.

2.verse: Nditshonile eludakeni olunzulu, akukho kuma; Ndingene emmbithini onamanzi, umsinga uyandintywilisela.

3.verse: Ndidiniwe kukudanduluka; womile umqala wam; Aphelile amehlo am; mna ndilindele kuThixo.

4.verse: Abandithiyayo ngelize baninzi ngaphezu kweenwele zentloko yam; Baninzi abandibangisayo, abaziintshaba zam bexoka; Into endingayiphanganga bathi mandiyibuyise.

5.verse: Thixo, wena uyakwazi ukumatha kwam; Namatyala am akanakugushwa kuwe.

6.verse: Mabangadani ngam abakuthembayo, Nkosi yam, Yehova wemikhosi; Mabangangcikivwa ngam abakufunayo, Thixo kaSirayeli.

7.verse: Ngokuba ndithwele ingcikivo ngenxa yakho; Ihlazo libugqubuthele ubuso bam;

8.verse: Ndingowasemzini kubazalwana bam; Ndingowolunye uhlanga kubantwana bakama:

9.verse: Ngokuba lindidlile ikhwele ngenxa yendlu yakho: Iingcikivo zabakungcikivayo ziwe phezu kwam.

10.verse: Mna, umphefumlo wam walila, uzila ukudla; Oko kwaba yingcikivo kum.

11.verse: Iingubo zam zaba zezirhwexayo, Ndaba yinto yokuzekelisa kubo.

12.verse: Bathetha ngam abahleli esangweni; Ndiyingoma yamanxila.

13.verse: Ke mna ndithandaza kuwe, Yehova, ngexesha elikholekileyo:  Thixo, ngobuninzi benceba yakho, Ndiphendule ngenyaniso yosindiso lwakho.

14.verse: Ndihlangule eludakeni, ndingatshoni; Mandihlangulwe kwabandithiyayo nasemimbithini enamanzi.

15.verse: Mawungandintywiliseli umsinga wamanzi; Ingandiginyi inzulu; Iqula malingandivingceli ngomlomo walo

16.verse: Ndiphendule, Yehova, ngokuba ilungile inceba yakho,  Ngangobuninzi bemfesane yakho ndibheke.

17.verse: Musa ukubusithelisa ubuso bakho kumkhonzi wakho, Ngokuba ndibandezelekile; khawuleza undiphendule.

18.verse: Sondela emphefumlweni wam, uwukhulule; Ngenxa yeentshaba zam ndikhulule.

19.verse: Wena uyakwazi ukungcikivwa kwam, nokudaniswa kwam,  nokuhlazwa kwam; Baphambi kwakho bonke abandibandezelayo.

20.verse: Ingcikivo yaphula intliziyo yam, ndaphantsa ukufa;  Ndathemba ukukhuzwa, akwabakho; Nokuthuthuzelwa, andakufumana.

21.verse: Ukudla bandinika inyongo; Ekunxanweni kwam bandiseza iviniga.

22.verse: Isithebe sabo phambi kwabo masibe ngumgibe; Sibe sisirhintyelo kwabanemasi.

23.verse: Makabe mnyama amehlo abo, bangaboni, Usigxadazelise isinqe sabo amaxesha onke.

24.verse: Baphalazele ngobhavumo lwakho, Kubafikele ukuvutha komsindo wakho.

25.verse: Ingqili yabo mayibe senkangala, Ezintenteni zabo kungahlali mntu;

26.verse: Ngokuba bayamsukela obethwe nguwe, Bancokole ngomvandedwa wobahlabileyo wena.

27.verse: Yongeza ubugwenxa ebugwenxeni babo, Bangangeni ebulungi senibakho.

29.verse: Ke mna ndilusizana, ndinomvandedwa; Usindiso lwakho,  Thixo, malundise engxondeni.

30.verse: Ndiya kulidumisa igama likaThixo ngokuvuma, Ndilenze likhulu ngokubulela.

31.verse: Oko kuya kukholeka kuYehova ngaphezu kweenkunzi ezintsha,  Ezineempondo neempuphu.

32.verse: Bebona abalulamileyo, bovuya; Nina bamquqelayo uThixo,  intliziyo yenu mayiphile.

33.verse: Ngokuba uYehova uyaweva amahlwempu, Akabadeli ababanjiweyo bakhe.

34.verse: Malimdumise izulu nomhlaba, Ulwandle nento yonke enambuzelayo kulo.

35.verse: Ngokuba uThixo uya kuyisindisa iZiyon, ayakhe imizi yakwaYuda, Bahlale khona, bayime;

36.verse: Ilidle ilifa imbewu yabakhonzi bakhe; Bahlale kuyo abalithandayo igama lakhe.

1.verse: Kumongameli; ekaDavide; eyokukhumbuza. Thixo, khawuleza undihlangule; Yehova, khawuleza undincede.

2.verse: Mabadane babe neentloni abawufunayo umphefumlo wam;  Mababuye umva bahlazeke abananze ukuba ndihlelwe bububi;

3.verse: Mababuye ngenxa yomvuzo wedano labo Abathi, Tshotsho!  Tshotsho!

4.verse: Mababe nemihlali bavuye ngawe bonke abakuquqelayo;  Abaluthandayo usindiso lwakho Mabahlale besithi, Makenziwe mkhulu uThixo.

5.verse: Ke mna ndilusizana, ndilihlwempu; Thixo, khawuleza uze kum.  Umncedi wam nomsindisi wam nguwe; Yehova, musa ukulibala.

1.verse: Ndizimela ngawe, Yehova, Mandingaze ndidane naphakade:

2.verse: Ngobulungisa bakho ndihlangule, ndisize; Ndithobele indlebe yakho, undisindise.

3.verse: Yiba liliwa elilikhaya kum, ndize kulo ngamaxesha onke.  Uwise umthetho wokuba ndisindiswe, Ngokuba ingxondorha yam nemboniselo yam nguwe.

4.verse: Thixo wam, ndisize esandleni songendawo, Esandleni sogqwethayo nosisibhovubhovu.

5.verse: Ngokuba ulithemba lam, Nkosi yam, Yehova, Inkoloseko yam kwasebuncinaneni bam.

6.verse: Ndixhaswe nguwe kwasesizalweni; Nguwe owandityhobozisayo ezibilinini zikama. Indumiso yam ingawe ngamaxesha onke.

7.verse: Ndinjengesimanga kwabaninzi; Ke wena ulihlathi lam elinqabileyo.

8.verse: Umlomo wam uya kuzala yindumiso yakho, Sisihombo sakho imini yonke.

9.verse: Musa ukundilahla ngexesha lobuxhego; Musa ukundishiya akuphela amandla am.

10.verse: Ngokuba zithetha ngam iintshaba zam; Abawulindayo umphefumlo wam bayacebisana,

11.verse: Besithi, UThixo umlahlile; Msukeleni nimbambe, ngokuba akukho mhlanguli.

12.verse: Thixo, musa ukuba kude kum; Thixo wam, khawuleza undincede.

13.verse: Mabadane, bagqitywe, abawuchasayo umphefumlo wam, Bathiwe wambu yingcikivo nehlazo abafuna ukuba ndihlelwe bububi.

14.verse: Ke mna ndiya kuhlala ndilindile, Ndongeze endumisweni yakho yonke.

15.verse: Umlomo wam uya kubalisa ngemisebenzi yobulungisa bakho,  Neyosindiso lwakho imini yonke, ngokuba ndingawazi amanani ayo.

16.verse: Ndiya kuza nemisebenzi yobugorha beNkosi uYehova; Ndiya kukhankanya ubulungisa bakho, bakho wedwa.

17.verse: Thixo, undifundisile kwasebuncinaneni bam; Unangoku ndiyayixela imisebenzi yakho ebalulekileyo.

18.verse: Thixo, musa ukundishiya kude kuye ebuxhegweni nasezimvini;  Ndide ndiyixele ingalo yakho kwisizukulwana esitsha, Nobugorha bakho kubo bonke abaya kuza.

19.verse: Thixo, ubulungisa bakho buye bafika phezulu; Wena uzenzayo izinto ezinkulu, Thixo, ngubani na onjengawe?

20.verse: Wena, usibonisileyo iimbandezelo ezininzi ezinobubi, Uya kubuya usiphilise, Ubuye usirhole ezinzonzobileni zamanzi ehlabathi;

21.verse: Uya kubandisa ubukhulu bam, Ubuye wena undithuthuzele.

22.verse: Ndiya kuyibulela nokuyibulela kuwe ngomrhubhe Inyaniso yakho, Thixo wam; Ndiya kukubethela uhadi, Ngcwele kaSirayeli.

23.verse: Uya kumemelela umlomo wam, ndakukubethela uhadi,  Nomphefumlo wam owukhululeyo;

24.verse: Nolwimi lwam luya kuxela ubulungisa bakho imini yonke,  Ngokuba bedanile beneentloni abafuna ukuba ndihlelwe bububi.

1.verse: EkaSolomon. Thixo, mnike ukumkani imigwebo yakho, Mnike unyana wokumkani ubulungisa bakho.

2.verse: Makagwebe ebantwini bakho ngobulungisa, Nakwabaziintsizana zakho ngokwesiko.

3.verse: Iintaba mazibathwalele uxolo abantu, Kwaneenduli zibathwalele ebulungiseni.

4.verse: Makagwebe ityala labaziintsizana ebantwini, Asindise oonyana bamahlwempu, Abatyumze abacudisi.

5.verse: Mabakoyike, ukuhlala elihleliyo ilanga Kwanenyanga,  izizukulwana ngezizukulwana.

6.verse: Makehle njengemvula ehla phezu kotyani obusikwayo,  Njengeziphango, njengemvula emathontsi makhulu, emhlabeni.

7.verse: Malityatyambe ngemihla yakhe ilungisa, Nobuninzi boxolo,  ide ingabi sabakho inyanga.

8.verse: Makaphathe ubukhosi ethabathela elwandle ase elwandle,  Ethabathela kuwo uMlambo ase eziphelweni zehlabathi.

9.verse: Baya kuguqa phambi kwakhe abemi bomqwebedu, Zikhothe uthuli iintshaba zakhe.

10.verse: Ookumkani baseTarshishe nabeziqithi baya kunika iminikelo;  Ookumkani bakwaShebha nabakwaSebha baya kusondeza isithabathaba;

11.verse: Baqubude kuye bonke ookumkani, Zimkhonze sonke iintlanga.

12.verse: Ngokuba uya kulihlangula ihlwempu elizibikayo,  Nabaziintsizana abangenaluncedo;

13.verse: Abenzele inceba abasweleyo nabangamahlwempu; Asindise imiphefumlo yamahlwempu;

14.verse: Akhulule imiphefumlo yawo ekuxinezelweni nasekugonyamelweni; Linqabile emehlweni akhe igazi lawo.

15.verse: Uya kuphila anikwe igolide yakwaShebha, Bahlale bemthandazela, Bamsikelele imini yonke.

16.verse: Makubekho intabalala yengqolowa ezweni, ise encotsheni yeentaba; Ukuqhama kwayo makurhashaze njengeLebhanon;  Mabatyatyambe emizini yabo njengemifuno yomhlaba.

17.verse: Malibe ngunaphakade igama lakhe; Malivelise amagatya igama lakhe phambi kwelanga, Bazisikelele ngaye; Mazithi zonke iintlanga ungonoyolo.

18.verse: Makabongwe uYehova uThixo, uThixo kaSirayeli. Ulomenzi wemisebenzi ebalulekileyo yena yedwa.

19.verse: Malisikelelwe igama lakhe elizukileyo ngonaphakade, Lizale lonke ihlabathi luzuko lwakhe. Amen, amen.

20.verse: Iphelile imithandazo kaDavide unyana kaYese.

1.verse: Umhobe ka-Asafu. Ulungile kwaphela uThixo kuSirayeli,  Kwabantliziyo zinyulu.

2.verse: Ke mna, beziphantse ukumka iinyawo zam; Gcwizi ukutyibilika ukunyathela kwam;

3.verse: Ngokuba bendibamonela abaqhayisayo, Ndakukubona ukuphumelela kwabangendawo.

4.verse: Ngokuba abanazintlungu ekufeni kwabo; Baphilile, batyebile umzimba wabo;

5.verse: Ebubini babantu abakho bona; Abakhathazwa njengabanye abantu.

6.verse: Ngako oko intamo yabo inxitywe ikratshi; Ukugonyamela kubathe wambu ngokwengubo.

7.verse: Amehlo abo avelile kukutyeba; Amabhongo eentliziyo zabo aphumela phandle.

8.verse: Bahlalela ngentlamba, bathetha ngokubandezela, benobubi;  Bathetha iindumbisa zamazwi.

9.verse: Bawubeka ezulwini umlomo wabo, Ulwimi lwabo luhamba emhlabeni wonke.

10.verse: Ngako oko abantu babo babuyela apha; Bafinca amanzi amaninzi.

11.verse: Bathi, Unokuthini na ukwazi uThixo? Kukho ukwazi na kOsenyangweni?

12.verse: Yabona abangendawo abaya Banokuchulumacha ngonaphakade,  bandile ngokutyeba.

13.verse: Sifumane sayiqaqambisa intliziyo yethu kanti, Sazihlamba izandla zethu ngokuba msulwa;

14.verse: Ndakhathazeka imini yonke, Ukohlwaywa kwethu kwaba kokwemiso yonke.

15.verse: Ukuba bendithe, Ndiya kwenjenjalo ukuthetha, Yabona,  ngendinginizile kwisizukulwana soonyana bakho.

16.verse: Ndathi ke ndakucinga ukuba ndikwazi oko, Kwayinkohla emehlweni am;

17.verse: Ndada ndaya kungena ezingcweleni zikaThixo, Ndakugqala ke ukuphela kwabo.

18.verse: Inene, ubamise ezindaweni ezibuthelezi, Wabawisa baba yintshabalala.

19.verse: Hayi, ukuphanziswa kwabo ngephanyazo; Baphelile,  bagqityiwe kukukhwankqa.

20.verse: Njengephupha ekuqabukeni komntu, Ekuvukeni kwakho, Nkosi,  wowudela umfanekiso wabo.

21.verse: Ukuba ndithe ndabindeka intliziyo, Ndahlabeka ezintsweni,

22.verse: Ndoba ke ndisisityhakala, ndingenakwazi; Ndoba ke ndisisilo kuwe.

23.verse: Mna ke ndihlala ndinawe; Undibambile ngesandla sam sokunene;

24.verse: Uya kundikhapha ngecebo lakho. Undithabathe emveni koku,  ndibe nozuko.

25.verse: Ndinabani na emazulwini? Ukuba wena ungowam, andilinanze nganto ihlabathi.

26.verse: Ingaphela inyama yam nentliziyo yam: Iliwa lentliziyo yam,  nesabelo sam, nguThixo ngonaphakade.

27.verse: Ngokuba, yabona, abanyawukileyo kuwe baya kudaka;  Uyababhangisa bonke abahenyuzayo, bemke kuwe.

28.verse: Mna ke, ukusondela kuThixo kulungile kum, Ndiyenza ihlathi lam iNkosi uYehova, Ukuze ndiyibalise yonke imisebenzi yakhe.

1.verse: Eyokuqiqa; eka-Asafu. Yini na Thixo, ukuba uhlale usihlambile, Uqhume umsindo wakho kwizimvu zedlelo lakho?

2.verse: Likhumbule ibandla lakho olithengileyo kwakudala,  Olikhululeyo, laba sisizwe selifa lakho; Intaba yaseZiyon,  ohleli kuyo.

3.verse: Phakamisa ukunyathela kwakho, ukuya kumanxuwa ahlala ehleli: Utshaba luvive into yonke engcweleni.

4.verse: Babharhula ababandezeli bakho endaweni yokuhlangana phakathi; Bamisa eyabo imiqondiso, yaba yiyo eyimiqondiso.

5.verse: Kwanga kungenelwe Intshinyela yemithi ngezixengxe.

6.verse: Kungoku, uqoqo lwayo lonke Balucanda ngamazembe neengxobonga.

7.verse: Bayifaka umlilo ingcwele yakho; Bawuhlambela ngokuwuwisela emhlabeni umnquba wegama lakho.

8.verse: Bathi ezintliziyweni zabo, Siya kubanyanzelela phantsi kuphele; Bazitshisile zonke iindawo zikaThixo zokuhlangana ezweni apha.

9.verse: Imiqondiso yethu asiyiboni, Akusekho mprofeti; Kuthi akukho waziyo ukuba koda kuse phi na kunjalo.

10.verse: Kunini na, Thixo, umbandezeli engcikiva? Utshaba luhleli luligiba igama lakho?

11.verse: Usifinyezeleni na isandla sakho, nesokunene sakho? Sirhole esifubeni sakho, ulugqibe.

12.verse: Ke uThixo nguKumkani wam kwakumandulo, Ulosebenza usindiso phakathi kwehlabathi lonke.

13.verse: Nguwe owahlula ulwandle ngamandla akho, Owaphula iintloko zeengwenya emanzini.

14.verse: Nguwe owaxhaxha iintloko zeleviyatan, Wazinika zakukudla kubantu, kubemi bomqwebedu.

15.verse: Nguwe owagqobhoza yayimithombo, yayimilanjana; Nguwe owomisa imilambo engomiyo.

16.verse: Yeyakho imini, bobakho nobusuku; Nguwe owalungisa ukukhanya nelanga.

17.verse: Nguwe owamisa yonke imida yehlabathi; Ihlobo, nobusika,  nguwe owazibumbayo ezo zinto.

18.verse: Khumbula oku; utshaba lungcikiva uYehova, Abantu abanobudenge baligibile igama lakho.

19.verse: Musa ukuwunikela erhamncweni umphefumlo wehobe lakho;  Ungahlali uwulibele umhlambi wakho oziintsizana.

20.verse: Bheka emnqophisweni, Ngokuba iindawo ezimnyama zelizwe zizele zizindlu zogonyamelo.

21.verse: Makangabuyi otyumkileyo ehlazisiwe; Makalidumise igama lakho olusizana nolihlwempu.

22.verse: Khawusuk ume, Thixo, ubambane nababambene nawe; Khumbula ukukungcikiva kwesidenge yonke imini.

23.verse: Musa ukulilibala izwi lababandezeli bakho, Ukungxola kwabasukela phezulu kuwe, okuhlala kunyuka.

1.verse: Kumongameli; ngethi, Ungonakalisi. Umhobe ka-Asafu.  Ingoma. Siyabulela kuwe, Thixo, siyabulela; Lisondele igama lakho; Babalisa imisebenzi yakho ebalulekileyo.

2.verse: Ngokuba uthi, Ndiya kwenza ngexesha elimisiweyo, Mna ndiya kugweba ngokuthe tye.

3.verse: Liyetha amandla ihlabathi, nabemi balo; Ke mna,  ndizizinzisile iintsika zalo. (Phakamisani.)

4.verse: Ndithi kubaqhayisi, Musani ukuqhayisa; Nakwabangendawo,  Musani ukuphakamisa uphondo;

5.verse: Musani ukuluphakamisela phezulu uphondo lwenu, Ningathethi ngokusa, nolule intamo.

6.verse: Ngokuba ugwebo aluveli empumalanga nasentshonalanga,  Nasentlango yeentaba.

7.verse: Hayi, nguThixo ogwebayo; Uyamthoba lo, amphakamise lowa.

8.verse: Ngokuba indebe isesandleni sikaYehova, Iphuphuma igwebu lewayini, izele yephithikeziweyo. Uthulula kuyo; ewe, iintlenga zayo Ziya kuselwa zifincwe ngabangendawo bonke behlabathi.

9.verse: Ke mna ndiya kushumayela ngonaphakade, Ndiya kuvuma kuThixo kaYakobi;

10.verse: Zonke iimpondo zabangendawo ndiya kuzixakaxa, Iimpondo zelungisa ziya kuphakanyiswa.

1.verse: Kumongameli; eyokubethelwa ngezinto ezineentambo. Umhobe ka-Asafu. Ingoma. Waziwa kwaYuda uThixo, Likhulu kwaSirayeli igama lakhe.

2.verse: Umnquba wakhe waba seSalem, Nekhaya lakhe eZiyon.

3.verse: Wayaphula apho imibane yesaphetha, Ingweletshetshe,  nekrele, nezixhobo zemfazwe. (Phakamisani.)

4.verse: Ukhanyile, uyingangamsha ngaphezu kweentaba zokuqwenga.

5.verse: Babhunyulwe abantliziyo iyimbalasane, Balala umlala kanye,  Akazifumana izandla zawo onke amakroti.

6.verse: Ekukhalimeni kwakho, Thixo kaYakobi, Kwasindwa bubuthongo iinqwelo zokulwa namahashe.

7.verse: Unguwena wena woyikekayo; Ngubani na onokuma phambi kwakho,  wakuba nomsindo?

8.verse: Emazulwini usivakalisile isigwebo; Loyika ihlabathi,  lazola,

9.verse: Ekusukeni kukaThixo ukuba agwebe, Abasindise bonke abalulamileyo behlabathi. (Phakamisani.)

10.verse: Ngokuba ubushushu bomntu buya kuba ngumbulelo kuwe; Uya kuwabhinqa amasalela obushushu.

11.verse: Bhambathisani, nisizalise isibhambathiso kuYehova uThixo wenu; Bonke abamngqongileyo mabeze nezithabathaba kofanele kukoyikwa.

12.verse: Uya kunqumla ukufutha kweenganga, Uyoyikeka kookumkani behlabathi.

1.verse: Kumongameli. KuYedutun. Eka-Asafu. Umhobe. Izwi lam lisingisa kuThixo, ndikhala; Izwi lam lisingisa kuThixo, ukuba andibekele indlebe.

2.verse: Ngemini yokubandezelwa kwam ndiquqela eNkosini yam; Isandla sam solukile ebusuku, asaqoba; Awavuma ukuthuthuzeleka umphefumlo wam.

3.verse: Ndikhumbula uThixo, ndincwine; Ndithelekelele, utyhafe umoya wam. (Phakamisani.)

4.verse: Uzibambile iinkophe zamehlo am, Ndikhandiwe, andaba nakuthetha.

5.verse: Ndicinga ngemihla yamandulo, Iminyaka yasephakadeni;

6.verse: Ndiya kukhumbula ebusuku ukubetha kwam uhadi; Ndithetha nentliziyo yam, uphengulula umoya wam.

7.verse: Ndithi, Iya kundihlamba ngonaphakade na iNkosi yam, Ingabi saphinda iphathe ngetarhu na?

8.verse: Iphele yaphela na inceba yayo? Sigqibele na isithembiso sayo kwisizukulwana ngesizukulwana?

9.verse: UThixo ukulibele na ukubabala? Uyivingcele ngomsindo kusini na imfesane yakhe? (Phakamisani.)

10.verse: Ndide ndithi ke, Sisifo sam esi; Yiminyaka yesandla sokunene sOsenyangweni.

11.verse: Ndikhankanya izenzo ezincamisayo zikaYehova; Ngokuba ndikhumbula imisebenzi yakho ebalulekileyo yamandulo.

12.verse: Ndicamanga ngako konke ukusebenza kwakho, Ndithelekelele ngezenzo zakho zonke ezincamisayo.

13.verse: Thixo, isebungcweleni indlela yakho; Ngubani na onguthixo omkhulu njengoThixo wethu?

14.verse: UnguloThixo, wenza ngokubalulekileyo; Wawazisa amandla akho ezizweni,

15.verse: Wabakhulula ngengalo abantu bakho, Oonyana bakaYakobi noYosefu. (Phakamisani.)

16.verse: Akubona amanzi, Thixo, Akubona amanzi, azibhija-bhija,  Ewe, agungqa amanzi enzonzobila;

17.verse: Amafu engqingqwa aphalaza amanzi, Isibhakabhaka savakalisa isandi; Ewe, iintolo zakho zahamba-hamba.

18.verse: Izwi lendudumo yakho laba sesaqhwithini, Imibane yalikhanyisa elimiweyo, Lagungqa lanyikima ihlabathi.

19.verse: Yaba selwandle indlela yakho, Nomendo wakho waba semanzini amaninzi; Awaziwa umkhondo wakho.

20.verse: Wabakhokela njengezimvu abantu bakho, Ngesandla sooMoses noAron.

1.verse: Eyokuqiqa ka-Asafu. Wubekeleni indlebe umyalelo wam,  bantu bakowethu, Wathobeleni indlebe amazwi omlomo wam.

2.verse: Ndiya kuwuvula umlomo wam ngomzekeliso; Ndiya kumpompozisa iintsonkotha zamandulo;

3.verse: Esakuvayo sakwazi, Abasibaliselayo oobawo.

4.verse: Asiyi kukugusha koonyana babo; Sobalisela isizukulwana esizayo iindumiso zikaYehova, Namandla akhe, nemisebenzi yakhe ebalulekileyo awayenzayo.

5.verse: Wamisa isingqiniso kwaYakobi, Wabeka umyalelo kwaSirayeli,  Awawumisela oobawo, Ukuba bawazise oonyana babo;

6.verse: Ukuze siwazi isizukulwana esizayo, oonyana abaza kuzalwa,  Basuke babalisele ababo oonyana;

7.verse: Bayame ngoThixo, Bangazilibali izenzo ezincamisayo zikaThixo, Bayilondoloze imithetho yakhe:

8.verse: Bangabi njengooyise, Isizukulwana esiyinjubaqa,  esineenkani, Isizukulwana esingayilungisanga intliziyo yaso,  Esimoya unganyanisanga kuThixo.

9.verse: Oonyana bakaEfrayim, bexhobile, beziintoli ezinezaphetha,  Bajika ngemini yemfazwe.

10.verse: Abawugcinanga umnqophiso kaThixo, Abavumanga ukuhamba ngomyalelo wakhe;

11.verse: Bazilibala izenzo zakhe ezincamisayo, Nezibalulekileyo zakhe awababonisayo.

12.verse: Phambi kooyise wenza ngokubalulekileyo Ezweni lamaYiputa,  emhlabeni waseTsohan.

13.verse: Waludabula ulwandle, wabaweza, Wawamisa amanzi njengemfumba.

14.verse: Wabakhapha ngelifu emini, Ngokukhanya komlilo ubusuku bonke,

15.verse: Walicanda iliwa entlango, Wabaseza amanzi anzongonzongo kakhulu;

16.verse: Wavelisa imiqukuqela yamanzi engxondorheni, Wahlisa amanzi njengemilambo.

17.verse: Baqokela noko ukona kuye, Nokumphikisa Osenyangweni emqwebedwini.

18.verse: Bamlinga uThixo ngentliziyo yabo, Ngokuwubizela umphefumlo wabo ukudla.

19.verse: Bathetha ngoThixo, bathi, Unako na uThixo ukulungisa isithebe entlango?

20.verse: Yabona, walibetha iliwa, abaleka amanzi, Yakhukula nemilanjana; Woba nako na nokubanika ukutya, Nokubalungiselela inyama abantu bakhe?

21.verse: Weva ke uThixo, waphuphuma umsindo wakhe, Watsha umlilo kwaYakobi, Kwenyuka kwaya umsindo kwaSirayeli;

22.verse: Ngokuba bengakholwanga kuThixo, Bengakholosanga ngosindiso lwakhe.

23.verse: Waziwisela ke umthetho iingqimba zamafu ngaphezulu,  Wazivula iingcango zezulu;

24.verse: Wabanisela ngemana ukuze badle, Wabanika ingqolowa yasezulwini.

25.verse: Umntu wadla isonka sOnamandla; Wabathumela umphako bada badikwa.

26.verse: Wandulula umoya wasempumalanga ezulwini, Wawuqhuba ngamandla akhe umoya wasezantsi;

27.verse: Wabanisela inyama njengothuli, Neentaka ezinamaphiko njengentlabathi yolwandle;

28.verse: Yawa phakathi kweminquba yabo, Ngeenxa zonke emakhayeni abo.

29.verse: Badla, bahlutha kakhulu, Wabazisela ke inkanuko yabo.

30.verse: Bengekashenxi enkanukweni yabo, Kusekho ukudla kwabo emlonyeni wabo:

31.verse: Kwenyuka umsindo kaThixo waya kubo, Wabulala phakathi kwabatyebileyo babo, Wawawisa amadodana akwaSirayeli.

32.verse: Kuyo yonke loo nto bahambisa ngokona, Abakholwa yimisebenzi yakhe ebalulekileyo.

33.verse: Wayiphelisa ke imihla yabo njengomphunga, Neminyaka yabo ngokukhwankqisa.

34.verse: Xa wathi wababulala, bamquqela; Babuya bamquqela uThixo ngenyameko,

35.verse: Bakhumbula ukuba uThixo uliliwa labo, UThixo Osenyangweni ungumkhululi wabo.

36.verse: Ke bamthomalalisa ngomlomo wabo, Bamxokisa ngolwimi lwabo;

37.verse: Intliziyo yabo ayaqina kuye, Abanyaniseka emnqophisweni wakhe.

38.verse: Ke yena unemfesane, Uxolela ubugwenxa ngocamagushelo,  akonakalisi; Wawubuyisa futhi umsindo wakhe, Akabuxhoxha bonke ubushushu bakhe.

39.verse: Wakhumbula ukuba bayinyama, Bangumoya omkayo, ongabuyiyo.

40.verse: Kukangaphi bemphikisa entlango, Bemenza buhlungu enkangala!

41.verse: Babuya bamlinga uThixo, Bamenzakalisa oyiNgcwele wakwaSirayeli.

42.verse: Abasikhumbula isandla sakhe, Imini awabakhulula ngayo embandezelweni;

43.verse: Awamisa ngayo imiqondiso yakhe eYiputa, Nezimanga zakhe emhlabeni waseTsohan.

44.verse: Wayiguqula imijelo yabo, yaba ligazi, Ababa nakuyisela imiqukuqela yabo yamanzi.

45.verse: Wathumela kubo iingcongconi, zabadla; Namasele,  abatshabalalisa.

46.verse: Izilimo zabo wazinika iinkumbi ezinqunquthayo, Ukuxelenga kwabo wakunika iinkumbi ezandayo.

47.verse: Wawubulala ngesichotho umdiliya wabo, Nemithombe yabo ngomkhenkce.

48.verse: Wayinikela kwisichotho imfuyo yabo, Nemihlambi yabo ngemibane.

49.verse: Wathumela kubo ukuvutha komsindo wakhe, Ukuphuphuma kwawo,  nokubhavuma, nembandezelo, Ibutho lezithunywa zobubi.

50.verse: Wawulungelelanisela umendo umsindo wakhe, Akawunqanda ekufeni umphefumlo wabo, Wabunikela ubomi babo kwindyikitya yokufa.

51.verse: Wababulala bonke abamazibulo eYiputa, Iintlahlela zamandla obudoda ezintenteni zakwaHam.

52.verse: Abantu bakhe wabafudusa njengezimvu, Wabaqhuba njengomhlambi entlango;

53.verse: Wabakhapha bekholosile, bengankwantyi; Ke zona iintshaba zabo lwazigubungela ulwandle

54.verse: Wabazisa emdeni wakhe ongcwele, Kule ntaba sayizuzayo isandla sakhe sokunene.

55.verse: Wagxotha iintlanga ebusweni babo, Wazenzela amaqashiso zalilifa elicandiweyo; Izizwe zakwaSirayeli wazihlalisa ezintenteni zazo.

56.verse: Kodwa bamlinga, bamphikisa uThixo Osenyangweni, Abazigcina izingqiniso zakhe,

57.verse: Babuya unuva, banginiza njengooyise. Bajika njengesaphetha esikhohlisayo.

58.verse: Bamqumbisa ngeziganga zabo, Bamkhweletisa ngemifanekiso yabo eqingqiweyo.

59.verse: Weva uThixo, waphuphuma umsindo, Wawacekisa kakhulu amaSirayeli;

60.verse: Wawulahla umnquba waseShilo, Intente abeyimise esintwini;

61.verse: Wawanikela ekuthinjweni amandla akhe, Isihombo sakhe esandleni sombandezeli.

62.verse: Wabanikela abantu bakhe kwikrele, Umsindo wakhe waphuphumela ilifa lakhe.

63.verse: Amadodana abo adliwa ngumlilo, Iintombi zabo azagcotyelwa.

64.verse: Ababingeleli babo bawa likrele, Abahlolokazi babo abalila.

65.verse: Yaza yavuka njengobelele iNkosi, Njengegorha elimemeleliswa yiwayini.

66.verse: Yababetha ngasemva ababandezeli bayo, Yabenza ingcikivo engunaphakade.

67.verse: Yayicekisa intente yakwaYosefu, Ayasinyula isizwe sakwaEfrayim.

68.verse: Yanyula isizwe sakwaYuda, Intaba yaseZiyon eyayithandayo.

69.verse: Yayakha njengokuphakama kwezulu ingcwele yakhe,  Njengomhlaba lo awusekileyo ngonaphakade.

70.verse: Yanyula uDavide umkhonzi wayo, Yamthabatha ezibayeni zezimvu;

71.verse: Yamthabatha elandela izimvu ezanyisayo, Yamzisa ukuba aluse kwaYakobi abantu bayo, KwaSirayeli ilifa layo.

72.verse: Wabalusa ke ngengqibelelo yentliziyo yakhe, Wabakhapha ngokwazi kwezandla zakhe.

1.verse: Umhobe ka-Asafu. Thixo, iintlanga zingene elifeni lakho,  Ziyenze inqambi itempile yakho engcwele; Ziyenze yayimiwewe iYerusalem.

2.verse: Izidumbu zabakhonzi bakho zizinike iintaka zezulu ukuba zizidle, Nenyama yabakho benceba ziyinike amarhamncwa elizwe.

3.verse: Ziliphalazile igazi labo njengamanzi ngeenxa zonke eYerusalem; Akwabakho mngcwabi.

4.verse: Senziwe ingcikivo kubamelwane bethu, Isigculelo nesicukucezo kwabasingqongileyo.

5.verse: Kunini na, Yehova, uhleli uqumbile? Liya kuvutha njengomlilo na ikhwele lakho?

6.verse: Phalaza ubushushu bakho ezintlangeni ezingakwaziyo,  Ezikumkanini ezingalinquliyo igama lakho.

7.verse: Ngokuba zimdlile uYakobi, Zalenza inxuwa ikhaya lakhe.

8.verse: Musa ukubukhumbula kuthi ubugwenxa bamanyange ethu,  Mayingxame isikhawulele imfesane yakho: Ngokuba siswele kakhulu.

9.verse: Sincede, Thixo ongumsindisi wethu, ngenxa yozuko lwegama lakho, Usihlangule, uzixolele ngocamagushelo izono zethu ngenxa yegama lakho.

10.verse: Yini na ukuba iintlanga zithi kuthi, Uphi na uThixo wabo?  Makwazeke ezintlangeni, emehlweni ethu, Ukuphindezelwa kwegazi labakhonzi bakho eliphalaziweyo.

11.verse: Makuze phambi kwakho ukugcuma kwamakhonkxwa; Ngokobukhulu bengalo yakho basalise oonyana bokufa.

12.verse: Yibuyisele kubamelwane bethu kasixhenxe esondweni lengubo yabo Ingcikivo yabo, abakungcikive ngayo, Nkosi.

13.verse: Ke thina bantu bakho, zimvu zaluswa nguwe, Siya kubulela kuwe ngonaphakade, Sibalise ngendumiso yakho kwizizukulwana ngezizukulwana.

1.verse: Kumongameli; ngeyeenyibiba ezingqinisayo. Ka-Asafu.  Umhobe. Ulomalusi kaSirayeli, beka indlebe! Uloqhuba uYosefu njengezimvu, Ulohlala ezikerubhini, bengezela!

2.verse: Phambi koEfrayim noBhenjamin noManase, Vusa ubugorha bakho,  Uze kusisindisa.

3.verse: Thixo, sibuyise, Ukhanyise ubuso bakho, sisindiswe.

4.verse: Yehova, Thixo wemikhosi, Kunini na uqhuma umsindo wakho ekuthandazeni kwabantu bakho?

5.verse: Ubadlisa isonka seenyembezi, Wabaseza iinyembezi ngemilinganiso.

6.verse: Usenze into abaxabana ngayo abamelwane bethu; Iintshaba zethu ziyasigculela.

7.verse: Thixo wemikhosi, sibuyise, Ukhanyise ubuso bakho,  sisindiswe.

8.verse: Wanyothula umdiliya eYiputa, Wagxotha iintlanga, wawutyala;

9.verse: Wahlahla phambi kwawo, Wendelisa iingcambu, wazalisa ilizwe.

10.verse: Zagutyungelwa iintaba ngumthunzi wawo, Nemisedare kaThixo ngamasebe awo.

11.verse: Wasa amasebe awo elwandle, Namagatya awo kuwo uMlambo.

12.verse: Uzityhobozeleni na iintango zawo, Ukuze bawukhe bonke abadlula ngendlela?

13.verse: Ingulube yasehlathini iyawubhuqa, Nento edakasa endle iyawudla.

14.verse: Thixo wemikhosi, khawubuye, Uqondele usemazulwini, ubone,  Uwuvelele lo mdiliya.

15.verse: Yikhusele into esiyityeleyo isandla sakho sokunene, Unyana lo uzizimaseleyo ngokwakho.

16.verse: Utshisiwe ngumlilo, uhlahliwe; Bayadaka ngokusongela kobuso bakho.

17.verse: Isandla sakho masibe phezu komfo wesandla sakho sokunene,  Phezu koonyana babantu, ozizimaseleyo ngokwakho.

18.verse: Asiyi kumka kuwe; Siphilise, silinqule igama lakho.

19.verse: Yehova, Thixo wemikhosi, sibuyise, Ukhanyise ubuso bakho,  sisindiswe.

1.verse: Kumongameli; ngolwaseGati. Ka-Asafu. Memelelani kuThixo,  igwiba lethu, Dumani kuThixo kaYakobi.

2.verse: Hlabani ingoma, nibethe ingqongqo, Uhadi olumnandi, kunye nomrhubhe.

3.verse: Vuthelani isigodlo ukuthwasa kwenyanga, Nokuhlangana kwenyanga, ngemini yomthendeleko wethu.

4.verse: Ngokuba ngummiselo lowo kuSirayeli, Lisiko likaThixo kaYakobi.

5.verse: Sisingqiniso awasimisayo kwaYosefu, Ekucandeni kwakhe ezweni laseYiputa; Ndeva intetho endingayaziyo.

6.verse: Ndawususa umthwalo egxalabeni lakhe; Izandla zakhe zasuka ezingobozini zokuthwala.

7.verse: Embandezelweni wadanduluka wena, ndakuhlangula;  Ndakuphendula esitheni leendudumo, Ndakuvavanya emanzini aseMeribha. (Phakamisani.)

8.verse: Ndathi, Yivani, bantu bam, ndiqononondise kuni; Sirayeli,  ukuba unokuphulaphula kum!

9.verse: Makungabikho thixo wasemzini kuwe; Unganquli thixo wolunye uhlanga.

10.verse: Ndim uYehova uThixo wakho, Okunyusileyo elizweni laseYiputa. Yakhamisa, ndiwuzalise umlomo wakho.

11.verse: Ke abantu bam abaliva izwi lam, USirayeli akandivumanga.

12.verse: Ndabanikela ebungqoleni beentliziyo zabo; Bahamba ngawabo amaqhinga.

13.verse: Akwaba abantu bam bebendiva, Akwaba uSirayeli ubehamba ngendlela yam!

14.verse: Bendiya kuzithoba kamsinya iintshaba zabo, Ndisibuyisele phezu kwababandezeli babo isandla sam.

15.verse: Abamthiyayo uYehova bebeya kuhanahanisa kuye, Libe ngunaphakade ixesha labo.

16.verse: Bendiya kubadlisa ingqolowa etyebileyo, Ndibahluthise ngobusi etsilini.

1.verse: Umhobe ka-Asafu. UThixo umi ebandleni likaThixo, Ugweba phakathi koothixo; uthi,

2.verse: Kunini na nigweba ngobugqwetha, Nibanonelela abangendawo?  (Phakamisani.)

3.verse: Thethani ityala losweleyo nelenkedama, Gwebelani olusizana nolihlwempu.

4.verse: Sizani osweleyo nolihlwempu, Bahlanguleni esandleni sabangendawo.

5.verse: Abazi, abaqondi, Bahamba-hamba emnyameni; Ziyashukuma zonke iziseko zehlabathi.

6.verse: Ndithe mna, Ningoothixo, Ningoonyana bOsenyangweni nonke niphela.

7.verse: Noko niya kufa njengomntu, Niwe njengomnye kubathetheli.

8.verse: Khawusuk ume, Thixo, gweba ehlabathini; Ngokuba uya kuzidla ilifa wena zonke iintlanga.

1.verse: Ingoma. Umhobe ka-Asafu. Thixo, musa ukuthi cwaka, Musa ukuthi tu, musa ukuzola, Thixo.

2.verse: Ngokuba nanzo iintshaba zakho zixokozela; Abakuthiyayo baphakamisa intloko.

3.verse: Bagqugula igqugula elinobuqhophololo ngabantu bakho,  Bacebisane ngabagushiweyo nguwe.

4.verse: Bathi, Yizani sibethe bee shwaka, bangabi luhlanga, Lingabi sakhunjulwa igama likaSirayeli.

5.verse: Ngokuba bacebisana ngantliziyo-nye, Benza umnqophiso ngawe:

6.verse: Iintente zakwaEdom nezakwaIshmayeli, AmaMowabhi namaHagari,

7.verse: AmaGebhali nama-Amon nama-Amaleki, AmaFilisti kunye nabemi baseTire;

8.verse: Nama-Asiriya athelele kubo, Baba yingalo koonyana bakaLote.  (Phakamisani.)

9.verse: Yenza kubo njengoko wenza ngako kumaMidiyan, NakuSisera,  nakuYabhin esihlanjeni seKishon.

10.verse: Batshabalala e-Endore, Baba ngumgquba wokugalelwa emhlabeni.

11.verse: Benze bona, amanene abo ke, babe njengo-Orebhe nanjengoZebhe; Zonke iinkosi zabo zibe njengoZebha nanjengoTsalimuna;

12.verse: Bona bathi, Masiwahluthe abe ngawethu amakhaya kaThixo.

13.verse: Thixo wam, benze babe njengesaqhwithi, Njengomququ phambi komoya.

14.verse: Njengomlilo odla ihlathi, Njengedangatye lilenya intaba,

15.verse: Yenjenjalo ukubasukela ngoqhwithela lwakho, Ubakhwankqise ngomoya wakho ovuthuzayo.

16.verse: Buzalise ubuso babo ngehlazo, Balifune igama lakho,  Yehova.

17.verse: Mabadane bakhwankqiswe ngonaphakade, Babe neentloni,  badake;

18.verse: Bazi ukuba wena, ugama linguYehova, unguwe wedwa Osenyangweni phezu kwehlabathi lonke.

1.verse: Kumongameli; ngolwaseGati. Eyoonyana bakaKora. Umhobe.  Hayi, ukuthandeka kweminquba yakho, Yehova wemikhosi!

2.verse: Umphefumlo wam ulangazelela, uyaphela kukuzilangazelela,  iintendelezo zikaYehova; Intliziyo yam nenyama yam imemelela kuThixo ophilileyo.

3.verse: Intakana le ifumene ikhaya; Inkonjane izifumanele indlu,  Apho izalela khona amathole ayo: Izibingelelo zakho, Yehova wemikhosi, Kumkani wam, Thixo wam.

4.verse: Hayi, uyolo lwabahlala endlwini yakho! Basaya kukudumisa.  (Phakamisani.)

5.verse: Hayi, uyolo lwabantu abamandla akuwe, Abakhumbula umendo oya eZiyon!

6.verse: Bephumela entilini yemithi yeBhaka, Bayenza ibe nemithombo;  Ewe, imvula iyithi wambu ngentsikelelo.

7.verse: Baya besomelela ngokomelela; Babonakala phambi koThixo eZiyon, bathi,

8.verse: Yehova, Thixo wemikhosi, Wuve umthandazo wam, Wubekele indlebe, Thixo kaYakobi. (Phakamisani.)

9.verse: Khangela, Thixo, ngweletshetshe yethu, Ubukhangele ubuso bomthanjiswa wakho.

10.verse: Ngokuba imini enye ezintendelezweni zakho ilungile kunewaka; Ndinyule ukuba semnyango endlwini kaThixo wam,  Kunokuhlala ngaphakathi kweentente zokungendawo.

11.verse: Ngokuba ulilanga, uyingweletshetshe uYehova uThixo,  UYehova uyababala azukise; Abahamba ngokugqibeleleyo akabavimbi nto ilungileyo.

12.verse: Yehova wemikhosi, Hayi, uyolo lomntu okholose ngawe!

1.verse: Kumongameli; eyoonyana bakaKora. Umhobe. Yehova, wabe unetarhu kwilizwe lakho. Ububabuyisa abathinjwa bakaYakobi;

2.verse: Ububuxolela ubugwenxa babantu bakho, Ubuziselela zonke izono zabo. (Phakamisani.)

3.verse: Ubuwufinyeza umsindo wakho ophuphumayo, Ububuya ekuvutheni komsindo wakho.

4.verse: Sibuyise, Thixo ongumsindisi wethu, Uyisuse ingqumbo yakho kuthi.

5.verse: Uya kusiqumbela ngonaphakade na? Umsindo wakho uya kuwolulela kwizizukulwana ngezizukulwana na?

6.verse: Akuyi kubuya usiphilise na, Abantu bakho bavuye ngawe?

7.verse: Sibonise inceba yakho, Yehova, Siphe usindiso lwakho.

8.verse: Mandive oko aya kukuthetha uThixo, uYehova; Hayi, uthetha uxolo kubantu bakhe nakwabakhe benceba; Mabangabuyeli ke ekunyabeni kwabo.

9.verse: Inene, usindiso lwakhe lusondele kwabamoyikayo, Ukuze luhlale uzuko ezweni lakowethu.

10.verse: Kuya kuqubisana inceba nenyaniso, Kuya kwangana ubulungisa noxolo.

11.verse: Inyaniso iya kuntshula emhlabeni, Ubulungisa buqondele busemazulwini.

12.verse: Kananjalo uYehova uya kusinika okulungileyo, Ilizwe lethu lisinike indyebo yalo.

13.verse: Ubulungisa buya kuhamba phambi kwakhe, Buyigqale ngentliziyo indlela yokunyathela kwakhe.

1.verse: Umthandazo kaDavide. Thoba indlebe yakho, Yehova,  ndiphendule, Ngokuba ndilusizana, ndilihlwempu.

2.verse: Wugcine umphefumlo wam, ngokuba ndingowenceba; Msindise,  wena Thixo wam, umkhonzi wakho, Lo ukholose ngawe.

3.verse: Ndibabale, Nkosi yam, Ngokuba ndidanduluka kuwe yonke imini.

4.verse: Wuvuyise umphefumlo womkhonzi wakho, Ngokuba umphefumlo wam ndiwuphakamisela kuwe, Nkosi yam;

5.verse: Ngokuba ulungile wena, Nkosi yam, uxolela; Umkhulu ngenceba kubo bonke abakunqulayo.

6.verse: Wubekele indlebe umthandazo wam, Yehova, Ulibazele indlebe izwi lokutarhuzisa kwam.

7.verse: Ngemini yokubandezelwa kwam ndinqula wena, Ngokuba uya kundiphendula.

8.verse: Akukho unjengawe, Nkosi yam, phakathi koothixo; Akukho zenzo zinjengezakho.

9.verse: Zonke iintlanga owazenzayo ziya kuza ziqubude phambi kwakho, Nkosi yam, Zizukise igama lakho.

10.verse: Ngokuba umkhulu, wenza imisebenzi ebalulekileyo, UnguThixo wena wedwa.

11.verse: Ndiyalele, Yehova, indlela yakho, Ndihambe ngenyaniso yakho; Yibandakanye intliziyo yam ukuba ndiloyike igama lakho.

12.verse: Ndiya kubulela kuwe, Nkosi yam, Thixo wam, ngentliziyo yonke, Ndilizukise igama lakho ngonaphakade:

13.verse: Ngokuba inceba yakho ibe inkulu kum; Wawuhlangula umphefumlo wam kwelingaphantsi labafileyo.

14.verse: Thixo, abakhukhumali basukele phezulu kum; Ibandla labanobungqwangangqwili lifuna umphefumlo wam; Abakumisi wena phambi kwabo.

15.verse: Ke wena, Nkosi yam, unguThixo onemfesane, onobabalo, Ozeka kade umsindo, omkhulu ngenceba nenyaniso.

16.verse: Ndibheke, undibabale; Mphe amandla akho umkhonzi wakho,  Umsindise unyana womkhonzazana wakho.

17.verse: Ndenzele umqondiso wokulungileyo, Bawubone abandithiyayo,  badane, Kuba wena, Yehova, undincedile, wandithuthuzela.

1.verse: Eyoonyana bakaKora. Umhobe. Ingoma. Useko alusekileyo lusezintabeni ezingcwele;

2.verse: Amasango eZiyon uYehova uwathanda Ngaphezu kweminquba yonke kaYakobi.

3.verse: Kuthethwa iinto ezizukileyo ngawe, Mzi kaThixo.  (Phakamisani.)

4.verse: ORahabhi noBhabheli ndiya kubakhankanyela kwabandaziyo;  Nalo elamaFilisti nelaseTire, kunye nelakwaKushi, Aba bazalelwe khona.

5.verse: Ngokusingisele kwiZiyon, kuya kuthiwa, Lo, nalo, uzalelwe kuyo, Abe yena Osenyangweni eyizinzisa.

6.verse: UYehova uya kubala, ekuzibhaleni izizwi, athi, Abaya bazalelwe khona: (Phakamisani.)

7.verse: Baze, bevuma beqamba, bathi, Yonke imithombo yam ikuwe.

1.verse: Ingoma; umhobe woonyana bakaKora; kumongameli; ngosizi,  ngelidambileyo. Owokuqiqa kaHeman umEzra. Yehova, Thixo ongumsindisi wam, Mhlenikweni ndikhalayo ebusuku phambi kwakho,

2.verse: Mawuze phambi kwakho umthandazo wam; Thoba indlebe yakho ekuhlahlambeni kwam.

3.verse: Ngokuba umphefumlo wam uhluthi zizinto ezimbi, Ubomi bam bufike kwelabafileyo.

4.verse: Ndibalelwe kwabahla baye emhadini, Ndisuke ndanjengomfo ongenamandla

5.verse: Ndingumkhululwa phakathi kwabafileyo, Njengababuleweyo,  belele engcwabeni, Ongasabakhumbuliyo; Bona banqunyulweyo esandleni sakho.

6.verse: Undibeke emhadini ongaphantsi, Ezindaweni ezimnyama,  ezinzulwini.

7.verse: Ubushushu bakho bundishicilele, Undithobele onke amaza akho alwayo. (Phakamisani.)

8.verse: Ubashenxisele kude kum abo ndazana nabo, Undenze isikizi kubo; Ndivalelwe, andinakuphuma.

9.verse: Iliso lam liyaphela yingcinezelo. Ndidanduluka kuwe,  Yehova, yonke imini, Ndizolulela kuwe izandla zam.

10.verse: Uya kuyenzela abafileyo na imisebenzi ebalulekileyo? Kuya kuvuka abangasekhoyo, kusini na, babulele kuwe? (Phakamisani.)

11.verse: Ibaliswa engcwabeni na inceba yakho? Enzonzobileni na,  ukunyanisa kwakho?

12.verse: Yaziswa emnyameni na imisebenzi yakho ebalulekileyo?  Baziswa ezweni lokulibala na ubulungisa bakho?

13.verse: Ke mna, Yehova, ndizibika kuwe, Kwakusasa umthandazo wam wokuhlangabeza.

14.verse: Uwuhlambelani na, Yehova, umphefumlo wam? Ubusitheliselani na ubuso bakho kum?

15.verse: Ndilusizana, ndiyinto efayo kwasebuncinaneni bam,  Ndithwele izothuso zakho, lindikhohlile.

16.verse: Kugqithe phezu kwamukuvutha kwakho, Izidandathekiso zakho zindibhangisile;

17.verse: Zindijikelezile njengamanzi imini yonke, Zindizungulezile kwaphela.

18.verse: Umsusile kum ondithandayo nonguwethu; Abo ndazana nabo babubumnyama.

1.verse: Eyokuqiqa kaEtan, umEzra. Iinceba zikaYehova ndiya kuvuma ngazo ngonaphakade, Kwizizukulwana ngezizukulwana ndiya kwazisa ukuthembeka kwakho ngomlomo wam.

2.verse: Ngokuba ndithi, Yakheka ngonaphakade inceba; Amazulu, uya kukuzinzisa kuwo ukuthembeka kwakho.

3.verse: Wathi, Ndenze umnqophiso nomnyulwa wam, Ndifungile kuDavide umkhonzi wam:

4.verse: Ndiya kuyizimasa ngonaphakade imbewu yakho, Ndiyakhe itrone yakho kwisizukulwana ngesizukulwana. (Phakamisani.)

5.verse: Amazulu abulela imisebenzi yakho ebalulekileyo, Yehova,  Nokuthembeka kwakho ebandleni labangcwele.

6.verse: Ngokuba ngubani na esibhakabhakeni olingana noYehova?  Ngubani na ofana noYehova phakathi koonyana bakaThixo.

7.verse: UThixo ongowokungcangcazelelwa ebhungeni elikhulu labangcwele, Ongofanelwe kukoyikwa ngaphezu kwabo bonke abamngqongileyo?

8.verse: Yehova, Thixo wemikhosi, Ngubani na onjengawe, oluqilima,  Yehova? Ukuthembeka kwakho kukungqongile.

9.verse: Nguwena mlawuli wekratshi lolwandle; Ekuphakameni kwamaza alo uyawadambisa.

10.verse: Nguwena mtyumzi kaRahabhi njengongxwelerhiweyo, Wazithi saa iintshaba zakho ngengalo yakho eqinileyo.

11.verse: Lelakho izulu, likwalelakho ihlabathi; Elimiweyo nenzaliseko yalo lasekwa nguwe.

12.verse: Umntla nomzantsi wadalwa nguwe; ITabhore neHermon zimemelela ngegama lakho.

13.verse: Yeyakho ingalo enobugorha; Sithe nkqi isandla sakho,  siphakamile esokunene sakho.

14.verse: Ummiso wetrone yakho bubulungisa nokusesikweni; Inceba nenyaniso ilungiselela phambi kwakho.

15.verse: Hayi, uyolo lwabantu abakwaziyo ukuduma! Baya kuhamba ekukhanyeni kobuso bakho, Yehova.

16.verse: Baya kugcoba egameni lakho imini yonke, Baphakame ngobulungisa bakho.

17.verse: Ngokuba isihombo samandla abo nguwe; Ekuthandeni kwakho,  uphondo lwethu luphakamile.

18.verse: Ngokuba ikuYehova ingweletshetshe yethu, UkoyiNgcwele kaSirayeli ukumkani wethu.

19.verse: Wakha wathetha ngombono kowenceba wakho, wathi, Ndibeke uncedo egorheni, Ndiphakamise indodana ebantwini.

20.verse: Ndifumene uDavide umkhonzi wam; Ndimthambisile ngeoli yam engcwele,

21.verse: Esiya kuqinisela kuye isandla sam, Nengalo yam imkhaliphise.

22.verse: Utshaba aluyi kumqubula; Nonyana wobugqwetha akayi kumcinezela.

23.verse: Ndiya kubaqoba phambi kwakhe ababandezeli bakhe,  Ndibaxabele abamthiyayo.

24.verse: Inyaniso yam nenceba yam inaye; Luya kuphakama uphondo lwakhe egameni lam.

25.verse: Ndiya kusisa elwandle isandla sakhe, EMilanjeni esokunene sakhe.

26.verse: Yena ukundibiza wothi, UnguBawo, UnguThixo wam, neliwa lokundisindisa.

27.verse: Kananjalo mna ndiya kumenza owamazibulo, Osenyangweni kookumkani behlabathi.

28.verse: Ndiya kumgcinela inceba yam ngonaphakade, Umnqophiso wam unyanise kuye;

29.verse: Ndiyimise ngonaphakade imbewu yakhe, Netrone yakhe ibe njengemihla yamazulu.

30.verse: Ukuba bathe oonyana bakhe bawulahla umyalelo wam, Abahamba ngamasiko am;

31.verse: Ukuba bathe bayihlambela imimiselo yam, Abayigcina imithetho yam:

32.verse: Ndoluvelela ukreqo lwabo ngentonga, Nobugwenxa babo ngemivumbo.

33.verse: Ke yona inceba yam andiyi kuyaphula kuye, Ndingaxoki ekuthembekeni kwam.

34.verse: Andiyi kuwuhlambela umnqophiso wam, Ndiyijike into ephume emlonyeni wam.

35.verse: Ndibufunge kwakanye ubungcwele bam, ndathi, Inene, andiyi kumxokisa uDavide;

36.verse: Imbewu yakhe iya kubakho ngonaphakade, Netrone yakhe njengelanga phambi kwam.

37.verse: Iya kuqiniseka njengenyanga ngonaphakade; Ingqina lasesibhakabhakeni lithembekile. (Phakamisani.)

38.verse: Kwawena umhlambile, umcekisile, Umphuphumele ngomsindo umthanjiswa wakho;

39.verse: Uthe nethe ngumnqophiso womkhonzi wakho; Usidyobhile emhlabeni isithsaba sakhe.

40.verse: Uzityhobozile zonke iintango zakhe, Uzenze inxuwa iinqaba zakhe.

41.verse: Bayamphanga bonke abadlula ngendlela, Waba yingcikivo kubamelwane bakhe.

42.verse: Usiphakamisile isandla sokunene sabambandezelayo,  Uzivuyisile zonke iintshaba zakhe.

43.verse: Wabuyisa nokubuyisa uhlangothi lwekrele lakhe, Akwammisa emfazweni.

44.verse: Umsusile enkazimlweni yakhe, Uyikhahlele emhlabeni itrone yakhe,

45.verse: Uyinqumle imihla yobutsha bakhe, Wamthi wambu ngokudana.  (Phakamisani.)

46.verse: Kunini na, Yehova, uhleli uzisithelisile, Busitsha njengomlilo ubushushu bakho?

47.verse: Khumbula ukunqamka kwam, into okuyiyo! Ubadaleleni na,  baba yinto engento bonke oonyana babantu?

48.verse: Yiyiphi na indoda ehleliyo, engayi kukubona ukufa,  Enokuwusindisa umphefumlo wayo esandleni selabafileyo?  (Phakamisani.)

49.verse: Ziphi na iinceba zakho zangaphambili, Nkosi yam,  Owamfungela zona uDavide ngokuthembeka kwakho?

50.verse: Khumbula, Nkosi yam, ukungcikiveka kwabakhonzi bakho;  Ndithwele esifubeni sam zonke izizwe ezininzi,

51.verse: Ezingcikivayo, ziziintshaba zakho, Yehova; Ezingcikiva amanyathela omthanjiswa wakho.

1.verse: Umthandazo kaMoses, umfo wakwaThixo. Nkosi yam, ulikhaya wena kuthi, Isizukulwana ngesizukulwana.

2.verse: Kungekazalwa zintaba, Ungekavelisi mhlaba, nazwe limiweyo,  Kususela kwaphakade kude kuse ephakadeni, wena unguThixo.

3.verse: Umbuyisela umntu eluthulini, Uthi, Buyani, nyana babantu.

4.verse: Ngokuba iwaka leminyaka emehlweni akho Linjengemini yezolo,  xa idluleyo, Linjengomlindo wasebusuku.

5.verse: Uyabakhukulisa, balale; Ngengomso babuya bahlume njengotyani.

6.verse: Ngomso butyatyamba, bubuye buhlume; Ngokuhlwa buyasikwa bome.

7.verse: Ngokuba siyaphela ngumsindo wakho, Sikhwankqiswe bubushushu bakho.

8.verse: Ububeke ubugwenxa bethu phambi kwakho, Nesibufihlileyo ububeka ekukhanyiseleni kobuso bakho.

9.verse: Ngokuba yonke imihla yethu isangene ngokuphuphuma komsindo wakho, Siyiphelisile iminyaka yethu njengentsebezo.

10.verse: Imihla yeminyaka yethu iseminyakeni engamashumi asixhenxe;  Ukuba ithe yaba mininzi kakhulu, iba yiminyaka emashumi asibhozo, Libe ke iqhayiya layo likukwaphuka nokungabi nto yanto, Ngokuba ithe phe yakhawuleza, saphaphazela semka.

11.verse: Ngubani na owaziyo amandla omsindo wakho, Nokuphuphuma kwawo, ngoko ufanele ukoyikwa ngako?

12.verse: Sazise kanye ukuyibala imihla yethu, Ukuze sizuze intliziyo elumkileyo.

13.verse: Buya, Yehova, kunini na? Uzohlwaye ngenxa yabakhonzi bakho.

14.verse: Sihluthise kwakusasa ngenceba yakho, Simemelele, sivuye yonke imihla yethu.

15.verse: Sivuyise ngangemihla owasicinezela ngayo. Ngangeminyaka esabona ububi ngayo.

16.verse: Mayibonakale kubakhonzi bakho imisebenzi yakho,  Nobungangamela bakho koonyana babo.

17.verse: Ubumnandi bukaYehova mabube phezu kwethu. Zimasa isenzo sezandla zethu phezu kwethu, Isenzo sezandla zethu usizimase sona.

1.verse: Ohleli esitheni lOsenyangweni, Azilalise emthunzini kaSomandla,

2.verse: Uthi kuYehova, Hlathi lam, Mboniselo yam, Thixo wam,  endikholose ngaye!

3.verse: Ngokuba ngokwakhe uya kukuhlangula emgibeni womthiyeli,  Endyikityeni yokufa eyeyelisayo.

4.verse: Wokugubungela ngeentsiba zakhe, Uzimele phantsi kwamaphiko akhe. Likhaka, yingweletshetshe inyaniso yakhe.

5.verse: Akuyi koyikiswa zizothuso ebusuku, Nalutolo lubaleka emini;

6.verse: Nandyikitya yakufa ihamba esithokothokweni, Nasifo sibhubhisayo, sibhuqa emini enkulu.

7.verse: Kungawa iwaka ecaleni kwakho, Isigidi ngasekunene kwakho,  Kodwa kungasondeli nto kuwe.

8.verse: Wokhangela ngamehlo akho odwa, Ukubonele ukubuyekezwa kwabangendawo.

9.verse: Ngokuba nguwe, Yehova, ihlathi lam. Umenze Osenyangweni ikhaya lakho.

10.verse: Akuyi kuqubisana bubi nawe. Kungafiki sibetho ententeni yakho.

11.verse: Ngokuba izithunywa zakhe uziwisele umthetho ngawe, Ukuba zikugcine ezindleleni zakho zonke.

12.verse: Zokuthwala wena ngezandla zozibini, Hleze ubetheke ngonyawo lwakho etyeni.

13.verse: Wonyathela phezu kwengonyama nephimpi, Uyinyashe ingonyama entsha nenamba ngeenyawo.

14.verse: Ngokuba enamathele kum, ndomsiza; Ndimse engxondeni,  ngokuba elazi igama lam.

15.verse: Wondibiza, ndiphendule, Ndoba naye embandezelweni;  Ndomhlangula, ndimzukise;

16.verse: Ndimanelise ngemihla emide, Ndimbonise ukusindisa kwam.

1.verse: Umhobe; ingoma, ngemini yesabatha. Kulungile ukubulela kuYehova, Nokulibethela uhadi igama lakho, Wena usenyangweni;

2.verse: Ukuyixela kwakusasa inceba yakho, Nokunyanisa kwakho ebusuku,

3.verse: Ngoweentambo ezilishumi nangomrhubhe, Ngokulubetha uhadi ngofefe.

4.verse: Ngokuba uyandivuyisa, Yehova, ngomsebenzi wakho, Ngezenzo zezandla zakho ndinokumemelela.

5.verse: Azizikhulu izenzo zakho, Yehova! Zinzulu kakhulu iingcinga zakho.

6.verse: Isityhakala asinakwazi; Isinyabi asikuqondi oko.

7.verse: Ekudubuleni kongendawo njengomfuno, Ekutyatyambeni kwabasebenzi bonke bobutshinga, Kukuze batshabalale ngonaphakade.

8.verse: Ke wena, Yehova, ungophezulu ngonaphakade.

9.verse: Ngokuba uyabona, iintshaba zakho, Yehova, Ngokuba uyabona,  iintshaba zakho ziva kutshabalala; Baya kuchithwa-chithwa bonke abasebenzi bobutshinga.

10.verse: Uyaluphakamisa uphondo lwam njengolwenqu; Ndigalelwe ioli entsha.

11.verse: Iliso lam liyababonela abandilalelayo, Indlebe yam iyabeva abasukela phezulu kum benobubi.

12.verse: Amalungisa aya kudubula njengesundu, Aya kukhula njengomsedare weLebhanon.

13.verse: Etyelwe nje endlwini kaYehova, Aya kutyatyamba ezintendelezweni zoThixo wethu.

14.verse: Aya kuhluma eselenezimvi, Aya kuba etyebile, eluhlaza;

15.verse: Ukuze axele ukuba uthe tye uYehova, Uliwa lam, kungekho bugqwetha kuye.

1.verse: UYehova ungukumkani, uzambathise ubungangamsha; UYehova uzambathise, ubhinqe, amandla; Lizinzile ke elimiweyo,  alinakushukunyiswa.

2.verse: Kususela koko, izinzile itrone yakho; Kususela kwaphakade,  ukho wena.

3.verse: Imilambo iphakamisile, Yehova, Imilambo iphakamise isandi sayo, Imilambo iphakamise ingxolo yayo.

4.verse: Ngaphezu kwezandi zamanzi amaninzi Angangamsha, ngaphezu kwamaza alwayo olwandle, Unobungangamsha phezulu uYehova.

5.verse: Izingqiniso zakho zinyanise kunene, Ubungcwele buyifanele indlu yakho, Yehova, imihla emide.

1.verse: Thixo wempindezelo, Yehova, Thixo wempindezelo, bengezela!

2.verse: Phakama, Mgwebi wehlabathi! Babuyisele impatho yabo abanekratshi.

3.verse: Kunini na abangendawo, Yehova, Kunini na abangendawo bevuyelela?

4.verse: Balephuza amagwebu, bathetha ngokusa, Bayandolosa bonke abasebenzi bobutshinga.

5.verse: Batyumza abantu bakho, Yehova, Bacinezela ilifa lakho.

6.verse: Babulala umhlolokazi nowasemzini, Bancinitha inkedama.

7.verse: Bathi ke, Akaboni uYehova, Akagqali uThixo kaYakobi.

8.verse: Qondani, nina bazizityhakala ebantwini; Nina zinyabi, niya kuqiqa nini na?

9.verse: Omilisele indlebe, akayi kuva na? Obumbe iliso, akayi kukhangela na?

10.verse: Umthethisi weentlanga akayi kohlwaya na, Ulofundisa abantu ukwazi?

11.verse: UYehova ngumazi weengcinga zabantu, Ukuba zingumphunga.

12.verse: Hayi, uyolo lwendoda oyithethisayo, Yehova, Oyifundisayo ngomyalelo wakho;

13.verse: Ukuba uyizolise eziminini zobubi, Ade ambelwe isihogo ongendawo.

14.verse: Ngokuba uYehova akabalahli abantu bakhe, Akalishiyi ilifa lakhe.

15.verse: Ngokuba isiko liya kubuyela ebulungiseni, Balilandele bonke abantliziyo zithe tye.

16.verse: Ngubani na oya kusukela phezulu kubo abanobubi, ngenxa yam? Ngubani na oya kumelana nabasebenzi bobutshinga, ngenxa yam?

17.verse: Koko uYehova abe luncedo lwam, Umphefumlo wam unge uhle msinya, waya apho kuthiwa cwaka khona.

18.verse: Ukuba ndithi, Lwatyibilika unyawo lwam, Isuka inceba yakho, Yehova, indixhase.

19.verse: Ebuninzini beengcinga-ngcinga zam ngaphakathi kwam,  Iintuthuzelo zakho ziyawuyolisa umphefumlo wam.

20.verse: Ingaqhelana nawe na itrone yolweyeliselo, Ebumba ububi ngommiselo?

21.verse: Bahlanganyela umphefumlo welungisa, Baligwebe igazi elimsulwa.

22.verse: Kanti ke uYehova uyingxonde kum, UThixo wam liliwa endizimela ngalo.

23.verse: Ububuyisela phezu kwabo ubutshinga babo, Uba bhangisa ngobubi babo; Uya kubabhangisa uYehova, uThixo wethu.

1.verse: Yizani simemelele kuYehova, Sidume kwiliwa lokusindiswa kwethu.

2.verse: Masize phambi kobuso bakhe sinombulelo, Masidume kuye ngeengoma.

3.verse: Ngokuba uThixo omkhulu nguYehova, NguKumkani omkhulu ngaphezu koothixo bonke.

4.verse: Uzisesandleni sakhe iingontsingontsi zehlabathi, Neencopho zeentaba zezakhe.

5.verse: Ulolwakhe ulwandle, nguyena walwenzayo; Nomhlaba owomileyo zawubumba izandla zakhe.

6.verse: Yizani, masiqubude, siguqe, Sithobe phambi koYehova umenzi wethu.

7.verse: Ngokuba nguThixo wethu yena, Thina ke singabantu bokwaluswa nguye, nezimvu zesandla sakhe. Namhla, ukuba ninokuliva izwi lakhe,

8.verse: Musani ukuyenza lukhuni intliziyo yenu, njengaseMeribha,  Njengemini yaseMasa entlango;

9.verse: Oko bandilingayo ooyihlo. Bandicikida, bewubona umsebenzi wam.

10.verse: Iminyaka yaba ngamashumi amane ndikruqukile sesi sizukulwana, Ndathi, Ngabantu abantliziyo zindwendwayo, Abazazi iindlela zam bona;

11.verse: Endada ndafunga ndinomsindo, ukuthi, Inene, abasayi kungena ekuphumleni kwam.

1.verse: Vumani kuYehova ingoma entsha, Vumani kuYehova, nonke hlabathi.

2.verse: Vumani kuYehova, bongani igama lakhe, Shumayelani iimini ngeemini iindaba ezilungileyo zosindiso lwakhe.

3.verse: Balisani ezintlangeni uzuko lwakhe, Balisani ezizweni zonke imisebenzi yakhe ebalulekileyo;

4.verse: Ngokuba mkhulu uYehova, engowokudunyiswa kunene; Uyoyikeka yena ngaphezu koothixo bonke.

5.verse: Ngokuba bonke oothixo bezizwe abanto zanto; UYehova yena wenza amazulu.

6.verse: Yindili nobungangamela phambi kwakhe, Ngamandla nokuhomba engcweleni yakhe.

7.verse: Mnikeni uYehova, nina mizalwane yezizwe, Mnikeni uYehova uzuko namandla;

8.verse: Mnikeni uYehova uzuko lwegama lakhe; Thwalani umnikelo,  nize ezintendelezweni zakhe.

9.verse: Mnquleni uYehova, nivethe ezingcwele, Thuthumelani phambi kwakhe, nonke hlabathi.

10.verse: Yithini ezintlangeni, UYehova ngukumkani, Liya kuzinza ngoko elimiweyo, lingashukumi, Uya kugweba phakathi kwezizwe ngokuthe tye.

11.verse: Liya kuvuya izulu, Ligcobe ihlabathi; Luya kugquma ulwandle, nenzaliseko yalo.

12.verse: Liya kudlamka ilizwe, nento yonke ekulo, Ize imemelele yonke imithi yehlathi

13.verse: Phambi koYehova, ngokuba esiza, Ngokuba esiza kugweba ihlabathi. Uya kuligweba elimiweyo ngobulungisa, Nezizwe ngokunyanisa kwakhe.

1.verse: UYehova ngukumkani; liyagcoba ihlabathi, Ziyavuya iziqithi ezininzi.

2.verse: Ngamafu nesithokothoko ngeenxa zonke kuye, Bubulungisa nokusesikweni ummiso wetrone yakhe.

3.verse: Kuhamba umlilo phambi kwakhe; Ulenya ababandezeli bakhe ngeenxa zonke.

4.verse: Ikhanyisa elimiweyo imibane yakhe; Uyabona umhlaba,  uzibhija-bhije.

5.verse: Iintaba zinyibilika njengomthwebeba phambi koYehova, Phambi kweNkosi yehlabathi lonke.

6.verse: Izulu lixela ubulungisa bakhe, Zilubone uzuko lwakhe zonke izizwe.

7.verse: Badanile bonke abakhonza umfanekiso oqingqiweyo, Abaqhayisa ngeento ezingento; Bayamnqula bonke oothixo.

8.verse: Iyeva, iyavuya iZiyon, Ziyagcoba iintombi zakwaYuda, Ngenxa yemigwebo yakho, Yehova.

9.verse: Ngokuba nguwe, Yehova, Osenyangweni phezu kwehlabathi lonke; Unyukile kunene ngaphezu koothixo bonke.

10.verse: Bathandi bakaYehova, kuthiyeni okubi. Umgcini wemiphefumlo yabenceba bakhe Uya kubahlangula esandleni sabangendawo.

11.verse: Ukukhanya likuhlwayelelwe ilungisa, Novuyo baluhlwayelelwe abantliziyo zithe tye.

12.verse: Vuyani ngoYehova, malungisa, Nibulele isikhumbuzo sakhe esingcwele.

1.verse: Umhobe. Vumani kuYehova ingoma entsha, Ngokuba wenze imisebenzi ebalulekileyo; Simzuzele uloyiso isandla sakhe sokunene, nengalo yakhe engcwele.

2.verse: Ulwazisile uYehova usindiso lwakhe, Ubutyhilile emehlweni eentlanga ubulungisa bakhe.

3.verse: Ukhumbule inceba yakhe nokunyanisa kwakhe kwindlu kaSirayeli; Zilubonile zonke iziphelo zehlabathi usindiso loThixo wethu.

4.verse: Dumani kuYehova, nonke hlabathi, Gqobhokelani ekumemeleleni, nibethe uhadi.

5.verse: Mbetheleni uhadi uYehova, Uhadi nelizwi lengoma;

6.verse: Ngamaxilongo nezwi lesigodlo Dumani phambi koKumkani uYehova.

7.verse: Malugqume ulwandle nenzaliseko yalo, Elimiweyo nabemi balo.

8.verse: Imilambo mayibethe izandla, Zimemelele kunye iintaba

9.verse: Phambi koYehova, ngokuba esiza kugweba ihlabathi. Uya kuligweba elimiweyo ngobulungisa, Izizwe ngokuthe tye.

1.verse: UYehova nguKumkani, ziyagungqa izizwe; Ulohlala ekerubhini,  liyashukuma ihlabathi.

2.verse: UYehova mkhulu eZiyon; Uphakamile ngaphezu kwezizwe zonke.

3.verse: Baya kulibulela igama lakho elikhulu eloyikekayo; Ngokuba ungcwele yena.

4.verse: Amandla okumkani athanda okusesikweni; Uwazimasile wena ngokuthe tye; Wenze okusesikweni nobulungisa kwaYakobi wena.

5.verse: Mphakamiseni uYehova, uThixo wethu, Niqubude esitulweni seenyawo zakhe; Ngokuba ungcwele yena.

6.verse: OoMoses noAron phakathi kwababingeleli bakhe, NoSamuweli phakathi kwabalinqulayo igama lakhe, Baye bebiza kuYehova,  wabaphendula yena.

7.verse: Wathetha kubo esemqulwini welifu; Bazigcina izingqino zakhe, Nommiselo awabanika wona.

8.verse: Yehova, Thixo wethu, wabaphendula wena, Waba nguThixo oxolelayo kubo, Ongoziphindezelayo iintlondi zabo.

9.verse: Mphakamiseni uYehova, uThixo wethu, Niqubude entabeni yakhe engcwele; Ngokuba ungcwele uYehova uThixo wethu.

1.verse: Umhobe wombingelelo wokubulela. Dumani kuYehova, nonke hlabathi.

2.verse: Mkhonzeni uYehova nivuya; Yizani phambi kwakhe nimemelela.

3.verse: Yazini ukuba uYehova nguThixo yena; Wasenza yena,  asisithi; Singabantu bakhe nezimvu ezaluswa nguye.

4.verse: Ngenani emasangweni akhe nibulela, Ezintendelezweni zakhe nidumisa; Bulelani kuye, bongani igama lakhe.

5.verse: Ngokuba uYehova ulungile, Inceba yakhe ingunaphakade,  Ukunyaniseka kwakhe kukwizizukulwana ngezizukulwana.

1.verse: EkaDavide. Umhobe. Ndiya kuvuma ngenceba nangomgwebo;  Ndiya kukubethela uhadi, Yehova.

2.verse: Ndiya kuqiqa indlela yengqibelelo; Uya kuza nini na kum?  Ndiya kuhamba ngengqibelelo yentliziyo yam Phakathi kwendlu yam.

3.verse: Andiyi kubeka phambi kwamehlo am Nto inobutshijolo.  Ukwenza ngokunxaxha ndikuthiyile, Akuyi kunamathela kum.

4.verse: Intliziyo ejibilizayo iya kukhwelela kude kum; Into embi andiyi kuyazi.

5.verse: Omhlebayo ummelwane wakhe ngasese, Lowo ndiya kumbhangisa.  Omehlo aqwayingileyo, ontliziyo igungubeleyo, Lowo andinakumthwala.

6.verse: Amehlo am akwabanyanisayo ezweni, Ukuba bandiphahle;  Ohamba ngendlela yengqibelelo, Lowo makandilungiselele.

7.verse: Akayi kuhlala phakathi kwendlu yam Owenza inkohliso;  Othetha ubuxoki akayi kuqina Phambi kwamehlo am.

8.verse: Imiso ngemiso, ndiya kubabhangisa Bonke abangendawo belizwe, Ukuze ndibanqumle emzini kaYehova Bonke abasebenzi bobutshinga.

1.verse: Umthandazo wolusizana xa atyhafileyo, ephalaza iinkalazo zakhe phambi koYehova. Yehova, wuve umthandazo wam, Kufike kuwe ukuzibika kwam.

2.verse: Musa ukubusithelisa ubuso bakho kum ngemini yokubandezelwa kwam, Ndithobele indlebe yakho; Ngemini endidanduluka ngayo khawuleza undiphendule.

3.verse: Ngokuba iyaphela imihla yam njengomsi; Amathambo am avutha njengeziko.

4.verse: Ibethwe yoma njengomfuno intliziyo yam, Ngokuba ndilibele nokudla ukudla kwam.

5.verse: Ngenxa yezwi lokugcuma kwam Amathambo am atshele enyameni yam.

6.verse: Ndifana nengcwangube yentlango, Ndinjengesikhova sasemanxoweni.

7.verse: Andilali; Ndinjengentaka eyodwa phezu kwendlu.

8.verse: Imini yonke ziyandingcikiva iintshaba zam, Abandigezelayo bathuka ngam.

9.verse: Ngokuba ndidle uthuthu njengesonka, Into endiyiselayo ndiyiphithikeze nezililo,
