10.verse: Ngenxa yokubhabhama kwakho noburhalarhume bakho; Ngokuba undifunqule wandilahla.

11.verse: Imihla yam injengokoluka kwamathunzi; Mna ndomile njengomfuno.

12.verse: Ke wena, Yehova, uhleli ngonaphakade, Inkumbuzo yakho ikwizizukulwana ngezizukulwana.

13.verse: Uya kusuk ume, uyiphathe iZiyon ngemfesane; Ngokuba lixesha lokuyibabala eli, ngokuba lifikile ixesha elimisiweyo.

14.verse: Ngokuba abakhonzi bakho bakholiswe ngamatye ayo, Uthuli lwayo banofefe ngalo.

15.verse: Ziya kuloyika iintlanga igama likaYehova, Nookumkani bonke behlabathi ubuqaqawuli bakho;

16.verse: Ngokuba eyakhile iZiyon uYehova, Wabonakala ebuqaqawulini bakhe.

17.verse: Uwubhekile umthandazo wabachushuluzayo, Akawudela umthandazo wabo.

18.verse: Oko kuya kubhalelwa isizukulwana esizayo, Abantu abaza kudalwa badumise uYehova.

19.verse: Ngokuba uqondele, esendaweni yakhe ephezulu engcwele;  Wondela ehlabathini esemazulwini uYehova,

20.verse: Ukuba akuve ukugcuma kwabakhonkxiweyo, Abakhulule oonyana bokufa;

21.verse: Bancokole eZiyon ngegama likaYehova, Ngendumiso yakhe eYerusalem;

22.verse: Ekubuthelaneni kwezizwe ndawonye, Nezikumkani, ukuba zikhonze uYehova.

23.verse: Uwathobile endleleni amandla am, Uyinqamle imihla yam.

24.verse: Ndithi, Thixo wam, musa ukundisusa phakathi kwemihla yam.  Ikwizizukulwana ngezizukulwana iminyaka yakho.

25.verse: Waliseka kudala ihlabathi; Lisisenzo sezandla zakho izulu.

26.verse: Ezo zinto ziya kudaka, wena ke ume; Zona zonke ziya konakala njengengubo, Wozigugisa njengesambatho, ziguge;

27.verse: Ke wena uhleli unguwe, Iminyaka yakho ayinakuphela.

28.verse: Oonyana babakhonzi bakho baya kuhlala, Imbewu yabo izimaseke phambi kwakho.

1.verse: EkaDavide. Mbonge uYehova, mphefumlo wam, Ilibonge igama lakhe elingcwele into yonke engaphakathi kwam.

2.verse: Mbonge uYehova, mphefumlo wam, Ungayilibali yonke impatho yakhe entle:

3.verse: Uloxolela bonke ubugwenxa bakho; Ulophilisa zonke izifo zakho;

4.verse: Ulokhulula ubomi bakho esihogweni, Akuthi jize ngenceba nemfesane;

5.verse: Lo uwuzalisayo umlomo wakho ngento elungileyo, Buhlaziyeke ubutsha bakho njengobokhozi.

6.verse: NguYehova umenzi wemisebenzi yobulungisa, Nezigwebo ngenxa yabacudisiweyo bonke;

7.verse: Umazisi weendlela zakhe kuMoses, Wezenzo zakhe ezincamisayo koonyana bakaSirayeli.

8.verse: Unemfesane enobabalo uYehova, Uzeka kade umsindo, mkhulu ngenceba.

9.verse: Akaphiki kuphele, Akawugcini umsindo ngonaphakade.

10.verse: Akenzi kuthi ngokwezono zethu, Akasiphathi ngokobugwenxa bethu;

11.verse: Ngokuba injengokuphakama kwezulu phezu komhlaba, Ukuba namandla, inceba yakhe kwabamoyikayo;

12.verse: Kunjengokuba kude kwempumalanga entshonalanga,  Ukulukhwelelisa kwakhe kuthi ukreqo lwethu;

13.verse: Kunjengokusikwa yimfesane koyise kubantwana, Ukusikwa yimfesane kukaYehova kwabamoyikayo.

14.verse: Ngokuba uyakwazi yena ukubunjwa kwethu, Ekhumbula ukuba siluthuli.

15.verse: Hayi, umntu! Injengotyani imihla yakhe; Njengentyantyambo yasendle, kunjalo ukutyatyamba kwakhe.

16.verse: Xa uthe umoya wadlula kuyo, ayibikho, Ingabi sazana nayo indawo yayo.

17.verse: Ke yona inceba kaYehova ikwabamoyikayo, kususela kwaphakade kude kuse ephakadeni, Nobulungisa bakhe bukoonyana boonyana;

18.verse: Kwabawugcinileyo umnqophiso wakhe, Kwabazikhumbulayo iziyalezo zakhe ukuba bazenze.

19.verse: UYehova uyizinzisile emazulwini itrone yakhe, Ubukumkani bakhe bulawula into yonke.

20.verse: Mbongeni uYehova, nina zithunywa zakhe, Magorha omeleleyo, alenzayo ilizwi lakhe, Ephulaphula isandi selizwi lakhe.

21.verse: Mbongeni uYehova, nonke mikhosi yakhe, Balungiseleli bakhe, benzi bokuthanda kwakhe.

22.verse: Mbongeni uYehova, nonke zenzo zakhe, Ezindaweni zonke zobukumkani bakhe. Mbonge uYehova, mphefumlo wam.

1.verse: Mbonge uYehova, mphefumlo wam. Yehova, Thixo wam, umkhulu kakhulu; Wambethe indili nobungangamela.

2.verse: Ulothi wambu ukukhanya njengengubo. Ulolaneka izulu njengelengalenga lentente;

3.verse: Ulohlanganisa emanzini imiqadi yamagumbi akhe aphezulu;  Ulowenza amafu inqwelo yakhe, Ulohamba ngamaphiko omoya;

4.verse: Ulowenza izithunywa zakhe imimoya, Abalungiseleli bakhe umlilo olenyayo.

5.verse: Waliseka ihlabathi phezu kwemimiso yalo, Ukuba lingashukunyiswa naphakade kanaphakade.

6.verse: Waligubungela ngamanzi anzongonzongo njengesambatho, Ema amanzi phezu kweentaba.

7.verse: Ekukhalimeni kwakho asaba, Ezwini lendudumo yakho abaleka buphuthuphuthu;

8.verse: Kwenyuka iintaba, kwehla izihlambo, Aya kuloo ndawo ubuwasekele yona.

9.verse: Wamisa umda ukuba angegqithi, Angabuye awugubungele umhlaba.

10.verse: Ulothuma imithombo iye ezihlanjeni; Ihamba phakathi kweentaba;

11.verse: Iseza zonke iinyamakazi zasendle; Amaesile asendle aqabula inxano lawo.

12.verse: Kuhlala phezu kwayo iintaka zezulu, Zitsholoza phakathi kwamasebe;

13.verse: Uloseza iintaba kumagumbi akhe aphezulu; Uyahlutha umhlaba ziziqhamo zezenzo zakho.

14.verse: Ulontshulisela iinkomo utyani, Nomfuno wokunceda umntu;  Ukuze kuphume isonka emhlabeni.

15.verse: Iwayini iyivuyise intliziyo yomntu; Bukhazimle ubuso ngeoli, Isonka siyixhase intliziyo yomntu.

16.verse: Iyahlutha imithi kaYehova, Imisedare yaseLebhanon awayityalayo,

17.verse: Apho zakhela khona iintaka; Ingwamza, isemisipresini indlu yayo.

18.verse: Iintaba zona ezo ziphakamileyo zezamagogo, Amawa azimela iimbila.

19.verse: Inyanga wayenzela amaxesha ayo, Ilanga liyakwazi ukutshona kwalo.

20.verse: Wenza ubumnyama wena, kube sebusuku, Ashukume ngabo onke amarhamncwa ehlathi.

21.verse: Iingonyama ezintsha zigqumela ukuqwenga, Zifuna ukudla kwazo kuThixo.

22.verse: Lakuthi chapha ilanga, ziyahlanganisana, Zibuthume ezikhundleni zazo.

23.verse: Uyaphuma umntu aye emsebenzini wakhe Nasenkonzweni yakhe,  ahlwise.

24.verse: Hayi, ukuba zininzi izenzo zakho, Yehova! Zonke ziphela uzenze ngobululumko; Uzele umhlaba zizidalwa zakho.

25.verse: Nalo ulwandle lulukhulu, lubanzi ngeenxa zombini; Kulapho kuzinambuzane zingenakubalwa, Ezincinane kwanezikhulu izinto eziphilileyo.

26.verse: Kulapho kuhamba iinqanawa; Nango umnenga owawubumbela ukudlala kulo.

27.verse: Zonke ezo nto ziphela zikhangele kuwe, Ukuba uzinike ukudla kwazo ngexesha elililo.

28.verse: Uyazinika, ziyachola; Uyasivula isandla sakho, ziyahlutha kokulungileyo.

29.verse: Uyabusithelisa ubuso bakho, ziyakhwankqiswa;  Uyawuhlanganisa umoya wazo, ziphume umphefumlo, Zibuyele eluthulini lwazo.

30.verse: Uthuma umoya wakho, ziyadalwa, Ubuhlaziye ubuso bomhlaba.

31.verse: Ubuqaqawuli bukaYehova mabube ngunaphakade; UYehova makavuye ngezenzo zakhe;

32.verse: Ulobheka emhlabeni, uzamazame; Uchukumisa iintaba,  ziqhume.

33.verse: Ndiya kuvuma kuYehova lo gama ndidla ubomi, Ndiya kumbethela uhadi uThixo wam ekubeni ndingokhoyo.

34.verse: Makube nencasa kuye ukucamngca kwam; Mna ndiya kuvuya ngoYehova.

35.verse: Mabagqitywe ehlabathini aboni, Bangabi sabakho abangendawo. Mbonge uYehova, mphefumlo wam, Haleluya!

1.verse: Bulelani kuYehova, nqulani igama lakhe; Yazisani ezizweni izenzo zakhe ezincamisileyo.

2.verse: Vumani kuye, mbetheleni uhadi; Xoxani ngemisebenzi yakhe yonke ebalulekileyo.

3.verse: Qhayisani ngegama lakhe elingcwele; Mayivuye intliziyo yabamquqelayo uYehova.

4.verse: Ngxamelani uYehova namandla akhe; Funani ubuso bakhe ngamaxesha onke.

5.verse: Khumbulani imisebenzi yakhe ebalulekileyo awayenzayo,  Izimanga zakhe, nezigwebo zomlomo wakhe,

6.verse: Mbewu ka-Abraham, yomkhonzi wakhe, Nyana bakaYakobi,  banyulwa bakhe.

7.verse: NguYehova uThixo wethu yena; Zisehlabathini lonke izigwebo zakhe.

8.verse: Uwukhumbula ngonaphakade umnqophiso wakhe, Ilizwi awalimisela iwaka lezizukulwana;

9.verse: Awanqophisana ngalo noAbraham, Awalifungela uIsake;

10.verse: Awalimisayo ukuba libe ngummiselo kuYakobi, Libe ngumnqophiso ongunaphakade kuSirayeli;

11.verse: Esithi, Ndikunika ilizwe lakwaKanan, Libe licandelo lelifa lenu;

12.verse: Besengamadoda ambalwa, Bebancinane, bengabaphambukeli kulo.

13.verse: Babehamba besuka kolunye uhlanga, baye kolunye uhlanga,  Besuka kobunye ubukumkani, baye kwabanye abantu.

14.verse: Akavumelanga mntu ukuba abacudise, Wohlwaya ookumkani ngenxa yabo;

15.verse: Esithi, Musani ukubachukumisa abathanjiswa bam, Musani ukubaphatha kakubi abaprofeti bam.

16.verse: Wabiza indlala, yeza phezu kwelizwe, Wawaphula wonke umsimelelo osisonka.

17.verse: Wathuma indoda phambi kwabo; Kwathengiswa ngoYosefu, waba likhoboka.

18.verse: Bazicinezela iinyawo zakhe ngamakhamandela, Wafika umphefumlo wakhe esinyithini;

19.verse: Kwada kwalixesha lokufika kwelizwi lakhe, Intetho kaYehova yamnyibilikisa.

20.verse: Ukumkani wathuma, wamkhulula, Umlawuli wezizwe wamvulela;

21.verse: Wamenza inkosi yendlu yakhe, Umlawuli wemfuyo yakhe yonke,

22.verse: Ukuba abakhonkxe abathetheli bakhe ngokuzithandela kwakhe, Amadoda akhe amakhulu awafundise ubulumko.

23.verse: Waza uSirayeli waya eYiputa, UYakobi waphambukela ezweni lakwaHam.

24.verse: Wabaqhamisa kakhulu abantu bakhe, Wabomeleza ngaphezu kwababandezeli babo.

25.verse: Wazijika iintliziyo zabo, ukuba babathiye abantu bakhe,  Babaqhathanisele abakhonzi bakhe.

26.verse: Wathuma uMoses, umkhonzi wakhe, NoAron awamnyulayo.

27.verse: Bazenza kubo iindawo zemiqondiso yakhe, Nezimanga zakhe ezweni lakwaHam.

28.verse: Wathumela ubumnyama, kwaba mnyama; Ababa nakuwaphikisa amazwi akhe.

29.verse: Wawaguqula amanzi abo, aba ligazi, Wazibulala iintlanzi zabo.

30.verse: Ilizwe labo lanyakazela amasele Ezingontsini zookumkani babo.

31.verse: Wathetha, zafika izibawu, Iingcongconi, emideni yabo yonke.

32.verse: Wabanika isichotho, saba yimvula; Umlilo walenya ezweni labo.

33.verse: Wayibetha imidiliya yabo nemikhiwane yabo, Wayishwaqa imithi yemida yabo.

34.verse: Wathetha, kwafika iinkumbi ezandayo, Nezikhothululayo,  into engenakubalwa;

35.verse: Zayidla imifuno yonke ezweni labo, Zazidla iziqhamo zomhlaba wabo.

36.verse: Waza wababulala bonke abamazibulo ezweni labo, Intlahlela yamandla abo onke.

37.verse: Wabakhupha ke abakhe benesilivere negolide, Akwabakho ukhubekayo ezizweni zakhe.

38.verse: Lavuya iYiputa ekuphumeni kwabo, Ngokuba lifikelwe kukunkwantyisa kwabo.

39.verse: Waneka ilifu lokubasitha, Nomlilo wokukhanyisa ebusuku.

40.verse: Babiza, wazisa izagwityi, Wabahluthisa nangesonka sasezulwini.

41.verse: Wavula iliwa, abaleka amanzi, Ahamba engumlambo emqwebedwini.

42.verse: Ngokuba wakhumbula ilizwi lakhe elingcwele, Wakhumbula uAbraham umkhonzi wakhe.

43.verse: Wabakhupha abantu bakhe benemihlali, Abanyulwa bakhe bememelela.

44.verse: Wabanika amazwe eentlanga, Bayihlutha inzuzo yokwaphuka kwezizwe,

45.verse: Ukuze bayigcine imimiselo yakhe, Bayibambe imiyalelo yakhe. Haleluya!

1.verse: Haleluya! Bulelani kuYehova, ngokuba elungile, Ngokuba ingunaphakade inceba yakhe.

2.verse: Ngubani na onokuzixela izenzo zobugorha bukaYehova,  Onokuyivakalisa yonke indumiso yakhe?

3.verse: Hayi, uyolo lwabaligcinayo isiko, Lwabenza ubulungisa ngamaxesha onke!

4.verse: Ndikhumbule, Yehova, ekwenzeni kwakho isisa kubantu bakho;  Ndiyelele ngosindiso lwakho,

5.verse: Ukuze ndibone inyhweba yabanyulwa bakho, Ndivuye ekuvuyeni kohlanga lwakho, Ndiqhayise kunye nelifa lakho.

6.verse: Sonile, thina noobawo; Senze ubugwenxa, senze okungendawo.

7.verse: Oobawo abayiqiqanga eYiputa imisebenzi yakho ebalulekileyo; Ababukhumbulanga ubuninzi beenceba zakho;  Baphika elwandle, eLwandle oluBomvu.

8.verse: Wabasindisa ngenxa yegama lakhe, Ukuze abazise ubugorha bakhe.

9.verse: Walukhalimela uLwandle oluBomvu, loma, Wabahambisa emanzini anzongonzongo kwanga kusentlango.

10.verse: Wabasindisa esandleni sobathiyayo, Wabakhulula esandleni sotshaba.

11.verse: Amanzi abagubungela ababandezeli babo, Akwasala namnye kubo.

12.verse: Bakholwa ke ngamazwi akhe, Bayivuma indumiso yakhe.

13.verse: Kanti bahle bazilibala izenzo zakhe, Abalilinda icebo lakhe.

14.verse: Bakhanukile entlango, Bamlinga uThixo enkangala.

15.verse: Wabanika abakubizayo; Wathumela ukungcumbeka emphefumlweni wabo.

16.verse: Bamenzela umona uMoses eminqubeni, NoAron ongcwele kaYehova.

17.verse: Wavuleka umhlaba, wamginya uDatan, Waliselela ibandla lika-Abhiram;

18.verse: Umlilo walitshisa ibandla labo, Amalangatye abalenya abangendawo.

19.verse: Benza ithole eHorebhe, Baqubuda emfanekisweni otyhidiweyo.

20.verse: Balwananisa uzuko lwabo Ngento emilise okwenkomo edla utyani.

21.verse: Bamlibala uThixo, umsindisi wabo, Owenza imisebenzi emikhulu eYiputa;

22.verse: Imisebenzi ebalulekileyo ezweni lakwaHam, Imisebenzi eyoyikekayo eLwandle oluBomvu.

23.verse: Wathi uya kubatshabalalisa, Koko wesukayo uMoses,  umnyulwa wakhe, Wema ethubeni phambi kwakhe, Ebuyisa ubushushu bakhe, ukuba angatshabalalisi.

24.verse: Balicekisa ilizwe elinqwenelekayo, Abakholwa lilizwi lakhe,

25.verse: Bakrokra ezintenteni zabo, Abaliphulaphula izwi likaYehova.

26.verse: Wabaphakamisela isandla sakhe, Wafungela ukuba abawise entlango;

27.verse: Ayiwise imbewu yabo phakathi kweentlanga, Abachithachithe emazweni.

29.verse: Bamqumbisa ngeentlondi zabo; Sagaleleka phakathi kwabo isibetho.

30.verse: Wesuka wema uPinehasi, walamla; Sathintelwa isibetho.

31.verse: Oko kwabalelwa kuye ekuthini bubulungisa Izizukulwana ngezizukulwana kude kuse ephakadeni.

32.verse: Bamqumbisa emanzini aseMeribha, Kwehla ububi kuMoses ngenxa yabo;

33.verse: Ngokuba bawuphikisa umoya wakhe, Waphololoza ke ngomlomo wakhe.

34.verse: Abazitshabalalisa izizwe, Awayethethe ngazo kubo uYehova;

35.verse: Baxubana neentlanga ezo, Bafunda izenzo zazo;

36.verse: Bakhonza izithixo zazo, Yaba sisirhintyelo kubo.

37.verse: Babingelela ngoonyana babo nangeentombi zabo kwiidemon;

38.verse: Baphalaza igazi elimsulwa, Igazi loonyana babo neleentombi zabo, Ababingelela ngabo kwizithixo zakwaKanan;  Lahlanjelwa ilizwe ngamagazi.

39.verse: Baba ziinqambi ngezenzo zabo, Bahenyuza ngeentlondi zabo.

40.verse: Wavutha ke umsindo kaYehova kubantu bakhe, Laba lisikizi kuye ilifa lakhe.

42.verse: Zabaxina iintshaba zabo, Bathotyelwa phantsi kwezandla zazo.

43.verse: Zibe zininzi izihlandlo ebahlangula; Ke bona bamphikisa ngamaqhinga abo, Bonakala bubugwenxa babo.

44.verse: Noko ke wakunonelela ukubandezelwa kwabo, Akuva ukuhlahlamba kwabo.

45.verse: Wawukhumbula ngenxa yabo umnqophiso wakhe, Wazohlwaya ngenxa yobuninzi beenceba zakhe.

46.verse: Wabafumanisa imfesane Phambi kwabo bonke abaye bebathimbile.

47.verse: Sisindise, Yehova, Thixo wethu, Sibuthe ezintlangeni,  Ukuze sibulele kwigama lakho elingcwele, Sizingce ngendumiso yakho.

48.verse: Makabongwe uYehova, uThixo kaSirayeli, Kususela kwaphakade kude kuse ephakadeni. Mabathi bonke abantu, Amen.  Haleluya!

1.verse: Bulelani kuYehova, ngokuba elungile, Ngokuba ingunaphakade inceba yakhe.

2.verse: Mabatsho abakhululwa bakaYehova, Awabakhululayo esandleni sombandezeli;

3.verse: Wababutha emazweni, Empumalanga nasentshonalanga, Entla naselwandle.

4.verse: Badinga entlango, endleleni esenkanga, la, Abafumana mzi wakuhlala.

5.verse: Belambile, benxaniwe, Watyhafa phakathi kwabo umphefumlo wabo.

6.verse: Bakhala ke kuYehova embandezelweni yabo, Wabahlangula ekucuthekeni kwabo;

7.verse: Wabanyathelisa endleleni ethe tye, Ukuba baye kumzi wokuhlala.

8.verse: Mabayibulele kuYehova inceba yakhe, Nemisebenzi yakhe ebalulekileyo koonyana babantu!

9.verse: Kuba ewuhluthisile umphefumlo otshobayo, Wawuzalisa ngokulungileyo umphefumlo olambileyo.

10.verse: Behleli emnyameni nasethunzini lokufa, Bekhonkxwe yimbandezelo nasisinyithi,

11.verse: Ngokuba bephikise amazwi kaThixo, Belitshitshisa icebo lOsenyangweni:

12.verse: Wayithoba intliziyo yabo ngokubasebenzisa kanzima;  Bakhubeka, akwabakho mncedi.

13.verse: Bakhala ke kuYehova embandezelweni yabo; Wabasindisa ekucuthekeni kwabo.

14.verse: Wabakhupha emnyameni nasethunzini lokufa, Waziqhawula iimbophelelo zabo.

15.verse: Mabayibulele kuYehova inceba yakhe, Nemisebenzi yakhe ebalulekileyo koonyana babantu!

16.verse: Kuba ezaphule iingcango zobhedu, Wayixakaxa imivalo yesinyithi.

17.verse: Abamathileyo, ngenxa yendlela yokukreqa kwabo, Nangenxa yobugwenxa babo, bacinezelwa;

18.verse: Konke ukudla kwaba lisikizi kumphefumlo wabo, Bafika emasangweni okufa.

19.verse: Bakhala ke kuYehova embandezelweni yabo, Wabasindisa ekucuthekeni kwabo.

20.verse: Wathumela ilizwi lakhe, wabaphilisa, Wabasiza ezihogweni zabo.

21.verse: Mabayibulele kuYehova inceba yakhe, Nemisebenzi yakhe ebalulekileyo koonyana babantu!

22.verse: Mababingelele imibingelelo yombulelo, Bancokole ngezenzo zakhe bememelela.

23.verse: Abaya elwandle ngeenqanawa, Benze ishishini emanzini amaninzi,

24.verse: Bazibona bona izenzo zikaYehova, Nemisebenzi yakhe ebalulekileyo enzulwini.

25.verse: Watsho, wavusa umoya ovuthuzayo, Waphakamisa amaza ayo.

26.verse: Banyuka basinga ezulwini, behla basinga emanzini enzonzobila; Umphefumlo wabo uthe amandla bububi.

27.verse: Bathendeleka, bahexa njengenxila, Butshone bonke ubulumko babo.

28.verse: Bakhala ke kuYehova embandezelweni yabo Wabakhupha ekucuthekeni kwabo.

29.verse: Ukumisile ukuvuthuza, kwathi cwaka, Amaza ayo azola;

30.verse: Bavuya ke, kuba edambile; Wabafikisa echwebeni abalilangazelelayo.

31.verse: Mabayibulele kuYehova inceba yakhe, Nemisebenzi yakhe ebalulekileyo koonyana babantu!

32.verse: Mabamphakamise ebandleni labantu, Bamdumise embuthweni yamadoda amakhulu.

33.verse: Uyenze imilambo yaba yintlango, Namathende amanzi aba ngumhlaba onxaniweyo;

34.verse: Ilizwe elineziqhamo laba leletyuwa, Ngenxa yezinto ezimbi zabemi balo.

35.verse: Uyenze intlango yaba lidike elinamanzi, Ilizwe elingumqwebedu laba ngamathende amanzi.

36.verse: Wabahlalisa khona abalambileyo, Bamisa umzi wokuhlala.

37.verse: Bahlwayela amasimi, batyala izidiliya, Bavelisa iziqhamo,  baba nongeniselo.

38.verse: Wabasikelela, banda kunene, Iinkomo zabo akazinciphisa.

40.verse: Uwagalele ngendelo amanene, Wawadingisa enyanyeni,  kungekho ndlela.

41.verse: Walisa engxondeni ihlwempu, kude nengcinezelo, Walenzela imizalwana yanjengomhlambi.

42.verse: Baya kubona abathe tye, bavuye, Bonke ubugqwetha buvale umlomo.

43.verse: Lowo ulumkileyo makazigcine ezi ndawo, Azigqale iinceba zikaYehova.

1.verse: Ingoma. Umhobe kaDavide. Izimasekile intliziyo yam,  Thixo, Ndiya kuvuma, ndibethe uhadi, Kwanozuko lwam.

2.verse: Vukani, mrhubhe nohadi; Ndiya kusiphangela isifingo.

3.verse: Ndiya kubulela kuwe phakathi kwezizwe, Yehova,  Ndikubethele uhadi phakathi kwezizwe.

4.verse: Ngokuba inkulu ngaphezu kwezulu inceba yakho, Yada yesa esibhakabhakeni inyaniso yakho.

5.verse: Ziphakamise ngaphezu kwezulu, Thixo, Bube phezu kwehlabathi lonke ubuqaqawuli bakho.

6.verse: Ukuze zihlangulwe iintanda zakho, Sindisa ngesandla sakho sokunene, undiphendule.

7.verse: UThixo uthethe engcwele; mandivuyelele, Ndimabe uShekem,  ndiyilinganisele intili yaseSukoti.

8.verse: Ngowam uGiliyadi, ngowam uManase, UEfrayim sisigcina-ntloko sam, UYuda yintonga yam yommiselo;

9.verse: UMowabhi sisitya sam sokuhlambela, Ndiyiphosa kuEdom imbadada yam; Ndiduma ngelamaFilisti.

10.verse: Ngubani na owondisa emzini onqatyisiweyo, Ngubani na owondikhaphela kwaEdom?

11.verse: Asinguwe na, Thixo, lo usihlambileyo? Akwaphuma, Thixo,  nemikhosi yethu.

12.verse: Sincede kumbandezeli wethu; Alunto yanto usindiso lomntu.

13.verse: NgoThixo siya kweyisa, Abagqushe yena ababandezeli bethu.

1.verse: Kumongameli; ekaDavide. Umhobe. Thixo wendumiso yam,  musa ukuthi tu;

2.verse: Ngokuba bandakhamisele umlomo ongendawo, nomlomo onenkohliso; Bathetha ngam ngolwimi lobuxoki.

3.verse: Bandijikele ngeentetho zentiyo; Balwa nam ngelize.

4.verse: Ekubeni mna ndibathanda, bona bayandichasa, Ndibe mna ndithandaza.

5.verse: Endaweni yobulungisa bandibuyekeza ngobubi; Ekubeni mna ndibathanda, bona bayandithiya.

6.verse: Misa ongendawo, abe ngumveleli wakhe, Eme uSathana ngasekunene kwakhe.

7.verse: Ekuthethweni kwetyala makaphume engongendawo, Nomthandazo wakhe ube sisono.

8.verse: Imihla yakhe mayibe mbalwa, Mabuthatyathwe ngomnye ubuveleli bakhe.

9.verse: Oonyana bakhe mababe ziinkedama, Nomkakhe abe ngumhlolokazi;

10.verse: Babhadule bebhadula oonyana bakhe, becela, Bengqiba,  bekude namanxuwa akowabo.

11.verse: Umboleki-mali makakushwankathele konke anako, Abasemzini baphange ukuxelenga kwakhe.

12.verse: Makungabikho wolulela nceba kuye, Kungabikho uzibabalayo iinkedama zakhe.

13.verse: Izivela-mva zakhe mazibe zezokunqunyulwa, Igama lazo licinywe esizukulwaneni esizayo.

14.verse: Mabukhunjulwe nguYehova ubugwenxa booyise, Singacinywa isono sonina.

15.verse: Masibe phambi koYehova ngamaxesha onke, Akunqumle ehlabathini ukukhunjulwa kwabo;

16.verse: Ngenxa enokuba engakukhumbulanga ukwenza inceba,  Etshutshise indoda elusizana, Elihlwempu, enentliziyo eyothukileyo, ukuba ayibulale.

17.verse: Ewe, wathanda ukuqalekisa, kwamfikela; Akakufuna ukusikelela, kwakhwelela kude kuye.

18.verse: Wambatha ukuqalekisa kwanga yingubo yakhe, Kwangena embilinini wakhe njengamanzi, Nanjengeoli emathanjeni akhe.

19.verse: Makube njengengubo kuye, azithe wambu ngayo, Kube luqhwemesha, alunxibe amaxesha onke.

20.verse: Nguwo lowo umvuzo wabandichasayo, ophuma kuYehova,  Wabathetha okubi ngomphefumlo wam.

21.verse: Ke wena Yehova, Nkosi, ndenzele ngenxa yegama lakho;  Ngokokuba ilungile inceba yakho; ndihlangule.

22.verse: Ngokuba ndilusizana, ndilihlwempu, Intliziyo yam ihlatyiwe phakathi kwam.

23.verse: Ndinjengethunzi xa lolukayo, ndiyemka; Ndiphetshethwa njengenkumbi.

24.verse: Amadolo am ayagexa kukuzila ukudla, Nenyama yam ibhityile, tu ukutyeba.

25.verse: Ndithe ndasisingcikivo kubo; Bendibona, bahlunguzela intloko.

26.verse: Ndincede, Yehova, Thixo wam, Ndisindise ngokwenceba yakho;

27.verse: Bazi ukuba sisandla sakho eso, Ukuba kukwenza kwakho,  Yehova.

28.verse: Bayaqalekisa aba, uyasikelela wena; Besukile bema, baya kudana; uya kubuya yena umkhonzi wakho.

29.verse: Abandichasayo baya kwambatha ihlazo, Bazithi wambu ukudana njengengubo yokwaleka.

30.verse: Ndiya kubulela kakhulu kuYehova ngomlomo wam, Ndimdumise phakathi kwabaninzi;

31.verse: Kuba emi ekunene kolihlwempu, Ukuba amsindise kwabawugwebayo umphefumlo wakhe.

1.verse: EkaDavide. Umhobe. Utsho uYehova eNkosini yam ukuthi,  Hlala ngasekunene kwam, Ndide iintshaba zakho ndizenze Isitulo seenyawo zakho.

2.verse: Intonga yamandla akho uya kuyithumela uYehova, ivela eZiyon, esithi, Yiba nobukhosi phakathi kweentshaba zakho.

3.verse: Abantu bakho baya kuzinikela ngeentliziyo, ngemini yakho yokuphuma umkhosi; Bebethe ezingcwele, ekuphumeni kwesifingo,  Uza kuwe umbethe womlisela wakho.

4.verse: Ufungile uYehova, akayi kuzohlwaya; uthe, Ungumbingeleli ngonaphakade wena Ngokohlobo lukaMelkitsedeke.

5.verse: INkosi ngasekunene kwakho Iya kuphalusa ookumkani ngemini yomsindo wayo.

6.verse: Iya kugweba phakathi kweentlanga, kuzale zizidumbu;  Iphaluse intloko ezweni elibanzi.

7.verse: Endleleni iya kusela emlanjaneni; Ngenxa yoko iya kuphakamisa intloko.

1.verse: Haleluya! Ndiya kubulela kuYehova ngentliziyo yonke,  Elucweyweni lwabathe tye nasebandleni.

2.verse: Zikhulu izenzo zikaYehova, Zezokungxokwa iintsingiselo zazo zonke.

3.verse: Unendili nobungangamela umsebenzi wakhe, Ubulungisa bakhe bumi ngonaphakade.

4.verse: Uyenzele ukuze ikhunjulwe imisebenzi yakhe ebalulekileyo;  Unobabalo nemfesane uYehova.

5.verse: Ubaphe ukudla abamoyikayo; Uwukhumbule ngonaphakade umnqophiso wakhe.

6.verse: Ubabonise abantu bakhe amandla ezenzo zakhe, Ebanika ilifa leentlanga.

7.verse: Izenzo zezandla zakhe ziyinyaniso nesiko; Zithembekile zonke iziyalezo zakhe.

8.verse: Zizimasekile nanini nangonaphakade; Zenziwe ngenyaniso,  zithe tye.

9.verse: Ubathumele abantu bakhe inkululeko; Uwumisele ngonaphakade umnqophiso wakhe; Lingcwele, liyoyikeka, igama lakhe.

10.verse: Ingqalo yobulumko kukoyika uYehova, Banengqiqo elungileyo bonke abenza ngako; Indumiso yakhe ihlala imi.

1.verse: Haleluya! Hayi, uyolo lomntu omoyikayo uYehova,  Oyinoneleleyo kunene imithetho yakhe!

2.verse: Iya kuba nobugorha ehlabathini imbewu yakhe; Isizukulwana sabathe tye sisikelelwe.

3.verse: Bubuncwane nobutyebi endlwini yakhe; Ubulungisa bakhe buhlala bumi.

4.verse: Baphunyelwa kukukhanya ebumnyameni abathe tye, Benobabalo,  nemfesane, nobulungisa.

5.verse: Unoyolo umntu obabalayo, aboleke; Uya kuyimisa intetho yakhe ematyaleni.

6.verse: Ngokuba akayi kushukunyiswa naphakade; Uya kuba lilungisa elikhunjulwa ngonaphakade.

7.verse: Akoyikiswa ziindaba ezimbi; Iqinisekile intliziyo yakhe,  ikholose ngoYehova.

8.verse: Izimasekile intliziyo yakhe, akoyiki; Uya kuda ababonele ababandezeli bakhe.

9.verse: Uyahlakaza, upha amahlwempu; Ubulungisa bakhe buhlala bumi, Uphondo lwakhe luphakamile, lunozuko.

10.verse: Ongendawo yena uya kukubona, aqumbe, Atshixize amazinyo,  anyibilike; Umnqweno wongendawo uyadaka.

1.verse: Haleluya! Dumisani, bakhonzi bakaYehova, Dumisani igama likaYehova.

2.verse: Malibongwe igama likaYehova, Kususela ngokunje, kude kuse ephakadeni.

3.verse: Kwasekuphumeni kwelanga kuse ekutshoneni kwalo,  Malidunyiswe igama likaYehova.

4.verse: Uphakamile ngaphezu kweentlanga zonke uYehova,  Bungaphezulu kwamazulu ubuqaqawuli bakhe.

5.verse: Ngubani na onjengoYehova, uThixo wethu? Ulohlala phezulu;

6.verse: Uloqondela phantsi; Ezulwini nasemhlabeni?

7.verse: Ulomvusa eluthulini osweleyo, Ulomphakamisa ezaleni olihlwempu,

8.verse: Ukuba amhlalise namanene, Amanene abantu bakhe;

9.verse: Ulohlalisa endlwini umfazi ongazaliyo, Abe ngunobantwana ovuyayo. Haleluya!

1.verse: Ekuphumeni kukaSirayeli eYiputa, Kwendlu kaYakobi ebantwini abantetho ingaziwayo,

2.verse: UYuda waba yingcwele yakhe, USirayeli waba sisikumkani sakhe.

3.verse: Ulwandle lwabona, lwasaba, IYordan yabuya umva.

4.verse: Iintaba zadloba njengeenkunzi zeegusha; Iinduli,  njengamatakane omhlambi.

5.verse: Ubunani na, lulwandlendini, ukuba usabe? Wena Yordan,  ukuba ubuye umva?

6.verse: Nina zintaba, ukuba nidlobe njengeenkunzi zeegusha? Nina zinduli, njengamatakane omhlambi?

7.verse: Wena hlabathi, zibhijabhije ebusweni beNkosi, Ebusweni boThixo kaYakobi;

8.verse: Uloguqula iliwa libe lidike lamanzi, Iqhwitha libe yimithombo yamanzi.

1.verse: Ungazukisi thina, Yehova, ungazukisi thina; Zukisa igama lakho, Ngenxa yenceba yakho, ngenxa yenyaniso yakho.

2.verse: Yini na ukuba zithi iintlanga, Uphi na kaloku uThixo wabo?

3.verse: UThixo wethu ke usemazulwini, Konke akuthandileyo uyakwenza.

4.verse: Izithixo zazo yisilivere negolide, Zizenzo zezandla zabantu.

5.verse: Zinomlomo nje, azithethi; Zinamehlo nje aziboni;

6.verse: Zineendlebe nje, aziva; Zineempumlo nje, azisezeli.

7.verse: Izandla zazo aziphathi, Iinyawo zazo azihambi; Azidumzeli ngomqala wazo.

8.verse: Boba njengazo abenzi bazo, Bonke abasukuba bekholose ngazo.

9.verse: Wena Sirayeli, kholosa ngoYehova; Uncedo lwabo nengweletshetshe yabo nguye.

10.verse: Nani bendlu ka-Aron, kholosani ngoYehova; Uncedo lwabo nengweletshetshe yabo nguye.

11.verse: Nina boyiki bakaYehova, kholosani ngoYehova; Uncedo lwabo nengweletshetshe yabo nguye.

12.verse: UYehova usikhumbule, wosisikelela; Woyisikelela indlu kaSirayeli, Woyisikelela indlu ka-Aron;

13.verse: Wobasikelela aboyiki bakaYehova, Abancinane kwanabakhulu.

14.verse: UYehova wonandisa nina ngakumbi nangakumbi, Abandise oonyana benu.

15.verse: Nisikelelekile kuYehova, UMenzi wamazulu nowehlabathi.

16.verse: Amazulu ngamazulu kaYehova, Ihlabathi ulinike oonyana babantu.

17.verse: Asingabafileyo abamdumisayo uYehova, Asingabo bonke abehlayo baye kwelokuzola.

18.verse: Thina ke siya kumbonga uYehova, Kususela koku kude kuse ephakadeni. Haleluya!

1.verse: Ndiyamthanda, ngokuba uYehova eliva Ilizwi lam,  ukutarhuzisa kwam.

2.verse: Ngokuba endithobele indlebe yakhe, Ndiya kumnqula ngemihla yam yonke.

3.verse: Izintya zokufa zandijikela, Iingxingongo zelabafileyo zandifumana, Ndafunyanwa ziimbandezelo nesingqa la.

4.verse: Ndanqula ke igama likaYehova, ndathi, Yehova, ndiya kukhunga, siza umphefumlo wam.

5.verse: UYehova unobabalo, ulilungisa, UThixo wethu unemfesane.

6.verse: Ngumgcini wabazizidenge uYehova; Ndandiswele,  wandisindisa.

7.verse: Buyela ekuphumleni kwakho, mphefumlo wam, Ngokuba uYehova ukuphatha kakuhle;

8.verse: Ngokuba ewuhlangule umphefumlo wam ekufeni, Iliso lam ezinyembezini, Unyawo lwam ekungqulekeni.

9.verse: Ndiya kuhamba-hamba phambi koYehova Emazweni abaphilileyo.

10.verse: Ndiyakholwa, xa ndithethayo; Mna ndicinezelekile kunene.

11.verse: Ndathi mna ekuphakuzeleni kwam, Bonke abantu ngamaxoki.

12.verse: Ndingambuyisela ngantoni na uYehova Konke ukundiphatha kwakhe kakuhle?

13.verse: Ndophakamisa indebe yosindiso, Ndinqule igama likaYehova.

14.verse: Ewe, ndozizalisa izibhambathiso zam kuYehova, Phambi kwabantu bakhe bonke kalokunje.

15.verse: Kunqabile emehlweni kaYehova Ukufa kwakhakhe benceba.

16.verse: Okunene, Yehova, ndingumkhonzi wakho, Ndingumkhonzi wakho, unyana womkhonzazana wakho; Uzicombulule iimbophelelo zam.

17.verse: Ndiya kubingelela kuwe umbingelelo wombulelo, Ndinqule igama likaYehova.

18.verse: Ewe, ndiya kuzizalisa izibhambathiso zam kuYehova, Phambi kwabantu bakhe bonke,

19.verse: Ezintendelezweni zendlu kaYehova, Esazulwini sakho,  Yerusalem. Haleluya!

1.verse: Mdumiseni uYehova, nonke zintlanga, Mncomeni, nonke zizwe.

2.verse: Ngokuba inamandla kuthi inceba yakhe, Inyaniso kaYehova ingunaphakade. Haleluya!

1.verse: Bulelani kuYehova, ngokuba elungile, Ngokuba ingunaphakade inceba yakhe.

2.verse: Makathi uSirayeli, Ingunaphakade inceba yakhe.

3.verse: Mayithi indlu ka-Aron, Ingunaphakade inceba yakhe.

4.verse: Mabathi abamoyikayo uYehova, Ingunaphakade inceba yakhe.

5.verse: Ndabiza uYehova ndisengxingongweni; Wandiphendula uYehova,  wandibeka endaweni ebanzi.

6.verse: UYehova ungakum, andoyiki; Angandenza ntoni na umntu?

7.verse: UYehova ungakum ngokundinceda; Ndiya kubona mna kwabandithiyayo.

8.verse: Kulungile ukuzimela ngoYehova, Ngaphezu kokukholosa ngomntu.

9.verse: Kulungile ukuzimela ngoYehova Ngaphezu kokukholosa ngamanene.

10.verse: Zingafanelana zonke iintlanga zindirhawule: Egameni likaYehova inene ndozinqumla.

11.verse: Zingafanelana zindirhawule zandirhawula: Egameni likaYehova inene ndozinqumla.

12.verse: Zingafanelana zindirhawule njengeenyosi: Zocinywa njengomlilo weentsasa; Egameni likaYehova inene ndozinqumla.

13.verse: Undityhale ngamandla wena ukuba ndiwe; Kodwa uYehova wandinceda.

14.verse: Iqhayiya lam nengoma yam nguYehova, Waba lusindiso kum.

15.verse: Izwi lokumemelela nelosindiso lisezintenteni zamalungisa,  lisithi, Isandla sokunene sikaYehova siyeyisa;

16.verse: Isandla sokunene sikaYehova siphakamile; Isandla sokunene sikaYehova siyeyisa.

17.verse: Andiyi kufa, ndiya kudla ubomi, Ndibalise ngezenzo zikaYehova.

18.verse: UYehova undithethise kakhulu, Ke akandinikela ekufeni.

19.verse: Ndivuleleni amasango obulungisa; Ndiya kungena ngawo,  ndiya kubulela kuYehova.

20.verse: Nali isango likaYehova, Amalungisa angena ngalo.

21.verse: Ndiyabulela kuwe kuba undiphendule, Waba lusindiso kum.

22.verse: Ilitye abalilahlayo abakhi Laba yintloko yembombo.

23.verse: Kuvele kuYehova oku, Kungumsebenzi obalulekileyo emehlweni ethu.

24.verse: Le yimini ayenzileyo uYehova, Masigcobe sivuye ngayo.

25.verse: Yehova, camagu, khawusindise, Yehova, camagu,  khawuhlangule.

26.verse: Makabongwe lo uzayo esegameni likaYehova, Siyanisikelela nina basendlwini kaYehova.

27.verse: UYehova nguThixo, usikhanyisela; Bophelelani umbingelelo womthendeleko ngeentambo, Kude kuye ezimpondweni zesibingelelo.

28.verse: UnguThixo wam, ndiya kubulela kuwe; UnguThixo wam, ndiya kukuphakamisa.

29.verse: Bulelani kuYehova, ngokuba elungile, Ngokuba ingunaphakade inceba yakhe.

1.verse: Hayi, uyolo lwabandlela igqibeleleyo, Bona bahambayo ngomyalelo kaYehova!

2.verse: Hayi, uyolo lwababambe izingqiniso zakhe, Abamquqelayo ngentliziyo epheleleyo!

3.verse: Abasebenzi nokusebenza bugqwetha, Bayahamba ngeendlela zakhe.

4.verse: Uzimisile iziyalezo zakho, Ukuba zigcinwe kunene.

5.verse: Azaba iindlela zam bezibhekiselwe Ukugcina imimiselo yakho!

6.verse: Bendingayi kudana ke Ekubhekeni kwam kwimithetho yakho yonke.

7.verse: Ndiya kubulela kuwe ngentliziyo ethe tye, Ekuzifundeni kwam izigwebo zobulungisa bakho.

8.verse: Ndiya kuyigcina imimiselo yakho, Musa ukundishiya kuphele.

9.verse: Umfana uya kuwuqaqambisa ngantoni na umendo wakhe?  Ngokuzigcina ngokwelizwi lakho.

10.verse: Ndiya kuquqela kuwe ngentliziyo yam yonke; Musa ukundilahlekanisa nemithetho yakho.

11.verse: Ndiyibeke intetho yakho entliziyweni yam, Ukuze ndingoni kuwe.

12.verse: Ungowokubongwa, Yehova; Ndifundise imimiselo yakho.

13.verse: Ndiyawabalisa ngemilebe yomlomo wam Onke amasiko omlomo wakho.

14.verse: Ndinemihlali endleleni yezingqiniso zakho, Ngathi kusebuncwaneni bonke.

15.verse: Ndiya kucamngca ngeziyalezo zakho, Ndibheke kumendo wakho.

16.verse: Ndiyaziyolisa ngemimiselo yakho; Andiyi kulilibala ilizwi lakho.

17.verse: Mphathe kakuhle umkhonzi wakho, ndidle ubomi, Ndigcine ilizwi lakho.

18.verse: Vula amehlo am, ukuba ndiyibone Imisebenzi ebalulekileyo yasemyalelweni wakho.

19.verse: Ndingumphambukeli ehlabathini, Musa ukuyisithelisa kum imithetho yakho.

20.verse: Umphefumlo wam ucumkile ngokulangazelela Amasiko akho ngamaxesha onke.

21.verse: Ubakhalimele abakhukhumali, Abaqalekiswa abo,  balahlekeneyo nemithetho yakho.

22.verse: Shenxisa imke kum ingcikivo nendelo, Ngokuba ndizibambile izingqiniso zakho.

23.verse: Nangona abathetheli behlala bathethe ngam, Umkhonzi wakho yena ucamngca ngemimiselo yakho.

24.verse: Izingqiniso zakho ziziyoliso zam noko, Zingamaphakathi am.

25.verse: Umphefumlo wam unamathele eluthulini: Ndiphilise ngokwelizwi lakho.

26.verse: Ndizicacisile iindlela zam, wandiphendula; Ndifundise imimisela yakho.

27.verse: Ndiqondise iindlela zeziyalezo zakho, Ndicamngce ngemisebenzi yakho ebalulekileyo.

28.verse: Umphefumlo wam uvuza iinyembezi sisingqala, Ndimise ngokwelizwi lakho.

29.verse: Indlela yobuxoki yisuse kum; Ndibabale umyalelo wakho.

30.verse: Ndiyinyule indlela yokuthembeka; Amasiko akho ndijolise kuwo.

31.verse: Ndinamathele ezingqinisweni zakho; Musa ukundidanisa,  Yehova.

32.verse: Ndigidima ngendlela yemithetho yakho, Ngokuba uyenze banzi intliziyo yam.

33.verse: Ndiyalele, Yehova, indlela yemimiselo yakho, Ndiyibambe kuphele.

34.verse: Ndiqondise, ndibambe umyalelo wakho, Ndiwugcine ngentliziyo yonke.

35.verse: Ndinyathelise endleleni yemithetho yakho, Ngokuba ndiyithandile.

36.verse: Intliziyo yam yithobele ezingqinisweni zakho,  Ungayithobeli ekubaweni.

37.verse: Dlulisa amehlo am angakhangeli inkohlakalo, Ndiphilise ngeendlela zakho.

38.verse: Zalisa kumkhonzi wakho intetho yakho, Eyokuba bakoyike.

39.verse: Yidlulise ingcikivo yam endinxunguphala yiyo, Ngokuba amasiko akho alungile.

40.verse: Nanku ndilangazelela iziyalezo zakho, Ndiphilise ngobulungisa bakho.

41.verse: Mazize kum iinceba zakho, Yehova, Nosindiso lwakho ngokwentetho yakho;

42.verse: Ndimphendule ngelizwi ondingcikivayo, Ngokuba ndikholose ngelizwi lakho.

43.verse: Musa ukuda ulihluthe emlonyeni wam ilizwi lenyaniso,  Ngokuba ndilindele izigwebo zakho;

44.verse: Ndowugcina umyalelo wakho ngamaxesha onke, Ngonaphakade kanaphakade;

45.verse: Ndihamba-hambe endaweni ebanzi, Ngokuba ndifuna iziyalezo zakho.

46.verse: Ndothetha ngezingqiniso zakho phambi kokumkani, Ndingabi nakudana.

48.verse: Ndiziphakamise izandla zam emithethweni yakho endiyithandayo, Ndicamngce ngemimiselo yakho.

49.verse: Khumbula ilizwi lakho kumkhonzi wakho, Ngenxa enokuba undithembise lona.

50.verse: Yiyo le intuthuzelo yam ekucinezelekeni kwam, Yokuba intetho yakho indiphilisile.

51.verse: Abakhukhumali bada bandigxeka kakhulu; Kanti andithi gu bucala emyalelweni wakho.

52.verse: Ndawakhumbula amasiko akho kususela kwanaphakade, Yehova,  Ndathuthuzeleka.

53.verse: Ndingenwe ngumsindo oshushu, Ndisenziwa ngabangendawo abalahla umyalelo wakho.

54.verse: Iziingoma kum imimiselo yakho, Endlwini yokuphambukela kwam.

55.verse: Ndilikhumbule ebusuku igama lakho, Yehova, Ndawugcina umyalelo wakho.

56.verse: Ndinikwe oku, Ukuba ndibambe iziyalezo zakho.

57.verse: Isabelo sam, Yehova, ndithi, Sesokuba ndigcine amazwi akho.

58.verse: Ndiya kubongoza ngentliziyo yonke, Ndibabale ngokwentetho yakho.

59.verse: Ndazicingela iindlela zam, Ndazibuyisela iinyawo zam ezingqinisweni zakho.

61.verse: Izintya zabangendawo zindithandele, Andiwulibele umyalelo wakhe noko.

62.verse: Ndivuka phakathi kobusuku, ndibulele kuwe, Ngenxa yezigwebo zobulungisa bakho.

63.verse: Ndilidlelane labo bonke abakoyikayo, Nelabazigcinayo iziyalezo zakho.

64.verse: Inceba yakho, Yehova, izalise ihlabathi; Ndifundise imimiselo yakho.

65.verse: Umenzele okulungileyo umkhonzi wakho, Yehova, ngokwelizwi lakho.

66.verse: Ndifundise, ndibe nemvo nokwazi okulungileyo, Ngokuba ndikholwa yimithetho yakho.

67.verse: Ndingekacinezelwa, ndaye ndilahleka; Kungoku ndiyigcinile intetho yakho.

68.verse: Ulungile wena, ulungisa; Ndifundise imimiselo yakho.

69.verse: Abakhukhumali bathungele ubuxoki ngam; Mna ndizibamba ngentliziyo yonke iziyalezo zakho.

70.verse: Ithe fithi kukutyeba intliziyo yabo; Ke mna ndiziyolisa ngomyalelo wakho.

71.verse: Kundilungele okokuba ndacinezelwayo, Ukuze ndiyifunde imimiselo yakho.

72.verse: Ulungile kum umyalelo womlomo wakho, Ngaphezu kwamawaka egolide nesilivere.

73.verse: Izandla zakho zindenzile, zandilungisa; Ndiqondise,  ndifunde imithetho yakho.

74.verse: Abakoyikayo bondibona, bavuye, Ngokuba ndilindele elizwini lakho.

75.verse: Ndiyazi, Yehova, ukuba zinobulungisa izigwebo zakho;  Undicinezele, phofu uthembekile.

76.verse: Ngamana inceba yakho yaba yeyokundithuthuzela,  Njengokwentetho yakho kumkhonzi wakho.

77.verse: Mazize kum iimfesane zakho, ndiphile, Ngokuba umyalelo wakho undiyolisa.

78.verse: Mabadane abakhukhumali, ngokuba bendigobele phantsi ngobuxoki, Mna ndicamngca ngeziyalezo zakho.

80.verse: Mayigqibelele intliziyo yam emimiselweni yakho, Ukuze ndingadani.

81.verse: Umphefumlo wam uyaphela kukululangazelela usindiso lwakho, Ndilindele elizwini lakho.

82.verse: Amehlo am ayaphela kukulangazelela intetho yakho,  Ndisithi, Uya kundithuthuzela nini na?

83.verse: Noko ndithe ndaba njengentsuba emsini; Andiyilibali imimiselo yakho.

84.verse: Zingaphi na iintsuku zomkhonzi wakho? Uya kuda ubagwebe nini na abandisukelayo?

86.verse: Yonke imithetho yakho ithembekile: Bandisukela ngobuxoki;  ndincede.

87.verse: Baphantse ukundigqibela emhlabeni, Ke mna andizilahli iziyalezo zakho.

88.verse: Ndiphilise ngokwenceba yakho, Ndizigcine izingqiniso zomlomo wakho.

89.verse: Lingunaphakade, Yehova, Limi emazulwini ilizwi lakho.

90.verse: Ukuthembeka kwakho kukwizizukulwana ngezizukulwana;  Ulizinzisile ihlabathi, lema.

91.verse: Ezo zinto zimele izigwebo zakho nanamhla, Ngokuba iinto zonke zingabakhonzi bakho.

92.verse: Koko umyalelo wakho wandiyolisayo, Ndinge ndaphelayo ekucinezelekeni kwam.

93.verse: Andiyi kuzilibala naphakade iziyalezo zakho, Ngokuba undiphilisile ngazo.

94.verse: Ndingowakho mna, ndisindise, Kuba ndicamanga ngeziyalezo zakho.

95.verse: Abangendawo bandilindile ukuze banditshabalalise; Mna ndigqale izingqiniso zakho.

96.verse: Yonke inzaliseko ndiyibonile apho iphela khona; Ke wona umthetho wakho ngumphangalala omkhulu.

97.verse: Hayi, ukuwuthanda kwam umyalelo wakho! Imini le yonke ndiyacamngca ngawo.

98.verse: Indifundisa ubulumko ngaphezu kweentshaba zam imithetho yakho, Ngokuba yeyam ngonaphakade.

99.verse: Ndinokuqiqa ngaphezu kwabafundisi bam bonke, Ngokuba ngezingqiniso zakho ndiyacamngca.

100.verse: Ndinokuqonda ngaphezu kwamadoda amakhulu, Ngokuba ndizibamba iziyalezo zakho.

101.verse: Ndizinqandile iinyawo zam kwiindlela zonke ezimbi, Ukuze ndiligcine ilizwi lakho.

102.verse: Andisuki emasikweni akho, Ngokuba undiyalile wena.

103.verse: Hayi, ukuba mnandi kwentetho yakho ekhuhlangubeni lam!  Igqithe nobusi emlonyeni wam.

104.verse: Ngeziyalezo zakho ndinokuqonda, Ngenxa yoko ndiwuthiyile wonke umendo wobuxoki.

105.verse: Lisisibane seenyawo zam ilizwi lakho, Likukukhanya emendweni wam.

106.verse: Ndikufungele, ndikumisile, Ukuzigcina izigwebo zobulungisa bakho.

107.verse: Ndide ndacinezeleka kakhulu; Yehova, ndiphilise ngokwelizwi lakho.

108.verse: Ngamana wakholeka kuwe, Yehova, umbingelelo wesisa womlomo wam; Ndifundise amasiko akho.

109.verse: Umphefumlo wam uhlala usesandleni sam, Ndingawulibali umyalelo wakho.

110.verse: Abangendawo bandenzele umgibe, Andiphambukanga eziyalezweni zakho.

111.verse: Ndizidle ilifa izingqiniso zakho ngonaphakade, Ngokuba ziyimihlali yentliziyo yam;

112.verse: Intliziyo yam ndiyithobele ekwenzeni imimiselo yakho Ngonaphakade, kuphele.

113.verse: Abambaxa ndiyabathiya, Wona umyalelo wakho ndiyawuthanda.

114.verse: Isithe lam nengweletshetshe yam nguwe, Ndilindele elizwini lakho.

115.verse: Sukani kum, nina benzi beento ezimbi, Ndibambe imithetho yoThixo wam.

116.verse: Ndizimase ngokwelizwi lakho, ndiphile, Ungandidanisi ekulindeni kwam.

117.verse: Ndixhase ndisinde, Ndihlale ndibheke emimiselweni yakho.

118.verse: Ubacukucezile bonke abalahlekana nemimiselo yakho,  Ngokuba inkohliso yabo ibubuxoki.

119.verse: Wena ususa bonke abangendawo behlabathi njengentlenga,  Ngoko ndiyazithanda izingqiniso zakho.

120.verse: Inyama yam isuka ihambe kukunkwantyiswa nguwe, Ndizoyike izigwebo zakho.

122.verse: Mmele umkhonzi wakho, kulunge; Mabangandicudisi abakhukhumali.

123.verse: Amehlo am ayaphela kukululangazelela usindiso lwakho,  Nentetho yobulungisa bakho.

124.verse: Umkhonzi wakho menzele ngokwenceba yakho Undifundise imimiselo yakho.

125.verse: Ndingumkhonzi wakho, ndiqondise, Ndizazi izingqiniso zakho.

126.verse: Lilixa lokuba uYehova enze, Kuba bawaphule umyalelo wakho.

127.verse: Ngenxa yoko ndiyithanda imithetho yakho Ngaphezu kwegolide, nakwengcwengiweyo.

128.verse: Ngenxa yoko ndithi, Zonke iziyalezo zakho zithe tye ngezinto zonke; Wonke umendo wobuxoki ndiwuthiyile.

129.verse: Ziyimisebenzi ebalulekileyo izingqiniso zakho, Ngenxa yoko uzibambile umphefumlo wam.

130.verse: Ukutyhila kwamazwi akho kuyakhanyisa, Kuqondisa abazizidenge.

131.verse: Ndakhamisa umlomo wam, ndakhefuza, Ngokuba ndiyilangazelela imithetho yakho.

132.verse: Ndibheke, undibabale, Ngokwesiko lakho kubathandi begama lakho.

133.verse: Qinisa ukunyathela kwam ngentetho yakho, Mabungabi nagunya kum ubutshinga, nabuphi na.

134.verse: Ndikhulule ekucudiseni komntu, Ndizigcine iziyalezo zakho.

135.verse: Khanyisa ubuso bakho kumkhonzi wakho, Undifundise imimiselo yakho.

136.verse: Ahla imijelo yamanzi amehlo am, Ngenxa yokuba bengawugcini umyalelo wakho.

137.verse: Ulilungisa wena, Yehova, Zithe tye izigwebo zakho.

138.verse: Uzimisile izingqiniso zakho, zanobulungisa, Zaba nokuthembeka kakhulu.

139.verse: Ikhwele lam lindibhangisile, Ngokuba abandibandezelayo bewalibele amazwi akho.

140.verse: Ilizwi lakho linyibilikisiwe njengegolide kunene,  Umkhonzi wakho uyalithanda.

141.verse: Ndimncinane, ndideliwe, Noko andizilibali iziyalezo zakho.

142.verse: Ubulungisa bakho bubulungisa obungunaphakade, Umyalelo wakho uyinyaniso.

143.verse: Imbandezelo nengcutheko indifumene, Imithetho yakho iyandiyolisa.

144.verse: Zinobulungisa ngonaphakade izingqiniso zakho,  Ndiqondise, ndiphile.

145.verse: Ndikhala ngentliziyo yonke, ndiphendule; Yehova,  imimiselo yakho ndiya kuyibamba.

146.verse: Ndikhala kuwe, ndisindise, Ndigcine izingqiniso zakho.

147.verse: Ndakuphangela ukusa, ndazibika, Ndalindela emazwini akho.

148.verse: Amehlo am aphengela imilindo yasebusuku, Ukuze ndicamngce ngentetho yakho.

149.verse: Live ilizwi lam ngokwenceba yakho, Yehova, ndiphilise ngokwamasiko akho.

150.verse: Bayasondela abaphuthuma amanyala, Banyawuka emyalelweni wakho;

151.verse: Usondele wena, Yehova, Yonke imithetho yakho iyinyaniso.

152.verse: Kudala ndisazi ngokwezingqiniso zakho, Ukuba uzisekile ngonaphakade.

153.verse: Khangela ukucinezeleka kwam, undihlangule, Ngokuba ndingawulibali umyalelo wakho.

154.verse: Bambana nobambene nam, undikhulule, Ndiphilise ngokwelizwi lakho.

155.verse: Lunyawukile kwabangendawo usindiso, Ngokuba abayifuni imimiselo yakho.

156.verse: Iimfesane zakho zininzi, Yehova; Ndiphilise ngokwamasiko akho.

157.verse: Baninzi abandisukelayo nabandibandezelayo; Andithi gu bucala ezingqinisweni zakho.

158.verse: Ndababona abatshinizi, ndakruquka, Abo bangayigciniyo intetho yakho.

159.verse: Bona ukuthanda kwam iziyalezo zakho, Yehova, ndiphilise ngokwenceba yakho.

160.verse: Isimbuku selizwi lakho siyinyaniso iphela,  Zingunaphakade zonke izigwebo zobulungisa bakho.

161.verse: Abathetheli bandisukela ngelize, Intliziyo yam iyankwantyiswa ngamazwi akho.

162.verse: Ndinemihlali ngentetho yakho, Njengofumene ixhoba elininzi.

163.verse: Ndikuthiyile ukuxoka, lisikizi kum; Ndiyawuthanda umyalelo wakho.

164.verse: Ndikudumisa kasixhenxe ngemini, Ngenxa yezigwebo zobulungisa bakho.

165.verse: Banoxolo olukhulu abawuthandayo umyalelo wakho; Akukho sikhubekiso kubo.

166.verse: Ndikhangela usindiso lwakho, Yehova; Ndenza imithetho yakho.

167.verse: Umphefumlo wam uyazigcina izingqiniso zakho, Ndizithanda kunene.

168.verse: Ndiyazigcina iziyalezo zakho nezingqiniso zakho, Ngokuba zonke iindlela zam ziphambi kwakho.

169.verse: Makusondele phambi kwakho ukuhlahlamba kwam; Yehova,  ndiqondise ngokwelizwi lakho.

170.verse: Masifike isikhungo sam phambi kwakho; Ndihlangule ngokwentetho yakho.

171.verse: Umlomo wam mawumpompoze indumiso, Kuba undifundisile imimiselo yakho.

172.verse: Ulwimi lwam luya kuyiphendula intetho yakho, Ngokuba yonke imithetho yakho inobulungisa.

173.verse: Isandla sakho masibe sesokundinceda, Ngokuba ndizinyulele iziyalezo zakho.

174.verse: Ndilangazelela usindiso lwakho, Yehova; Umyalelo wakho uyandiyolisa.

175.verse: Mawuphile umphefumlo wam, ukudumise, Andincede amasiko akho.

176.verse: Ndiya ndimka njengemvu elahlekileyo; mfune umkhonzi wakho, Ngokuba andiyilibali imithetho yakho.

1.verse: Ingoma yezinyuko. Engxingongweni yam ndakhala kuYehova,  Wandiphendula.

2.verse: Ndathi, Wuhlangule, Yehova, umphefumlo wam emlonyeni oxokayo, Elulwimini olunenkohliso.

3.verse: Makakunike ntoni na, akongeze ntoni na, Lulwimindini lunenkohliso?

4.verse: Iintolo zegorha ezitsolo, Kunye namalahle avuthayo onwele.

5.verse: Athi ke mna! Kuba ndingumphambukeli kwaMesheki, Ndihleli ngasezintenteni zakwaKedare.

6.verse: Umphefumlo wam kade uhleli Nabaluthiyileyo uxolo.

7.verse: Mna ndingowoxolo; Ke ndithi ndakuthetha, bona babe yimfazwe.

1.verse: Ingoma yezinyuko. Ndiwaphakamisele ezintabeni na amehlo am? Luya kuvela phi na uncedo lwam?

2.verse: Uncedo lwam luvela kuYehova, UMenzi wezulu nehlabathi.

3.verse: Akayi kukha alunikele unyawo lwakho ekutyibilikeni; Akayi kukha ozele umgcini wakho.

4.verse: Uyabona, akozeli, akalali, UMgcini kaSirayeli.

5.verse: NguYehova umgcini wakho, NguYehova umthunzi wakho ekunene kwakho.

6.verse: Emini ilanga aliyi kukwenzakalisa, Nenyanga ebusuku.

7.verse: UYehova uya kukugcina ebubini bonke, Uya kuwugcina umphefumlo wakho.

8.verse: UYehova uya kukugcina ukuphuma kwakho nokungena kwakho,  Kususela ngoku kude kuse ephakadeni.

1.verse: Ingoma yezinyuko. KaDavide. Ndavuya bakuthi kum, Masiye endlwini kaYehova.

2.verse: Iinyawo zethu zifike zema Emasangweni akho, Yerusalem;

3.verse: Yerusalem, wena wakhiweyo Ngokomzi ohlangeneyo wamnye;

4.verse: Apho zinyuka ziye khona izizwe, Izizwe zikaYehova;  Ibubungqina ke loo nto kwaSirayeli, Ukuba kubulelwe kwigama likaYehova.

5.verse: Kuba khona apho kumiswe iitrone zokugweba, Iitrone zendlu kaDavide.

6.verse: Celelani iYerusalem uxolo; Mababe nokuchulumacha abakuthandayo,

7.verse: Malube luxolo eludongeni lwakho olurhaqileyo,  Nokuchulumacha ezingxandeni zakho ezinde.

8.verse: Ngenxa yabazalwana bam nowethu, Makhe ndithethe uxolo ngawe.

9.verse: Ngenxa yendlu kaYehova, uThixo wethu, Ndiya kufuna okukulungeleyo.

1.verse: Ingoma yezinyuko. Ulohlala emazulwini, Ndiwaphakamisela kuwe amehlo am.

2.verse: Uyabona, njengokuba amehlo abakhonzi Emi kwisandla seenkosi zabo; Njengokuba amehlo omkhonzazana Emi kwisandla senkosikazi yakhe: Ngokunjalo amehlo ethu akuYehova, uThixo wethu, Ade asibabale.

3.verse: Sibabale, Yehova, sibabale, Ngokuba sanele kakhulu kukudelwa.

4.verse: Umphefumlo wethu wanele kakhulu Kukugculela kwabangakhathalele bani, Nokudela kwabanekratshi.

1.verse: Ingoma yezinyuko. KaDavide. Koko uYehova ebengakuthi,  Makatsho uSirayeli,

2.verse: Koko uYehova ebengakuthi Ekusukeleni kwabantu phezulu kuthi,

3.verse: Bange beba basiginya sihleli, Ekuvutheni komsindo wabo kuthi;

4.verse: Ange esintywilisele amanzi, Wadlula phezu komphefumlo wethu umsinga;

5.verse: Ange edlule phezu komphefumlo wethu Amanzi akhukumeleyo.

6.verse: Ungowokubongwa uYehova, Ongasinikelanga emazinyweni abo,  ukuba siqwengwe.

7.verse: Umphefumlo wethu usindile, njengentaka emgibeni wababambisi; Umgibe uqhawukile, sasinda ke thina.

8.verse: Uncedo lwethu lusegameni likaYehova, UMenzi wezulu nehlabathi.

1.verse: Ingoma yezinyuko. Abo bakholosa ngoYehova banjengentaba yaseZiyon: Ayishukumi, ihleli ngonaphakade.

2.verse: IYerusalem ijikelezwe ziintaba; Ke uYehova ubajikelezile naye abantu bakhe, Kususela ngoku kude kuse ephakadeni.

3.verse: Ngokuba ayiyi kuhlala intonga yokungendawo elifeni lamalungisa, Ukuze amalungisa angazisi ebugqwetheni izandla zawo.

4.verse: Yehova, yenza okulungileyo kwabalungileyo, Kwabathe tye ezintliziyweni zabo.

5.verse: Ke bona abathi gu bucala ngeendlela zabo ezimagoso-goso,  UYehova makabemkise, kunye nabasebenzi bobutshinga. Malube luxolo kuSirayeli.

1.verse: Ingoma yezinyuko. Ekubabuyiseni kukaYehova ababuyayo baseZiyon, Saba njengabaphuphayo;

2.verse: Waza wazala kukuhleka umlomo wethu, Lwazala kukumemelela ulwimi lwethu. Baza bathi phakathi kweentlanga, UYehova ubenzele izinto ezinkulu aba.

3.verse: UYehova usenzele izinto ezinkulu, Saba ngabavuyayo.

4.verse: Buyisa, Yehova, abathinjiweyo bakuthi, Njengemilambo yamanzi yelasezantsi.

5.verse: Abahlwayelayo beneenyembezi Baya kuvuna benokumemelela.

6.verse: Ohamba ahambe elila, Ephethe intlwayelelo, Uyabuya eze ememelela, Ethwele izithungu zakhe.

1.verse: Ingoma yezinyuko. KaSolomon. Ukuba akayakhi uYehova indlu, Bafumana besaphuka yiyo abakhi bayo. Ukuba umzi akawugcini uYehova, Ufumana ephaphama owugcinayo.

2.verse: Nifumana nivuka kusasa, Nihlale nisebenza kude kube sebusuku, Nikudla ukudla kokubulaleka; Uyipha intanda yakhe,  ilele ubuthongo.

3.verse: Uyabona, ilifa likaYehova ngoonyana, Umvuzo sisiqhamo sesizalo.

4.verse: Njengeentolo esandleni segorha, Banjalo oonyana bobutsha.

5.verse: Hayi, uyolo lomfo ozalise umphongolo wakhe ngabo! Abayi kudana, Xa bathetha neentshaba esangweni.

1.verse: Ingoma yezinyuko. Hayi, uyolo lwabantu bonke abamoyikayo uYehova, Abahamba ngeendlela zakhe!

2.verse: Ukuxelenga kwezandla zakho inene uya kukudla, Uya kuba noyolo wena, kulunge kuwe.

3.verse: Umkakho woba njengomdiliya oqhamayo Endlwini yakho ngaphakathi; Oonyana bakho babe njengezithole zomnquma Ngeenxa zonke esithebeni sakho.

4.verse: Yabona, unjalo ukusikelelwa umfo Omoyikayo uYehova.

5.verse: Makakusikelele uYehova eZiyon. Uyibone iYerusalem inenyhweba Yonke imihla yobomi bakho;

6.verse: Ubone abantwana babantwana bakho. Malube luxolo kuSirayeli.

1.verse: Ingoma yezinyuko. Kukaninzi bendibandezela kwasebuncinaneni bam, Makatsho uSirayeli;

2.verse: Kukaninzi bendibandezela kwasebuncinaneni bam: Ababanga nakundithini noko.

3.verse: Abalimi balima emhlana kum, Bayolula indima yabo.

4.verse: UYehova ulilungisa, Uzinqumle izintya zabangendawo.

5.verse: Mabadane babuye umva Bonke abayithiyayo iZiyon.

6.verse: Mababe njengengca ephuma phezu kwezindlu, Eyomayo ingekahlumi,

7.verse: Engekasizalisi nesandla sakhe umvuni, Engekalizalisi nesondo lengubo yakhe umbophi wezithungu;

8.verse: Bengekathi nabadlulayo, Intsikelelo kaYehova mayibe kuni;  Siyanisikelela egameni likaYehova.

1.verse: Ingoma yezinyuko. Ezinzulwini ndinqula wena, Yehova,

2.verse: Nkosi, yiva ilizwi lam. Iindlebe zakho mazilibazele Ilizwi lokutarhuzisa kwam.

3.verse: Ukuba uthe wabunqala ubugwenxa, Yehova, Ngubani na ongaba nokuma, Nkosi?

4.verse: Ngokuba kunawe ukuxolela, Ukuze woyikwe.

5.verse: Ndithembele kuYehova, uthembile umphefumlo wam; Ndilinde ilizwi lakhe.

6.verse: Umphefumlo wam ulindele eNkosini Ngaphezu kwabalinde ukusa, Ewe, abalinde ukusa.

7.verse: Lindela kuYehova, Sirayeli, Ngokuba inceba ikuYehova;  Ikuye inkululeko eninzi.

8.verse: Yena ke wowakhulula amaSirayeli Ebugwenxeni bawo bonke.

1.verse: Ingoma yezinyuko; kaDavide. Yehova, intliziyo yam ayiphakamile, amehlo am akaqwayingile; Andihambi ezintweni ezinkulu, Eziyimisebenzi ebalulekileyo kum.

2.verse: Inene, ndiwuzolise ndawuthozamisa umphefumlo wam;  Unjengomntwana olunyulweyo, ehleli kunina; Unjengomntwana olunyulweyo umphefumlo wam kum.

3.verse: Wena Sirayeli, lindela kuYehova Kususela ngoku kude kuse ephakadeni.

1.verse: Ingoma yezinyuko. Yehova, mkhumbulele uDavide Ukucinezeleka kwakhe konke;

2.verse: Yena wamfungelayo uYehova, Wabhambathisa kwimbalasane enguThixo kaYakobi,

3.verse: Esithi, Andiyi kungena ententeni eyindlu yam, Andiyi kunyuka ndiye esililini, emandlalweni wam;

4.verse: Andiyi kuwanika amehlo am ubuthongo, Neenkophe zam ukozela:

5.verse: Ndide ndimfumanele indawo uYehova, Ndiyifumanele umnquba imbalasane kaYakobi.

6.verse: Khangela, sawuva e-Efrata, Sawufumana ezintilini zaseKiriyati-yeharim.

7.verse: Masingene emnqubeni wakhe, Siqubude esihlalweni seenyawo zakhe.

8.verse: Khawusuk ume, Yehova, uze ekuphumleni kwakho, Wena netyeya yamandla akho.

9.verse: Ababingeleli bakho mabambathe ubulungisa, Bamemelele abakho benceba.

10.verse: Ngenxa kaDavide umkhonzi wakho, Musa ukubutyhala ubuso bomthanjiswa wakho.

11.verse: UYehova wamfungela uDavide; Inyaniso, akayi kubuya kuloo nto, Esithi, Esiqhameni sezibilini zakho Ndimisa oya kuba setroneni yakho.

12.verse: Ukuba bathe oonyana bakho bawugcina umnqophiso wam,  Nesingqiniso sam endibafundisayo: Oonyana babo bothi nabo bahlale Etroneni yakho nanini.

13.verse: Ngokuba uYehova uyinyule iZiyon, Uyinqwenele ukuba ibe likhaya lakhe;

14.verse: Esithi, Nantsi indawo yam yokuphumla kwam nanini; Ndiya kuhlala apha, ngokuba oko ndikunqwenele.

15.verse: Umphako wayo ndiya kuwusikelela kunene; Amahlwempu ayo ndiya kuwahluthisa ngesonka,

16.verse: Ndibambathise ngosindiso ababingeleli bayo, Abenceba bayo bamemelele bememelela.

17.verse: Apho ndiya kumhlumisela uphondo uDavide, Ndiya kumlungisela isibane umthanjiswa wam.

18.verse: Iintshaba zakhe ndiya kuzambathisa udano; Ke phezu kwakhe yena siya kutyatyamba isithsaba sakhe.

1.verse: Ingoma yezinyuko; kaDavide. Yabonani, ukuba kuhle, ukuba mnandi, Ukuthi abazalwana bahlale bemxhelo mnye!

2.verse: Kunjengeoli elungileyo entloko, Isihla ezindevini,  Ezindevini zika-Aron, Isihla iye emqukumbelweni weengubo zakhe.

3.verse: Kunjengombethe waseHermon, Ohla phezu kweentaba zaseZiyon;  Ngokuba uYehova wayimisela khona apho intsikelelo, Ubomi, kude kuse ephakadeni.

1.verse: Ingoma yezinyuko. Yabonani, mbongeni uYehova, nonke bakhonzi bakaYehova, Nimiyo endlwini kaYehova ebusuku.

2.verse: Phakamiselani engcweleni izandla zenu, Nimbonge uYehova.

3.verse: Makakusikelele eZiyon uYehova, UMenzi wezulu nehlabathi.

1.verse: Haleluya. Dumisani igama likaYehova; Dumisani, nina bakhonzi bakaYehova,

2.verse: Nimiyo endlwini kaYehova, Ezintendelezweni zendlu yoThixo wethu.

3.verse: Dumisani uYehova, ngokuba elungile uYehova; Libetheleni uhadi igama lakhe, ngokuba kumnandi.

4.verse: Ngokuba uYehova unyule uYakobi ukuba abe ngowakhe, Wanyula uSirayeli ukuba abe yinqobo kuye.

5.verse: Ngokuba ndiyazi mna ukuba mkhulu uYehova, INkosi yethu ingaphezu koothixo bonke.

6.verse: Konke akuthandileyo uYehova uya kwenza, Ezulwini nasemhlabeni, Ezilwandle nasemanzini onke enzonzobila.

7.verse: Ulonyusa amafu eziphelweni zehlabathi, Imvula wayenzela imibane; Ulorhola umoya koovimba bakhe.

8.verse: Owawabulalayo amazibulo aseYiputa, Ethabathele ebantwini wesa ezinkomeni;

9.verse: Wathumela imiqondiso nezimanga Phakathi kwakho, Yiputa,  KuFaro nakubakhonzi bakhe bonke;

10.verse: Owabulala iintlanga ezinkulu, Wabulala ookumkani abanamandla;

11.verse: OoSihon, ukumkani wama-Amori, No-Ogi, ukumkani waseBhashan, Nezikumkani zonke zakwaKanan;

12.verse: Walinikela ilizwe labo lalilifa, Lalilifa kumaSirayeli,  abantu bakhe,

13.verse: Yehova, igama lakho lingunaphakade, Inkumbuzo yakho,  Yehova, ikwizizukulwana ngezizukulwana.

14.verse: Ngokuba uYehova uya kugweba phakathi kwabantu bakhe,  Azohlwaye ngenxa yabakhonzi bakhe.

15.verse: Izithixo zeentlanga yisilivere negolide, Umsebenzi wezandla zabantu.

16.verse: Zinomlomo nje, azithethi; Zinamehlo nje, aziboni;

17.verse: Zineendlebe nje, aziva; Akukho nento engumoya emlonyeni wazo.

18.verse: Baya kuba njengazo abenzi bazo, Bonke abasukuba bekholose ngazo.

19.verse: Nina ndlu kaSirayeli, bongani uYehova; Nani ndlu ka-Aron,  bongani uYehova.

20.verse: Nina ndlu kaLevi, bongani uYehova; Nani boyika uYehova,  bongani uYehova.

21.verse: Ngowokubongwa uYehova eZiyon, Ulohlala eYerusalem.  Haleluya!

1.verse: Bulelani kuYehova, ngokuba elungile: Ngokuba ingunaphakade inceba yakhe.

2.verse: Bulelani kuThixo woothixo: Ngokuba ingunaphakade inceba yakhe.

3.verse: Bulelani kuNkosi kankosi: Ngokuba ingunaphakade inceba yakhe.

4.verse: KuloMenzi wemisebenzi ebalulekileyo emikhulu yedwa:  Ngokuba ingunaphakade inceba yakhe.

5.verse: KuloMenzi wezulu ngengqondo: Ngokuba ingunaphakade inceba yakhe.

6.verse: KuloMtwabululi wehlabathi phezu kwamanzi: Ngokuba ingunaphakade inceba yakhe.

7.verse: KuloMenzi wezikhanyiso ezikhulu: Ngokuba ingunaphakade inceba yakhe;

8.verse: Ilanga lilawule emini: Ngokuba ingunaphakade inceba yakhe;

9.verse: Inyanga neenkwenkwezi zilawule ebusuku: Ngokuba ingunaphakade inceba yakhe.

10.verse: Kulowabulala amaYiputa kumazibulo awo: Ngokuba ingunaphakade inceba yakhe.

11.verse: Wawakhupha amaSirayeli phakathi kwawo: Ngokuba ingunaphakade inceba yakhe.

12.verse: Ngesandla esithe nkqi, nangengalo eyolukileyo: Ngokuba ingunaphakade inceba yakhe.

13.verse: KuloMgabuli woLwandle oluBomvu, lwagabuka: Ngokuba ingunaphakade inceba yakhe.

14.verse: Wawaweza amaSirayeli esazulwini salo: Ngokuba ingunaphakade inceba yakhe.

15.verse: Wamvuthululela uFaro nempi yakhe eLwandle oluBomvu:  Ngokuba ingunaphakade inceba yakhe.

16.verse: Kulohambisa abantu bakhe entlango: Ngokuba ingunaphakade inceba yakhe.

17.verse: Kulowaxabela ookumkani abakhulu: Ngokuba ingunaphakade inceba yakhe.

18.verse: Wabulala ookumkani abaziingangamsha: Ngokuba ingunaphakade inceba yakhe;

19.verse: USihon, ukumkani wama-Amori: Ngokuba ingunaphakade inceba yakhe;

20.verse: No-Ogi, ukumkani waseBhashan: Ngokuba ingunaphakade inceba yakhe.

21.verse: Walinikela ilizwe labo laba lilifa: Ngokuba ingunaphakade inceba yakhe,

22.verse: Laba lilifa kuSirayeli umkhonzi wakhe: Ngokuba ingunaphakade inceba yakhe.

23.verse: Owasikhumbulayo ebuphantsini bethu: Ngokuba ingunaphakade inceba yakhe.

24.verse: Wasihlangula kwabasibandezelayo: Ngokuba ingunaphakade inceba yakhe.

25.verse: Ulonika into yonke ephilileyo ukudla: Ngokuba ingunaphakade inceba yakhe.

26.verse: Bulelani kuThixo wamazulu: Ngokuba ingunaphakade inceba yakhe.

1.verse: NgaseMilanjeni yaseBhabheli Sahlala phantsi khona, salila,  Sakuyikhumbula iZiyon.

2.verse: Emingculubeni phakathi kwayo Sazixhoma khona iihadi zethu.

3.verse: Ngokuba khona apho abathimbi bethu basibiza Izango zengoma; Abathuthumbisi bethu basibiza uvuyo, Besithi,  Sivumeleni ingoma yaseZiyon.

4.verse: Singathini na ukuvuma ingoma kaYehova Emhlabeni wolunye uhlanga?

5.verse: Ukuba ndithe ndakulibala, Yerusalem, Masinyele isandla sam sokunene.

6.verse: Ulwimi lwam malunamathele ekhuhlangubeni lam, Ukuba andithanga ndikukhumbule; Ukuba andithanga ndiyinyuse iYerusalem Ngaphezu kwemivuyo yam yonke.

7.verse: Bakhumbule, Yehova, oonyana bakaEdom, Umhla weYerusalem,  Abo bathi, Yidilizeni, yidilizeni Kuse elusekweni lwayo.

8.verse: Ntombi inguBhabheli, wena unyashiweyo; Hayi, uyolo lwalowo ukubuyekezayo ukuphatha kwakho Osiphethe ngako!

9.verse: Hayi, uyolo lwalowo ubabambayo abahlekeze abantwana bakho Engxondorheni!

1.verse: EkaDavide. Ndiya kubulela kuwe ngentliziyo yam yonke;  Phambi koothixo ndiya kukubethela uhadi.

2.verse: Ndiya kuqubuda ndibhekise etempileni yakho engcwele,  Ndibulele kwigama lakho, ngenxa yenceba yakho, nangenxa yenyaniso yakho; Kuba ulikhulisile ilizwi lakho ngaphezu kwegama lakho lonke.

3.verse: Ngomhla wokubiza kwam wandiphendula, Wandikhaliphisa,  yangamandla emphefumlweni wam.

4.verse: Baya kubulela kuwe, Yehova, bonke ookumkani behlabathi,  Bakuweva amazwi omlomo wakho;

5.verse: Bavume ngeendlela zikaYehova, Ukuba lukhulu uzuko lukaYehova:

6.verse: Ngokuba noko uYehova aphakamileyo, uyambona othobekileyo;  Ke yena oziphakamisayo umazi nakude.

7.verse: Ukuba ndithe ndahamba-hamba phakathi kweembandezelo,  uyandiphilisa; Wosolulela emsindweni weentshaba zam isandla sakho, Sindisindise isandla sakho sokunene.

8.verse: UYehova uya kundifezela. Yehova, inceba yakho ingunaphakade, Izenzo zezandla zakho musa ukuziyekela.

1.verse: Kumongameli; ekaDavide. Umhobe. Yehova, undigocagocile,  wandazi.

2.verse: Wena uyakwazi ukuhlala kwam nokusuka kwam; Uyaziqonda izicamango zam nakude.

3.verse: Ukuhamba kwam nokulala kwam, uyakwela; Uqhelene neendlela zam zonke.

4.verse: Ngokuba akukho lizwi elulwimini lwam Ongalaziyo ke,  Yehova, kanye.

5.verse: Ngasemva nangaphambili undingqingile, Wasibeka phezu kwam isandla sakho.

6.verse: Kubalulekile kum oko kwazi, Kuphezulu, kundinqabele.

7.verse: Ndingahambela phi na ukumka emoyeni wakho? Ndingabalekela phi na ukumka ebusweni bakho?

8.verse: Ukuba ndithe ndenyuka ndaya emazulwini, ulapho wena; Ukuba ndithe ndazandlalela kwelabafileyo, nanko ukho.

9.verse: Ukuba ndithe ndaphakamisa amaphiko esifingo, Ndaya ndahlala ekupheleni kolwandle,

10.verse: Besingandikhaphayo kwanalapho isandla sakho, Sindibambe isandla sakho sokunene.

11.verse: Ukuba ndithe, Mabundisongele ubumnyama bona bodwa,  Nokukhanya kube bubusuku ngeenxa zonke kum:

12.verse: Kwanobumnyama obo abungebi bubumnyama kuwe; Ubusuku bungaba mhlophe njengemini, Ubumnyama bungaba njengokukhanya

13.verse: Ngokuba wena wazibumba izintso zam, Wandibiyela esizalweni sikama.

14.verse: Ndiyabulela kuwe ngenxa enokuba ndenziwe ngokoyikekayo,  ngokubalulekileyo; Zibalulekile izenzo zakho, Umphefumlo wam uyazi kakuhle.

15.verse: Ayengagushekile kuwe amathambo am, Mna ndenzelwayo entsithelweni, Ndalukwa ndayimfakamfele ezinzulwini zomhlaba.

16.verse: Amehlo akho andibona ndiseyimbumba, Zazibhalwe encwadini yakho iimini zonke ziphela; Ziyiliwe ngenxa engaphambili,  Kungekabikho ke nanye kuzo.

17.verse: Kum ke zinjani na ukunqaba izicamango zakho, Thixo!  Asingangani isimbuku sazo!

18.verse: Zingathi, ndizibalile, zibe ninzi ngaphezu kwentlabathi;  Ndakuvuka ndoba ndisenawe.

19.verse: Ngamana wambulala ongendawo, Thixo! Nina madoda amagazi,  sukani kum.

20.verse: Abo bakukhankanyela amayelenqe, Balibizela inkohlakalo igama lakho abazondi bakho.

21.verse: Andinakubathiya na abakuthiyayo, Yehova, Ndikruquke ngabasukela phezulu kuwe?

22.verse: Ndibathiya ngentiyo ephelelisileyo, Kum mna baziintshaba.

23.verse: Ndigocagoce, Thixo, uyazi intliziyo yam; Ndicikide, uzazi iingcinga-ngcinga zam;

24.verse: Ubone ukuba kukho ndlela yobubi na kum, Undikhaphele kwindlela engunaphakade.

1.verse: Kumongameli. Umhobe kaDavide. Ndihlangule, Yehova,  esintwini esinobubi, Ndilondoloze emntwini ogonyamelayo,

2.verse: Abacinga okubi entliziyweni. Imihla yonke baxhaya imfazwe.

3.verse: Balola ulwimi lwabo njengenyoka; Ubuhlungu berhamba busemlonyeni wabo (Phakamisani.)

4.verse: Ndigcine, Yehova, ezandleni zongendawo, Ndilondoloze emntwini ogonyamelayo, Abacinga ukuzikhubekisa iinyawo zam.

5.verse: Abanekratshi bandiqhushekele isibatha nezintya, Baneke umnatha ecaleni kwendlela, Bandithiyele ngemigibe.  (Phakamisani.)

6.verse: Ndithi kuYehova, UnguThixo wam; Beka indlebe, Yehova,  elizwini lesikhungo sam.

7.verse: Yehova, Nkosi yam, nqaba endisindisayo, Uyigqubuthele intloko yam ngemini yeduli.

8.verse: Musa ukumnika, Yehova, ongendawo iminqweno yakhe; Musa ukuwuphumelelisa umnkqangiyelo wakhe, Hleze aziphakamise.  (Phakamisani.)

9.verse: Yona intloko yabandingqingayo, Ububi bomlomo wabo mabubagubungele.

10.verse: Mabathotyelwe amalahle avuthayo; Makabawise emlilweni,  emimbithini, bangabi saphuma.

11.verse: Indoda enolwimi mayingazinzi ehlabathini; Indoda enokugonyamela, ububi mabuyizingele ngembembetshane.

12.verse: Ndiyazi ukuba uYehova uya kulifeza Ityala losizana,  ibango lamahlwempu.

13.verse: Inene, amalungisa aya kubulela kwigama lakho; Baya kuhlala ebusweni bakho abathe tye.

1.verse: Umhobe kaDavide. Yehova, ndiyakunqula, khawuleza uze kum; Libekele indlebe izwi lam ekudandulukeni kwam kuwe.

2.verse: Umthandazo wam mawuhlale uhleli phambi kwakho usisiqhumiso, Nokuphakamisa kwam izandla kube ngumnikelo wangokuhlwa.

3.verse: Umlomo wam wumisele umlindi, Yehova; Misa umgcini emnyango womlomo wam.

4.verse: Intliziyo yam musa ukuyithobela entweni embi, Ukuba isebenze intlondi yokungendawo Namadoda asebenza ubutshinga;  Mandingazidli izimnandi zawo.

5.verse: Malindibethe ilungisa linenceba, lindohlwaye; Ioli enjalo yentloko ayingeyali intloko yam: Ngokuba usekho nomthandazo wam ebubini bawo.

6.verse: Bakhahlelwa emacaleni engxondorha abagwebi bawo, Beve amazwi am ukuba amnandi.

7.verse: Njengolimayo enqika umhlaba, Anjalo ukuthi saa amathambo ethu emlonyeni wengcwaba.

8.verse: Ngokuba akuwe, Yehova, Nkosi yam, amehlo am; Ndizimela ngawe; musa ukuwuphalaza umphefumlo wam.

9.verse: Ndigcine esangweni lomgibe wabandithiyelayo,  Nasezirhintyelweni zabasebenza ubutshinga.

10.verse: Mabeyele ezintanjeni zabo abangendawo, Ndide ndidlule mna okukanye.

1.verse: Eyokuqiqa kaDavide; oko ebesemqolombeni. Umthandazo.  Ndikhala kuYehova ngezwi lam, Ndikhunga uYehova ngezwi lam,

2.verse: Ndiphalaza inkalazo yam phambi kwakhe, Ndixela imbandezelo yam phambi kwakhe.

3.verse: Ekutyhafeni komoya phakathi kwam, Uyayazi wena ingqushu yam. Emendweni endihamba ngawo Bandiqhushekela isibatha.

4.verse: Bheka ngasekunene ubone, Akukho undibukayo; Andinandawo ndingasabela kuyo, Akukho uwukhathaleleyo umphefumlo wam.

5.verse: Ndikhala kuwe, Yehova, Ndithi, Nguwe ihlathi lam, Isabelo sam ezweni labahleliyo.

6.verse: Kubazele indlebe ukuhlahlamba kwam, Ngokuba ndiswele kakhulu: Ndihlangule kwabandisukelayo, Ngokuba bomelele kunam.

7.verse: Wukhuphe entolongweni umphefumlo wam, Ndibulele kwigama lakho. Amalungisa aya kuzithi jize ngesithsaba ngenxa yam,  Ngokuba undiphethe kakuhle.

1.verse: Umhobe kaDavide. Yehova, yiva umthandazo wam, kubekele indlebe ukutarhuzisa kwam; Ndiphendule ngokunyaniseka kwakho,  ngobulungisa bakho.

2.verse: Musa ukumsa ematyaleni umkhonzi wakho: Ngokuba phambi kwakho akukho namnye uhleliyo olilungisa.

3.verse: Ngokuba utshaba luwusukele umphefumlo wam, Lubutyumzele emhlabeni ubomi bam; Lundihlalise ezindaweni ezimnyama,  njengabafe ngonaphakade.

4.verse: Utyhafile phakathi kwam umoya wam; Imangalisiwe phakathi kwam intliziyo yam.

5.verse: Ndikhumbula imihla yamandulo; Ndicamngca ngemisebenzi yakho yonke, Ndicamngca ngesenzo sezandla zakho.

6.verse: Ndizolulela kuwe izandla zam, Umphefumlo wam ukungxamele njengelizwe elibharhileyo. (Phakamisani.)

7.verse: Khawuleza undiphendule, Yehova; uyaphela umoya wam. Musa ukubusithelisa kum ubuso bakho, Ndifane nabahla baye emhadini.

8.verse: Ndivise kwakusasa inceba yakho, Ngokuba ndikholose ngawe.  Ndazise indlela endiya kuhamba ngayo: Ngokuba ndiwuphakamisela kuwe umphefumlo wam.

9.verse: Ndihlangule ezintshabeni zam, Yehova. Ndizimela ngawe.

10.verse: Ndifundise ukwenza ikholo lakho, ngokuba unguThixo wam.  UMoya wakho olungileyo makandikhaphele ezweni elisithabazi.

11.verse: Ngenxa yegama lakho, Yehova, ndiphilise; Wukhuphe embandezelweni umphefumlo wam ngobulungisa bakho.

12.verse: Ngenceba yakho zibhangise iintshaba zam, Ubatshabalalise bonke abawubandezelayo umphefumlo wam, Ngokuba ndingumkhonzi wakho.

1.verse: EkaDavide. Makabongwe uYehova, uliwa lam, Ulofundisa izandla zam ukulwa, Iminwe yam imfazwe.

2.verse: Unceba yam, umboniselo yam, Ungxonde yam, umsindisi wam,  mna lo; Ungweletshetshe yam, undizimela ngaye; Ulonyathelela abantu bam phantsi kwam.

3.verse: Yehova, uyintoni na umntu, le nto umaziyo? Unyana womfo,  le nto umnyamekelayo?

4.verse: Umntu lo ufana nomphunga, Imihla yakhe injengethunzi elidlulayo.

5.verse: Yehova, thoba amazulu akho, uhle; Phatha ezintabeni,  ziqhume.

6.verse: Banekisa imibane, uziphangalalise; Thuma iintolo zakho,  uziduba-dube.

7.verse: Thuma izandla zakho, zivele phezulu; Ndirhole, ndihlangule emanzini amakhulu. Esandleni soonyana bolunye uhlanga;

8.verse: Abamlomo uthetha inkohlakalo, Abasandla sokunene sisesokunene sobuxoki.

9.verse: Thixo, ndokuvumela ingoma entsha, Ndikubethele umrhubhe ontambo zilishumi;

10.verse: Ulonika ookumkani usindiso, Ulohlangula uDavide umkhonzi wakhe ekreleni elinobubi.

11.verse: Ndirhole, ndihlangule esandleni soonyana bolunye uhlanga,  Abamlomo uthetha inkohlakalo, Abasandla sokunene sisesokunene sobuxoki;

12.verse: Baze oonyana bethu babe njengezityalo ezikhulileyo ebutsheni babo; Iintombi zethu zibe njengeembombo ezivathisiweyo ngeemfakamfele ngokokwakhiwa kwebhotwe;

13.verse: Oovimba bethu bazale, bavelise iintlobo ngeentlobo;  Iigusha zethu zizale amawaka, zande ngezigidi emaphandleni ethu;

14.verse: Iinkomo zethu zizale, Kungabikho kungenelwa, kungabikho kuthinjwa, Kungabikho kuhlahlamba ezitratweni zethu.

15.verse: Hayi, uyolo lwabantu ekunjalo kubo! Hayi, uyolo lwabantu abaThixo unguYehova!

1.verse: Eyokudumisa kaDavide. Ndiya kukuphakamisa, Thixo wam,  wena Kumkani, Ndilibonge igama lakho ngonaphakade kanaphakade.

2.verse: Imihla yonke ndiya kukubonga, Ndilidumise igama lakho ngonaphakade kanaphakade.

3.verse: Mkhulu uYehova, ngowokudunyiswa kakhulu; Ubukhulu bakhe abunakugocwagocwa.

4.verse: Izizukulwana ngezizukulwana, kunconywa izenzo zakho,  Kuxelwe ubugorha bakho.

5.verse: Bunobungangamela ubuqaqawuli bendili yakho; Ngeendawo zakho ezibalulekileyo ndiya kucamngca.

6.verse: Bothetha ngamandla ezenzo zakho ezoyikekayo, Ndibalise ngobukhulu bakho.

7.verse: Bompompoza isikhumbuzo sokulunga kwakho okukhulu,  Bamemelele ngobulungisa bakho.

8.verse: Unobabalo nemfesane uYehova, Uzeka kade umsindo, mkhulu ngenceba.

9.verse: Ulungile uYehova kubo bonke, Imfesane yakhe ikuzo zonke izenzo zakhe.

10.verse: Ziyabulela kuwe, Yehova, zonke izenzo zakho, Bakubonge abakho benceba;

11.verse: Uzuko lobukumkani bakho balutsho, Bathethe ngobugorha bakho.

12.verse: Ukuba babazise oonyana babantu ubugorha bakhe,  Ubuqaqawuli obuhle bobukumkani bakhe.

13.verse: Ubukumkani bakho bubukumkani bamaphakade onke, Nolawulo lwakho lukwizizukulwana ngezizukulwana.

14.verse: UYehova ungumxhasi wabo bonke abawayo, Ngumphakamisi wabo bonke abagobileyo.

15.verse: Amehlo eento zonke akhangele kuwe, Wena ke uzinika ukudla kwazo ngexesha elililo;

16.verse: Uyasivula isandla sakho, Uzihluthise iinto zonke eziphilileyo ngeento ezikholekileyo.

17.verse: Ulilungisa uYehova ngeendlela zakhe zonke, Unenceba ngezenzo zakhe zonke.

18.verse: Usondele uYehova kubo bonke abamnqulayo, Kubo bonke abamnqulayo ngenyaniso.

19.verse: Uyayenza into ekholekileyo kwabamoyikayo, Akuve ukuzibika kwabo, abasindise.

20.verse: UYehova ungumgcini wabo bonke abamthandayo,  Abatshabalalise bonke abangendawo.

21.verse: Umlomo wam mawuthethe indumiso kaYehova, Inyama yonke ilibonge igama lakhe elingcwele ngonaphakade kanaphakade.

1.verse: Haleluya! Mdumise uYehova, mphefumlo wam.

2.verse: Ndiya kumdumisa uYehova lo gama ndidla ubomi; Ndiya kumbethela uhadi uThixo wam ekubeni ndingosekhoyo.

3.verse: Musani ukukholosa ngamanene, Ngonyana womntu, yena ungenalo usindiso.

4.verse: Uyaphuma umoya wakhe, abuyele yena emhlabeni wakhe; Ngaloo mini ayatshitsha amabhongo akhe.

5.verse: Hayi, uyolo lwalowo uluncedo lunguThixo kaYakobi, Lwalowo ulinde kuYehova uThixo wakhe:

6.verse: KuMenzi wezulu nomhlaba, Nolwandle neento zonke ezikulo;  Kulogcina inyaniso ngonaphakade;

7.verse: Kogweba ityala labacudiswayo; Kopha abalambileyo ukudla;  KuYehova okhulula ababanjwa;

8.verse: KuYehova ovula amehlo eemfama; KuYehova ophakamisa abagobileyo; KuYehova othanda amalungisa;

9.verse: KuYehova ogcina abaphambukeli; Kulophakamisa inkedama nomhlolokazi, Ayiphethule indlela yabangendawo.

10.verse: UYehova ungukumkani ngonaphakade, UThixo wakho, Ziyon,  kwizizukulwana ngezizukulwana. Haleluya!

1.verse: Haleluya! Ngokuba kulungile ukuvuma ngoThixo wethu;  Ngokuba kumnandi, ifanelekile indumiso.

2.verse: Umakhi weYerusalem nguYehova; Abagxothwa bakwaSirayeli ubabuthela khona.

3.verse: Ulophilisa abaphuke intliziyo, Abophe amanxeba abo;

4.verse: Ulobala inani leenkwenkwezi, Ezibiza zonke ngamagama.

5.verse: Inkulu iNkosi yethu, inamandla amakhulu; Ingqondo yayo ayiphele ndawo.

6.verse: Ulophakamisa abalulamileyo nguYehova, Uthobela abangendawo emhlabeni.

7.verse: Hlabelani kuYehova eyokubulela, Mbetheleni uhadi uThixo wethu.

8.verse: Ulosibekelisa izulu ngamafu, Ulolungisela umhlaba imvula;  Ulontshulisa utyani ezintabeni;

9.verse: Ulonika inkomo ukudla, Namathole ehlungulu alilayo.

10.verse: Akabunanze nganto ubugorha behashe, Akakholiswa zizitho zendoda;

11.verse: UYehova ukholiswa ngabamoyikayo, Abalinde inceba yakhe.

12.verse: Mncome uYehova, Yerusalem. Mdumise uThixo wakho, Ziyon:

13.verse: Ngokuba eyomelezile imivalo yamasango akho, Ebasikelele abantwana bakho phakathi kwakho.

14.verse: Ngulomisa uxolo emideni yakho, Wakuhluthisa ngengqolowa etyebileyo.

15.verse: Ulothumela intetho yakhe ehlabathini, Ilizwi lakhe ligidima ngokukhawuleza;

16.verse: Ulonika ikhephu njengoboya bezimvu, Ugcwayela iqabaka njengothuthu,

17.verse: Ephosa umkhenkce wakhe njengamaqhekeza; Ngubani na onokuma phambi kwengqele yakhe?

18.verse: Uthumela ilizwi lakhe, ezo nto azinyibilikise; Uvuthuzisa umoya wakhe, aqukuqele amanzi.

19.verse: Uloxelela uYakobi ilizwi lakhe, USirayeli imimiselo yakhe namasiko akhe.

20.verse: Akenjanga ngalo kolunye uhlanga, Namasiko aluwazi.  Haleluya!

1.verse: Haleluya! Dumisani uYehova emazulwini; Mdumiseni ezindaweni eziphezulu.

2.verse: Mdumiseni, nonke zithunywa zakhe; Mdumiseni, nonke mikhosi yakhe;

3.verse: Mdumiseni, wena langa, nawe nyanga; Mdumiseni, nonke zinkwenkwezi zinokukhanya;

4.verse: Mdumiseni, mazulu awo amazulu, Nani, manzi angaphezu kwezulu.

5.verse: Mazilidumise ezo nto igama likaYehova; Ngokuba wawisa umthetho, zadalwa.

6.verse: Wazimisa ngonaphakade kanaphakade, Wazimisela ummiselo ezingayi kuwugqitha.

7.verse: Dumisani uYehova ehlabathini, Nina bominenga, nani nonke,  manzi enzonzobila:

8.verse: Wena mlilo, nawe sichotho; wena khephu, nawe msi; Moya uvuthuzayo, ulenzayo ilizwi lakhe;

9.verse: Nina zintaba, nani zinduli nonke, Nina mithi eneziqhamo,  nani misedare nonke;

10.verse: Nina marhamncwa, nani zinkomo nonke, Nina zinambuzane,  nani zintaka zinamaphiko;

11.verse: Ookumkani behlabathi, nezizwe zonke, Abathetheli nabagwebi behlabathi lonke;

12.verse: Umlisela kwanomthinjana, Amadoda amakhulu kunye nabafana:

13.verse: Mabalidumise igama likaYehova, Ngokuba liyingxonde igama lakhe yena yedwa; Indili yakhe ingaphezu komhlaba nezulu.

14.verse: Wabaphakamisela abantu bakhe uphondo, Lwayindumiso kwabakhe benceba bonke, Koonyana bakaSirayeli, abantu abasondeleyo kuye. Haleluya!

1.verse: Haleluya! Mvumeleni uYehova ingoma entsha, Indumiso yakhe ebandleni labenceba.

2.verse: USirayeli makavuye ngoMenzi wakhe; Usapho lwaseZiyon malugcobe ngoKumkani walo.

3.verse: Mabalidumise igama lakhe beqamba, Bembethela ingqongqo nohadi.

4.verse: Ngokuba uYehova uyakholiswa ngabantu bakhe, Uyabahombisa abalulamileyo ngoloyiso.

5.verse: Mabadlamke benozuko abenceba, Mabamemelele besezililini zabo.

6.verse: Yimibongo kaThixo emqaleni wabo, Likrele elintlangothi mbini esandleni sabo;

7.verse: Ukuze benze impindezelo ezintlangeni, Izohlwayo ezizweni;

8.verse: Bakhonkxe ookumkani bazo ngemixokelelwane, Nabazukileyo kuzo ngamakhamandela esinyithi;

9.verse: Benze kubo isiko elibhaliweyo. Luzuko olo lwabakhe benceba bonke. Haleluya!

1.verse: Haleluya! Dumisani uThixo engcweleni yakhe, Mdumiseni esibhakabhakeni samandla akhe.

2.verse: Mdumiseni ngenxa yobugorha bakhe, Mdumiseni ngokobuninzi bobukhulu bakhe.

3.verse: Mdumiseni ngokuvuthela isigodlo, Mdumiseni ngomrhubhe nohadi.

4.verse: Mdumiseni ngengqongqo nengqungqo, Mdumiseni ngeento ezineentambo nogwali.

5.verse: Mdumiseni ngamacangci akhenkcezayo, Mdumiseni ngamacangci adumayo.

6.verse: Yonke into ephefumlayo mayimdumise uYehova. Haleluya!
